src: sita kuvikela kuphela kwemanti more matshediso litiko letemanti ne kutfutfwa kwelindle (idws) lisebentisana nelidolobha lasekapa kuphungula lesomiso lesisenshonalaga kapa, lekungulesibi kakhulu kunalesake saba khona eminyakeni lelishumi.
tgt: siza ukulwisana nosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi more matshediso umnyango wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle (idws) usebenzisana nedolobha lasekapa ukulwisana nesomiso entshonalanga kapa, okuyisomiso esibi kwesezike zahlasela eminyakeni eyishumi.

src: ngekusho kwedws imvula ayikani ngalokwanele kantsi emazinga emadamu ehlile.
tgt: ngokwedws kube nokuntuleka kwezimvula futhi kwehla nezinga lamanzi emadamini.

src: loku kuphocelele labaphetse kutsi babeke imitsetfo lecinile kute kutsi emanti angapheli ngekushesha, lapho kutawuba bete emanti etimpompini.
tgt: lokhu sekwenze iziphathi mandla zibeke izinyathelo eziqi nile ukunweba isikhathi sokufika kosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, lapho amathangi azobe omile.

src: lidolobha lasekapa litawungenisa imikhawulo yelizinga 6b.
tgt: idolobha lasekapa liqala imikhawulo yezinga u6b.

src: loku kusho kutsi kutawuba nemkhawulo welusuku longemalitha la50 emanti noma nga phansi umuntfu ngamunye, noma ngabe kusekhaya, emsebentini, esikolweni noma kuphi kulenye indzawo.
tgt: lokhu kuchaza ukuthi kuzoba nomkhawulo wansuku zonke wamalitha amanzi angama50 noma angaphansi kumuntu ngamunye, osekhaya, emsebenzini, esikoleni noma kwenye indawo.

src: ngalesikhatsi lelidolobha licondzise yonkhe imitamo yalo yekuvikela kuphela kwemanti, litsi lidzinga kutilungiselela simo lapho khona lingakhona kulawula lokwetfulwa kwemanti kulelidolobha kudzimate kufike busika.
tgt: njengoba idolobha ligxile emizamweni yokulwisana nosuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, lithe lidinga ukulungiselela isimo lapho lizokwazi ukulawula uhlelo lwedolobha lokuthunyelwa kwamanzi ukuze kuze kufike ubusika.

src: "sitawuvala kutfunyelwa kwemanti etimpompini uma ngabe emadamu etfu afinyelela ezingeni lelingemaphesenti langu13.5.
tgt: "sizokuvala ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi kompompi uma amadamu ethu efika ezingeni elingu13.5%.

src: uma ngabe emazinga emadamu sekakumaphesenti langu13.5, sitawucala kuvala loluhlelo lwekutfumela emanti etimpompini, ngaphandle kwetindzawo letibalulekile temabhizinisi netikhungo, letinjengetibhedlela," kusho lelidolobha ngesitatimende.
tgt: uma izinga lamadamu lifika ku13.5%, bazoqala ukuvala amapayipi athumela amanzi, ngaphandle kwezindawo zezamabhizinisi ezisemqoka kanye nezikhungo, ezifana nezibhedlela," ngokulandisa kwedolobha esitatimendeni salo.

src: uma loku kwenteka, emanti bantfu batawalandza etindzaweni letibekiwe kulo lonkhe lelidolobha.
tgt: uma sekufika lesi sikhathi, izakhamuzi zizokwazi ukuthola amanzi ezizindeni eziphakela ngamanzi edolobheni lonkana.

src: umuntfu ngamunye utawunikwa emalitha lange25 ngelilanga.
tgt: isakhamuzi ngasinye sizokwabelwa amalitha amanzi anga ma25 ngosuku.

src: lelidolobha livule tikhungo talo letisebenta ngetinhlekelele (idoc) kutsi ticale luhlelo lwewater disaster plan, lelitawucala kusebenta uma ngabe kwenteka kutsi kuphele emanti.
tgt: idolobha selivule isikhungo esisebenza ngezinhlekelele (idoc) ukusebenzisa uhlelo lwamanzi lwenhlekelele, oluzoqala uma sekufike usuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi.

src: emabhulomashinilelidolobha alikukhutsati nakancane lokusetjentiswa kwemabulomashini lagujwa ngaphandle kantsi litsi kutselela kutawufinyetwa kube sikhatsi lesingandluli lihora linye kuphela ngabolesibili nangemgcibelo, ngembi kwensimbi ye9 ekuseni nangemuva kwensimbi ye6 ntsambama.
tgt: amapitsiidolobha selikugxekile ukusetshenziswa kwamapitsi futhi lathi ukusetshenziswa kwawo ukuze kuniselwe kuzoba ihora elilodwa kuphela ngolwesibili kanye nangomgqibelo, ngaphambi kwehora lesi9 ekuseni futhi ngemuva kwehora lesi6 ntambama.

src: "ibhulomashini/indzawo lengumtfombo wemanti kufanele ikalwe kantsi bonkhe labayisebentisako kufanele bagcine emarekhodi futsi agcinwe kwentelwa kuhlolwa," kusho lelidolobha.
tgt: "ukusetshenziswa kwamapitsi okanye imithombo yamanzi kufanele kukalwe ngamamitha futhi bonke abakusebenzisayo bagcine amarekhodi azotholakala uma kufanele ahlolwe," kusho idolobha.

src: lichubeke latsi bantfu labahlala khona kufanele batfole imvume kadws uma ngabe bafuna kutsenga noma kutsengisa emanti emabhulomashini/indzawo lengumtfombo wemanti.
tgt: lengeze ngokuthi izakhamuzi kufanele zithole imvume kudws uma zifuna ukudayisa noma ukuthenga amanzi asemapitsini/nasemithonjeni yamanzi.

src: njengencenye yemitamo yahulumende yekulawula kusetjentiswa kwemanti, idws itse labaphetse basebentisa tindlela leticinile kute bacinisekise kwekutsi lemitsetfo lecinile lebekiwe yekwabelwa kwemanti iyalandzelelwa.
tgt: njengomzamo kahulumeni wokulawula ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi, idws ithe iziphathimandla zibeke izinyathelo eziqinille ukuqikelela ukuthi ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ngendlela ebekelwe imikhawulo kuyalandelwa.

src: lelidolobha lisebenta nelicembu lebemtsetfo nelitsimba lebaphenyi lelikhetsekile kucinisekisa kuhambisana nemtsetfo.
tgt: idolobha futhi lisebenzisana nethimba eliqinisekisa uku landelwa komthetho kanye nophiko oluphenyayo olukhethekile ukuqikelela ukulandelwa komthetho.

src: kutsatsa tinyatselo ngekumelana nalabaphula umtsetfo lelitiko lisandza kwenta umtamo ngekubambisana nalelidolobha, libukete ekusetjentisweni kwemanti ngendlela lengafanele endzaweni yasemfuleni.
tgt: ukuthathela izinyathelo abaphula umthetho umnyango ngokuhlanganyela nedolobha usanda kugasela emfuleni, ugxile ezenzweni zokusetshenziswa kwamanzi ngokungekho semthethweni.

src: lenchubo ihlose kucondzisa konkhe kungasebentiseki kahle kwemanti nekungahambisani nalomtsetfo wekusebentisa emanti ngendlela lebekiwe, bebabukete ikakhulukati kuletindzawo letiwasha timoto letingekho emtsetfweni.
tgt: lo mkhankaso kuhloswe ngawo ukudingida ukuphulwa kwemithetho kwamanje kanye nokulandela imikhawulo yamanzi, futhi uqondiswe ikakhulukazi ezikhungweni eziwasha izimoto ngokungekho emthethweni.

src: "ngekwemikhawulo yalelidolobha yemazinga 6b, la manti ladlekako (lanatsekako) amasipala angeke asetjentiselwa kuwasha timoto.
tgt: "ngokwamazinga emikhawulo 6b yedolobha, amanzi kama sipala angaphuzwa ngeke asetshenziswe ukuwasha izimoto.

src: tindzawo tekuwasha timoto letingekho emtsetfweni tidla emanti lamanyenti.
tgt: izindawo zokuwasha izimoto ezingekho emthethweni zisebenzisa amanzi amaningi.

src: banini betindzawo tekuwasha timoto letinyenti basebentisa emaphayiphi latimele kuhambisa ibhizinisi yabo, kantsi labanye basebentisa emanti lavela etimpompini," kusho lelitiko.
tgt: abanikazi bezindawo zokuwasha izimoto abaningi basebenzisa ompompi abafakelwe umphakathi emabhizinisini abo, abanye basebenzisa amanzi ompompi babo," kuchaza umnyango.

src: noma bakhona labangemancusa emanti labatinikele labasebentela kusita kuvikela kuphela kwemanti, lelidolobha licela bantfu balo kutsi nabo badlale indzima yabo ekongeni emanti.
tgt: nakuba emaningi amanxusa amanzi azimisele asebenzayo ukusiza ukunqanda usuku lokuntuleka kwamanzi, idolobha licele izakhamuzi ukuba zidlale indima yazo ekongeni amanzi.

src: "sicela bonkhe labasebentisa emanti kutsi bangenelele kulomtamo welidolobha laseka pa," kusho lisekela sodolobha wasekapa ian neilson.
tgt: "sifuna bonke abasebenzisa amanzi bajoyine imizamo yedolobha lasekapa," ngokusho kwephini likasodolobha wasekapa uian neilson.

src: emasu ekonga emanti vala impompi ngalesikhatsi ugeza ematinyo, ushefa noma ufaka insipho etandleni shawa sikhashana kantsi usebentise emanti lamancane nawugeza vikela kutsenga emanti lasemabhodleleni.
tgt: amasu okonga amanzi vala umpompi uma uxubha, ushefa noma ugcoba insipho ezandleni ngena eshaweni isikhashana futhi usebenzise amanzi amancane uma ugeza gwema ukusebenzisa amanzi athengwayo.

src: imoto washa imoto yakho ngelibhakede nesipontshi kuphela.
tgt: imoto washa imoto yakho ngebhakede nesiphontshi kuphela.

src: esigezelweni shawa kunekusebentisa libhavu sebentisa emanti lamancane ebhavini gezisani bantfwana labancane ndzawonye flashani emathoyilethi uma ngabe sekunuka kakhulu beka sitini kucistern yakho kwehlisa lizinga lekusebenta kwemanti.
tgt: amagumbi okugeza ngena eshaweni esikhundleni sikabhavu sebenzisa amanzi amancane kubhavu geza izingane ezincane ndawonye fulasha indlu yangasese kuphela uma kunephunga beka isitini endishini yamanzi okufulasha ukunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kwamanzi.

src: likhishi sebentisa izinki levaliwe uma uwasha titja, kunekutsi uwavulele aphume sebentisa insipho yekuwasha titja ibe yincane, ehlisa sidzingo sekutipula vala izinki ngalesikhatsi uwasha tibhidvo, kunekutsi uwavulele aphume sebentisa lamanti lowashe ngawo titselo netibhidvo kutselela timbali.
tgt: ekhishini sebenzisa usinki ovalwayo uma ugeza izitsha, esikhundleni sikampompi sebenzisa insipho yokugeza izitsha encane, ukugwema isidingo sokuhlambulula sebenzisa usinki ovaliwe uma uhlambulula imifino, esikhundleni sikampompi sebenzisa amanzi owasebenzise ukuhlambulula izithelo nemifino uma unisela izitshalo.

src: timbali nengadze tselela timbali ngalesikhatsi kusapholile tselela timbali ngalamanti lowasebentise ekhishini nawuwasha titselo netibhidvo sebentisa manyolo wemvelo nalongenamkhemikhali engadzeni emalunga emphakatsi ayacelwa kutsi asebentise emamitha abo emanti kuhlola lapho kuvuta khona emanti.
tgt: izimbali nesivande nisela izimbali uma sekupholile nisela izimbali ngamanzi owasebenzise ekhishini ukuhlambulula izithelo nemifino sebenzisa umanyolo wemvelo nongenamakhemikhali esivandeni.

src: buka imitha yemanti ngembi nangemuva kwemahora lamabili, uma ngabe ningakaze nisebentise emanti.
tgt: amalungu omphakathi ayacelwa ukuba asebenzise amamitha amanzi ukuhlola ukuconsa kwamanzi okungabikiwe.

src: uma ngabe lemitha ayisafani nasekucaleni, kusho kutsi kukhona lapho kuvuta khona.
tgt: funda imitha yamanzi ngaphambi futhi ngemuva kwesikhathi esingamahora amabili, uma engekho amanzi aseke asetshenziswa.

src: tfola emandla akho futsi, bika kudlwengulwa adele schormann kuba ngulohluku nyetwe ngetemacansi noma udlwengulwe kuyintfo lebuhlungu kakhulu le umuntfu angabukana nayo.
tgt: buyisa amandla akho, bika ngokunukubezwa adele schormann ukuba isisulu soku nukubezwa ngoko cansi noma ukudlwengulwa kuyinto ebu hlungu nethusayo umuntu angabhekana nayo.

src: kungako emaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (isaps) abe netinhlelo lebatilungisako kwenta kube lula futsi kuphephe kutsi bantfu bakhone kubika lobugebengu.
tgt: ingakho umbutho wamaphoyisa waseningizimu afrika (isaps) usubeke izinhlelo zokwenza kube lula futhi kuphephe kubantu ukubika lobu bugebengu.

src: sikhulumeli semaphoyisa ase mpumalanga colonel mtsholi bhembe utsi kubalulekile kutsi umphakatsi usebentisane nemaphoyisa babike ngalobugebengu.
tgt: okhulumela amaphoyisa ase mpumalanga ucolonel mtsholi bhembe uthe kubalulekile ukuba umphakathi usebenzisane namaphoyisa futhi ubike lobu bugebengu.

src: "njengemaphoyisa, kungumsebenti wetfu kudlala indzi ma lenkhulu ekucinisekiseni kwekutsi labenta lobugebengu bayabanjwa nalabo labahlukumetekile baphatseke kahle.
tgt: "njengamaphoyisa, kuwum sebenzi wethu ukudlala indi ma enkulu ukuqinisekisa uku thi ababhebhezeli bayabanjwa futhi izisulu zobugebengu zi sezandleni eziphephile.

src: sice la umphakatsi kutsi ute utobika emacala ekudlwengulwa esiteshini semaphoyisa lesisedvute nabo," kusho bhembe.
tgt: sicela ukuba umphakathi uze ubike amacala okudlwengulwa eziteshini zamaphoyisa eziseduzane," kuqhuba ubhembe.

src: labahlukunyetiwe kufanele babike bugebengu bekuhluku nyetwa ngetemacansi emaphoyiseni kungakandluli emahora lange72 ngemuva kwekutsi kwenteke lobugebengu.
tgt: izisulu zokunukubezwa kufanele zibike ubugebengu bezocansi emaphoyiseni engakapheli amahora angama72 kwenzeke ubugebengu.

src: bhembe ucwayise labahluku nyetwe ngekudlwengulwa kutsi batfole lusito lwabochwephesha labacwayisa ngetinhlungu ngemuva kwalesehlakalo.
tgt: ubhembe uyalele izisu lu zokudlwengulwa ukuba zifune usizo lokululekwa ngemuva kwezigameko ezithusayo ezibuhlungu.

src: utsi, "ungahle utive ungcolile ufune kugeza emahlandla lambalwa kantsi ungatfuka wesabe kuphumela ngaphandle.
tgt: "ungazizwa ungcolile futhi ugeze uphindelela futhi usabe ukuphuma.

src: akukho nakunye kwaloku lokungakajwayeleki noma kungatsi akusikahle.
tgt: akukho okungajwayelekile kulokhu futhi nokungaqhelekile.

src: kufanele ukhumbule kwekutsi kunetinsita letikhona kutsi tikusite".
tgt: kufanele ukhumbule ukuthi kunosizo olutholakalayo ukukusiza," esaqhuba.

src: igreater rape intervention project (grip) ingulenye yetinhlangano letisita labahlukunyetwe ngekudlwengulwa kutsi bahlolelwe ligciwane lesandvulelangculazi nengculazi (ihiv/aids) naletinye tifo.
tgt: igreater rape intervention project (igrip) enye yezinhlangano ezisiza izisulu zokudlwengulwa ukuba zihlole igciwane lesandulelangculazi (ihiv) nengculazi (iaids) nezinye izifo.

src: sonhlalakahle wegrip thandiwe maseko utsi lenhlangano inakekela labahlukunyetwe ngekudlwengulwa.
tgt: usonhlalakahle wegrip uthandiwe maseko uthe le nhlangano inakekela izisulu zokudlwengulwa.

src: utsi, "sibaniketa umgodla wekubanakekela bese laba la bahlukunyetiwe bahlala endlini yetfu yekuphepha badzimate balungele kukhuluma.
tgt: "sihlinzekela ngokunakekela futhi sivumele izisulu zihlale endlini lapho ziqashwe khona zize zikulungele ukukhuluma.

src: sinabochwephesha labahambembili labanakekela ngalokundlulele futsi bahlala balungele kusita".
tgt: sinabaluleki abaphambili futhi abanakekelayo kakhulu abalindele ukukusiza," ngokusho kwakhe.

src: ungalibika njani licala lekudlwengulwa emaphoyiseni: ■ kwekucala, yani emtfolamphilo uyohlolwa.
tgt: libikwa kanjani emaphoyiseni icala lokudlwengulwa: ■ okokuqala, hamba uye emtholampilo ukuze uhlolwe.

src: lombiko utawuba yincenye yelifayela lalelicala kantsi kutawusita emaphoyisa kutsi abambe lona lotsintsekako.
tgt: umbiko uzoba ingxenye yefayele lecala futhi uzosiza amaphoyisa ukubamba umsolwa.

src: ■ hamba uye emaphoyiseni lasedvute nawe uyovula licala.
tgt: ■ bese uya esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze uvule icala.

src: leliphoyisa litakubuta imininingwane yakho nekutsi kwentekeni kuwe.
tgt: iphoyisa lizobuza imininingwane eqondene nawe futhi nokukwehlele.

src: phendvula ubatjele liciniso uzame nekukhumbula yonkhe imininingwane ngendlela longakhona ngayo.
tgt: phendula ngokuthembeka futhi uzame ukukhumbula imininingwane eminingi.

src: kungahle kube yinchubo lebuhlungu, kodvwa lolwatiso lutawusita nakwentiwa luphenyo.
tgt: kungaba uhlelo olubuhlungu, kodwa imininingwane izosiza uma sekwenziwa uphenyo.

src: kubhalisela kuvota kutakwentiwa ngendlovulenkhulu 2018 more matshediso iiec imemetele imphela sontfo yekucala yeku bhalisela kuvota kwe mnyaka we2019 futsi ice la labo labafanelekile eveni lonkhe kutsi bavakashele titeshi tabo tekuvota bayo buyeketa imininingwane yabo eluhlwini lwekuvota noma babhalisele kuvota.
tgt: ukubhalisela ukuvota kuzoba ngondasa wezi2018 more matshedisoi iec yaseningizimu afri ka seyimemezele impe lasonto yokuqala yokub halisela kwabavoti ukhetho lowezi2019 futhi seyinxenxe abafanele ukuvota ezweni lonke ukuthi bavakashele izikhungo zabo zokuvota ukuze balungise imininingwane yabo ohlwini lwabavoti noma ukuze babhalisele ukuvota.

src: umphatsi lomkhulu wekuvotisa walekhomishini sy mamabolo utsite tonkhe titeshi tekuvotisa leti22 612 titawuvulwa kumphelaso ntfo yamhla ti10 kuya mhla ti11 indlovu 2018, kusuka nge nsimbi ye8 ekuseni kuyo shaya insimbi ye5 entsa mbama kute kube lula futsi kuhambisane netidzingo tebavoti tekubuyeketa imini ningwane yabo noma teku bhalisa.
tgt: isikhulu sokhetho esiyinhloko sekhomishana usy mamabolo uthe zonke izikhungo zokuvota eziyizi22 612 zizovula ngempelasonto yangomhla ziyi10 kanye namhla ziyi11 kundasa wezi2018, kusukela ngele8 ekuseni kuze kube ngele5 ntambama, ukuze kwenziwe kube lula futhi kusize abavoti ukuthi bafake imininingwane yabo yakamuva yokubhalisa noma ukuthi ba bhalise.

src: uma ngabe utfutsele endzaweni lensha kusukela wagcina kubhalisela kuvota, kufuneka uphindze ubhalise esigodzini sakho sekuvota lesisha.
tgt: uma uthuthele endaweni entsha kusukela mhla ugcina ukubha lisela ukuvota, kumele ubhalise esifundeni sakho sokuvota esisha.

src: takhamuti taseningizimu afrika letineminyaka leli16 nangetulu futsi letina matisi losemtsetfweni noma simathikhadi tingabhalisela kuvota.
tgt: izakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika ezineminyaka yobudala eyi16 kanye nangaphezulu ezinomazisi noma ikhadi elisemthethweni zingabhalisela ukuvota.

src: uma ungakabhalisi, angeke uvunyelwe kuvota ngemnyaka we2019.
tgt: uma ungabhalisanga, angeke uze uvunyelwe ukuthi uvote ngowezi2019.

src: bavoti lababhalisile, imininingwane yabo yelikhe li ingekho kuluhlu lweku vota, banganiketa lwatiso loludzingekako esiteshini sabo sekuvota ngalesikhatsi sekubhalisa.
tgt: abavoti ababhalisiwe, abanemininingwane yabo yekheli engekho ohlwini lwabavoti, bangahlinzeka imininingwane edingekayo esikhungweni sabo sokuvota ngesikhathi sokubhalisa.

src: "sifuna bavoti bete basebentise lelitfuba," kwasho mamabolo.
tgt: "sidinga ukuthi abavoti bafike futhi basebenzise ithuba," kusho umamabolo.

src: "ikhomishini yelukhetfo nanyalo ayinawo emakheli ebavoti laba2.8 yetigidzi.
tgt: "ikhomishani yokhetho ezimele ayikabi namakheli abavoti cishe abayizigidi eziyi2.8.

src: sinalamanye emakheli la3.5 yetigidzi latsatfwa ‘nje ngalangakapheleli’.
tgt: ngaphezu kwalokho sinamakheli ayizigidi eziyi3.5 abekwe kuhlu ‘lwa ngaphelele’ noma ‘angacacile’.

src: loluhlobo lwemakheli ludzinga kucutju ngulwa nekucinisekiswa kutsi ingabe kukhona yini leminye imininingwane le khona", kwangeta mamabolo.
tgt: lo mkhakha usadinga ukuhlaziywa futhi ukuze kutholakale ukuthi ngabe kukhona yini eminye imininingwane etholakalayo," kwengeza yena.

src: ikhomishini itfole ema kheli ngekusebentisa tindlela letehlukene, letifaka kubuye ketwa kwemarekhodi, ema fayela kanye nemaakhayivu kubuka nekubhala emakheli laniketwe bavoti kuleminyaka le20 leyengcile; kugco gcwe emakheli kulolukhetfo lwabomasipala lwemnyaka we2016; nekungena umuti ngemuti ngembi kwetimphe lasontfo tekubhalisela ku votela lukhetfo lwekuvala tikhewu.
tgt: ikhomishani ithola amakheli ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo ezahlukene, ezihlanganisa ukubukeza amarekhodi, amafayela kanye nezinqolobane zemibhalo ukuze ibheke bese ifaka amakheli ahlinzekwe abavoti eminyakeni engama20 edlule, ngokuqoqa amakheli ngokhetho lomasipala lowezi2016, kanye nokwenza umsebenzi wokufuna bukhoma kungekafiki impelasonto yoku bhalisela ukhetho lokuchibiyela.

src: uma kudzingeka, bavoti labatfolwa babhalise etigodzini tekuvota letingakafaneli, basuswa, njengoba kubekiwe kusigaba 12 (1)(d) semtsetfo welukhetfo.
tgt: lapho kwakunesidingo khona, abavoti abatholakale bebhaliswe ezifundeni zokuvota ezingafanele basuswa, njengalokho kuhlinzekwe kusigaba 12 (1)(d) somthetho wokhetho.

src: "sitfole futsi sasebentisa, lapho kunekwenteka khona, idatha yemakheli lebuya kuleminye imitfombo yembu so lefana netelubalobalo taseningizimu afrika, ieje nsi yekuvikeleka kwete nhlalo yaseningizimu afrika, itelkom, temaposi aseni ngizimu afrika kanye naku litiko lasekhaya", kwasho mamabolo.
tgt: "sesithole futhi sasebenzisa, lapho bekwenzeka khona, imininingwane yamakheli kweminye imithombo yombuso efana nestatistics south africa, isouth african social security agency, utelkom, isouth african post office kanye nomnyango wezasekhaya," kusho yena.

src: za) kute bavoti lababhalisile labakhona kufinyelela kuinthanethi babuyekete noma banikete emakheli abo.
tgt: za) kubavoti ababhalisiwe abakwazi ukufinyelela kuinthanethi ukuze babukeze bese/noma bahlinzeke ngamakheli abo.

src: bavoti bangabuye bashayele sikhungo sekuchumana (0800 11 8000), kusukela ngemsombuluko kuya kulesihlanu ngetikhatsi temsebenti, bacele lusito lolumayelana nalapho kunetiteshi tekuvota khona nekubuta leminye imibuto.
tgt: abavoti bangashayela isikhungo sokuxhumana ucingo (0800 11 8000), kusukela ngomsombuluko ukuya ngolwesihlanu ngezikhathi zomsebenzi, ukuze bathole ukulekelelwa ngezindawo okutholakala kuzo izikhungo zabo zokuvota kanye nanganoma yini enye abafisa ukuyibuza.

src: bavoti lababhalisile bangabuye batfumele inombolo yamatisi ngesms ku: 32810 kute batfole isms lenelikheli lesiteshi sabo sekuvota (isms ibita r1).
tgt: abavoti ababhalisiwe bangathumela futhi ngesms inombolo yabo kamazisi ku32810 ukuze bathole isms enekheli lesikhungo sabo sokuvota (isms ibiza ur1).

src: yini lekufanele ute nako uma uya esiteshini sakho sekuvota phatsa matisi wakho lonebhakhodi, simathikhadi lesingumatisi noma sitifiketi samatisi sesikhashana.
tgt: yini okumele uze nayouma uvakashela isikhungo sakho sokuvota hamba nomazisi wakho onamagabelo noma umazisi wesmart card noma isitifiketi sesikhashana sikamazisi.

src: londvolota bobhejane bakitsi more matshediso indvuna yetemvelo, edna molewa, utfule umbiko walokuchubekako wekucala wemnya ka we2018 lomayelana ne ndlelamasu yahulumende yekubambisana ekulweni nekutingelwa kwabobhejane.
tgt: sindisani obhejane bakithi more matshediso ungqongqoshe wezendawo, ued na molewa, usekhi phe umbiko wokuqala wezi2018 wenqubekela phambili eseyibe khona ngokuphathelene nesu likahulumeni lokwengamela elididiyela izinhlaka eziningi lokuqeda ukuzingelwa kobhejane.

src: lombiko, lobuye ufake ikota yekugcina yemnyaka we2017, ukhomba imphumelelo kulinani lekubopha, kuphenya kanye nekugwe tjwa kwalabo labatingela ngalokungekho emtsetfweni nalabashushumbisa bo bhejane kanye nekuncipha lokuncane kwabobhejane labatingelwe ngalokungekho emtsetfweni eveni lonkhe ngemnyaka we2017 (1028), uma kucatsaniswa nemnyaka we2016 (1054).
tgt: umbiko, ohlanganisa nekota yokugcina yowezi2017, ukhombisa inqubekela phambili ngokuphathelene nenani lababoshiwe, uphenyo kanye nabazingela bese beshushu mbisa izimpondo zobhejane asebegwetshiwe kanye nokwehla kancane kwesibalo sobhejane abazingelwa kuzwelonke ngowezi2017 (1028), uma kuqhathaniswa nowezi2016 (1054).

src: ngemnyaka we2017 kubanjwe emahlandla lasiphohlongo bashushumbi si betimphondvo tabhejane esikhumuleweni setindiza semave ngemave ior tambo, kwaboshwa basolwa labatingela ngalokungekho emtsetfweni bobhejane laba502, basolwa labatsengisa bobhejane laba16, lokwenta lenombolo ifike ku518, le khomba kuncipha kusuka ku608 ngemnyaka we2016.
tgt: ngowezi2017 kwaba khona ukwemukwa kwezimpondo zobhejane okuyisishiyagalo mbili esikhumulweni sezindiza ior tambo international futhi kwaboshwa abangama502 abasolwa ngokuzingela obhe jane nabayi16 abasolwa ngo kushushumbisa izimpondo zobhejane, nokwaholela ekutheni isibalo sibe ngama518, sehla sisuka kuma680 ngowezi2016.

src: "lokudzabukisako ku tsi, kuboshwe tisebenti tetfu leti21 tiboshelwa emacala lahambisana nekutingelwa lokungekho emtsetfweni kwabobhejane ngemnyaka we2017", kwasho indvuna molewa.
tgt: "kuyadumaza ukuthi, abasebenzi bethu abangama21 baboshelwa ukuzibandaka nya nokuzingelwa kobhejane ngowezi2017," kusho ungqongqoshe umolewa.

src: kucedza kutingela lokungekho emtsetfweni hulumende nebalingani bakhe basungule tindlela letehlukahlukene tekucedza kutingelwa lokungakavumeleki kwabobhejane, letifaka tinhlelo tekugadza nekuntji ngela emapaki avelonkhe kanye nekusebentisa ithe khnoloji yekugucula simo.
tgt: ukunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejaneuhulumeni kanye nabambi sene nabo sebesebenzise izi ndlela ezahlukene nokunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejane, ezi hlanganisa izinhlelo zokuqapha eziqiwini zikazwelonke kanye nokusebenzisa ubuchwe pheshe obuguqula isimo.

src: emkhatsini kwabimbi dvwane nengongoni 2017, kwatingelwa ngalukunge kho emtsetfweni bobhejane laba504 ekruger national park (eknp), lokwehle nge maphesenti langema24 kunalangema662 ngemnyaka we2016.
tgt: phakathi kukamasingana kanye nozibandlela wezi2017, kwazingelwa obhejane abangama504 ekruger national park (knp), nokungamaphesenti ehle ngama24 kunama662 angowezi2016.

src: "ngenca yemiphumela yetindlelamasu tetfu tekulwa nekutingela lokungekho e mtsetfweni eknp sibona kwehla kwelinani letintfo letimayelana nekutingela lokungekho emtsetfweni kulepaki, lelikhomba kutsi beliku2662 ngemnyaka we2017 uma licatsaniswa ne2883 ngemnyaka we2016.
tgt: "ngenxa yendlela yokunqanda ukuzingelwa kobhejane eknp sibona yehla imizamo yokuzingelwa kobhejane esiqiwini, kuqoshwe izi2662 ngowezi2017 uma kuqhathaniswa nezi2883 ngowezi2016.

src: loku kusho kuncipha nge maphesenti la7.6," kwa cinisekisa indvuna yelitiko.
tgt: lokhu kukhombisa ukwehla kwamaphesenti ngo7.6," kuqinisa ungqongqoshe.

src: kodvwake, likhulile linani labobhejane labatingelwe ngalokungekho emtsetfweni kwazulunatal, enyakatfo kapa, empumalanga, efree state kanye nasenyakatfo nshonalanga.
tgt: noma kunjalo, sekwenyuke isibalo sobhejane abazingelwe kwazulunatali, enyakatho kapa, empumalanga, efreyi stata kanye nasesifundazweni sasenyakathontshonalanga.

src: umtselela kutemnotfokutingelwa lokungekho emtsetfweni kwabobhejane nekushushunjiswa kweti lwane tasendle kunemtse lela lomubi ekutfutfukiseni umnotfo welive nematfuba emisebenti, lokufaka kutfu tfukisa umnotfo wetint fo letehlukahlukene lofaka ekhatsi umkhakha wetekuvakasha.
tgt: umthelela kwezomnothoukuzingelwa kobhejane kanye nokushushumbiswa kwezi lwane kunomthelela omubi ekuthuthukisweni komnotho wezwe kanye nasekudalweni kwamathuba omsebenzi, okuhlanganisa ukuthuthukiswa komnotho onhlobonhlobo wezemvelo ohlanganisa no mkhakha wezokuvakasha.

src: "kulahleka kwalinye lice mbu letilwane letiluphawu lweningizimu afrika lelu fana nabhejane, lolungilo lunye lwe‘big five’ kungaba nemtselela lomubi kulinani letivakashi letivakasha eni ngizimu afrika.
tgt: "ukulahleka kohlobo lwezi lwane oluyingqalabutho kakhulu lwaseningizimu afrika olufana nobhejane, nongesinye ‘sezilwane ezinkulu ezinhlanu’ kungaba nomthelela omubi ngokuphathelene nenani lezivakashi eningizimu afrika.

src: tivakashi letiningi tivakasha eningi zimu afrika kutewubona ibig five, lekungubhejane, libhubesi, inyatsi, ingwe kanye nendlovu," kwasho litiko letemvelo kusitatimende salo.
tgt: izivakashi eziningi eziza eningizimu afrika zizela ukuzobona izilwane ezinhlanu ezinkulu, nokuwubhejane, ibhubesi, inyathi, ingwe kanye nendlovu," kusho isitatimende somnyango wezendawo.

src: kutingela lokungekho emtsetfweni kwabobhejane kutsatfwa njengentfo lene bungoti kutekuvikeleka kwelive, lokungaba nemtse lela kulinani letivakashi le tivakashela lelive, ngaloko hulumende umemetele kutsi kulicala lelicaliswa embili.
tgt: ukuzingelwa kobhejane sekwaziswe njengengozi yezokuphepha ezweni, enga ba nomthelela kuamanani ezivakashi ezivakashela izwe, futhi uhulumeni usememezele ukuthi kuwubugebengu obuse qhulwini kuzwelonke.

src: imisebenti lengekho emtse tfweni lehlobene nekutinge lwa kwabobhejane nekushu shunjiswa kwetimphondvo tabo iphumelelisa linani lelincane kumacembu ebuge bengu.
tgt: izenzo ezingekho semthe thweni ezihlanganiswa nokuzingelwa kobhejane kanye nokushushumbiswa kwezi mpondo zobhejane kuhlo mulisa amaqembu amancane emigulukudu.

src: "loluchungechunge lwe bugebengu lutfola litfu ba ngenca yekubalukhuni kwaloluhlobo lwemacala.
tgt: "la maqembu emigulukudu ahlomula ngenxa yokuba yinkimbinkimbi kwalolu hlobo lobugebengu.

src: imisa luhlelo lolwasita mhlelidolo bha kutsi aphumelele more matshediso kukhula ekhaya le liphuyile leliphe tfwe ngumake longu mtali munye kuba yintfo lenemkhawulo kepha loko akutange kumvimbe vele mukhodiwa ekulandzeleleni liphupho lakhe lekuba ngu mhlelidolobha.
tgt: imisa iwuhlelo elasiza umhleli womumo wedolobha more matshediso ukukhula ekhaya eli dla imbuya ngothi eliphethwe umama ngayedwana ebe engase benzi kungawavimba ama thuba empumelelo, kodwa akuzange kumvimbe uvele mukhodiwa ekulandeleni i phupho lakhe lokuba umhleli womumo wedolobha.

src: mukhodiwa, longuweku dzabuka esigodzini sase luheni kumasipala we ndzawo wasethulamela elimpopo, watfola ticu te urban and regional planning enyuvesi yasevenda nga2016.
tgt: umukhodiwa, odabuka esigodini saseluheni kumasipala wasekhaya ithulame la elimpopo, uthole iziqu zeurban and regional pla nning enyuvesi yasevenda ngowezi2016.

src: ungulomunye webazu zi beluhlelo lwebapho tfuli labancane lweeje nti lesekela sakhiwonchanti samasipala (imisa), loluhlose kutsi lifunele bapho tfuli labaneticu misebe nti nematfuba ekuceceshwa besemsebentini emikha kheni yetebucwepheshe le fanele kute kutsi babhaliswe njengetingcweti.
tgt: ungomunye wabahlomule ohlelweni lokweseka ingqa lasizinga kamasipala lwa bantu abasha abathweswe iziqu (imisa), oluhlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abathweswe iziqu ezingeni lemfudo ephakeme bakwazi ukungena emsebenzini babone okwenziwayo futhi bacathuliswe emsebenzini emikhakheni yezobuchwe pheshe ukuze bakwazi uku bhaliswa njengochwepheshe.

src: imisa luphiko lwahulumende wavelonkhe le lingekhatsi kwelitiko letekubusa ngekubambisana.
tgt: imisa iwuhlaka lukahu lumeni kazwelonke olu ngaphansi komnyango wo kwengamela ngokubambi sana.

src: yasungulwa ngenkhwe khweti 2012.
tgt: yasungulwa kunhlaba 2012.

src: "ngemuva kwekuphotfu la matikuletjeni nga2008, kwadzingeka kutsi ngihlale umnyaka munye ekhaya ngi ngafundzi ngibukene ne kutsi ngitayitfola kuphi i mali yekukhokhela inyuve si," kwasho mukhodiwa.
tgt: "emuva kokuqeda umatikuletsheni ngowezi2008, kwaba nesidingo sokuthi ngithathe ikhefu lonyaka ukuze ngithole indlela yokukhokha izindleko zasenyuvesi," ku sho umukhodiwa.

src: nga2010, wabhalisa enyu vesi yasejozi kepha ngenca yekweswelakala kwetimali akatange akhone kucedza umnyaka wakhe wekucala kwadzingeka kutsi ayishiye phansi inyuvesi.
tgt: ngowezi2010, wabhalisa enyuvesi yasegoli kodwa akabanga nemali eyanele ukuthi aqede unyaka wakhe wokuqala, kwase kuphoqele ka ukuthi ashiye phansi.

src: ngemnyaka lolandzelako, wabhalisela ticu teelectrical engineering n3 ekolishi lendzawo kepha masinyane nje wakubona loko kutsi aku siyo intfo yakhe.
tgt: ngonyaka olandelayo, wa bhalisela izifundo zobunjini yela, ielectrical engineering n3 ekolishi langakubo kepha washesha ukubona ukuthi bengadalelwanga lezo zifu ndo.

src: waphindzeke futsi wacala phansi wa tfumela ticelo emanyuvesi ngelitsemba lekutsi utawu tfola lusito lwemali.
tgt: waphinda futhi wathu mela izicelo zokufunda emanyuvesi ethemba ukuthi uzothola uxhaso.

src: ngenhlanhla, inyuvesi ya sevenda yasemukela sicelo sakhe wabese ucala ticu ta khe teurban and regional pla nning nga2012.
tgt: ngenhlanhla, inyuvesi yasevenda yasamukela isicelo sakhe, waqala ukufundela iziqu zeurban and regional planning ngowezi2012.

src: "sikimu savelonkhe selusi to lwetimali tetitjudeni (insfas) yakhokhela tifu ndvo temnyaka wami weku cala kwase kutsi imisa yangi sita ngemfundzate nasenge nta umnyaka wami wesibili yaphindze futsi yangesekela ngate ngaphotfula tifundvo tami nga2016," kwasho yena.
tgt: "uhlelo lokuxhasa abafu ndi ngezimali kuzwelonke (insfas) lwakhokhela izifundo zami zonyaka wokuqala, imisa yangipha umfundaze sengisonyanke ni wesibili futhi yangeseka ngaze ngaqeda izifundo zami ngowezi2016," kusho yena.

src: lomfundzate wakhokhela tonkhe tidzingo temfundvo, kufaka ekhatsi imali yekufundza, emabhuku nekwe kubhalela, indzawo yekuhla la nekudla.
tgt: umfundaze wahlangabezana nazo zonke izidingo zakhe zemfundo, okubandakanya imali yezifundo, izincwadi, indawo yokuhlala kanye nokudla.

src: nga2017 mukhodiwa wa cala kuceceshelwa umsebe nti kumasipala wendzawo iprince albert kulitiko letemisebenti yemmango nese kela litiko.
tgt: ngowezi2017 umukhodiwa waqala uhlelo lokuqashwa okwesikhashana ngenhloso yokufundiswa umsebe nzi kumasipala wasekhaya iprince albert emnyangweni wezemisebenzi yokwesekwa komnyango kanye nompha kathi.

src: "kute kushiywa sikhatsi kangangobe ungete wafika lapho ufuna kufika khona e mphilweni.
tgt: "ungafinyelela lapho ofu na ukuya khona noma ku nini.

src: ufanele ku tsi wente konkhe lokuse mandleni akho kutsi untjintje simo sakho uphidze futsi u ntjintje timo takho tekuphi la," mukhodiwa.
tgt: kumele wenze konke okusemandleni ukushintsha izimo zakho futhi uthuthu kise izimo ophila ngaphansi kwazo," kusho umukhodiwa.

src: luhlelo lwebaphotfu li labancane lwemisa kwamanje lunebaphotfuli labange70, kufaka ekhatsi bahlelidolobha nebahlelisigodzi labange31, nabonjinela bagezi labange24, bonjinela betekwakha laba12 nebaphatsi labatsatfu betekwakha nemiklamo.
tgt: uhlelo lwabantu abasha abathweswe iziqu imisa lunabathweswe iziqu abangama70, okubandaka nya abahleli bomumo wama dolobha nezifunda abanga ma31, onjiniyela obuqodene nogesi abangama24, onjiniyela abaqondene nezokudwe ba, ukwakha nokulungisa okwakhiwe abayi12 kanye nabaphathi bamaphrojekthi nezinkontileka abathathu.

src: bonkhe bakubomasipala kuto tonke tifundza letiyimfica njengencenye yaloluhlelo.
tgt: bonke basingethwe omasipala kuzo zonke izifundazwe eziyisishiyagalolunye nje ngengxenye yohlelo.

src: libambela lesikhulu lesiphetse (iceo) semisa ntandazo vimba utsite lihhovisi lakhe liyasivisisa sidzingo lesikhulu sebantfu labanemakhono obunjinela newekwakha eningizimu afrika.
tgt: isikhulu esiphezulu (iceo) esiyibamba semisa unta ndazo vimba uthe ihhovisi lakhe liyaqonda ukuthi ini ngizimu afrika idinga kakhu lu abantu abanamakhono obunjiniyela nezokwakha.

src: "asifuni nje kuphela bantfu labasha labaneticu kule mikhakha, kepha sidzinga kucinisekisa kutsi batfola kuceceshwa lokusezingeni lemave emhlaba kantsi futsi batingcweti letibhalisiwe," kwasho vimba.
tgt: "asifuni abantu abasha abaneziqu kule mikhakha kuphela, kodwa kumele siqinisekise ukuthi baqeqe shwe ngendlela esezingeni lomhlaba futhi bangochwe pheshe ababhalisiwe," kusho uvimba.

src: "bomasipala betfu banesidzingo lesikhulu kakhu lu setingcweti.
tgt: "omasipala bethu baba dinga kakhulu ochwepheshe.

src: sinesibopho lesikhulu sekwenta hulumende wendzawo asebente ngebungcweti, ngemitamo yetfu yekuhlomisa tisebenti ngemakhono," wengeta.
tgt: sinomthwalo omkhulu wo kwenza uhulumeni wase khaya ube nochwepheshe, ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zethu zokuvukuza ama khono," esho engezela.

src: batali bafanele kutsi badlale indzi ma lenkhulu elukhetfweni lwesgb batali banelitfuba lekudlala indzima lehamba embili ekwenganyelweni kwetikolwa tahulumende ngenhloso yekwenta ncono emazinga nekwenta sikolwa sibe yindzawo lencono yebantfwana babo.
tgt: abazali bazobamba iqhaza okhethweni lwesgb abazali banethuba lokubamba iqhaza lobuholi ekulawulweni kokuphathwa kwezikole zikahulumeni ngenhloso yokuthuthukisa isimo kanye nokwenza isikole sabantwana babo sibe indawo engcono.

src: lukhetfo lwemti mba longamela siko lwa (isgb) lubanjwa ngendlovulenkhulu futsi batali bacelwa kutsi bahla nganyele kute kutsi badla le indzima lenemdlandla emfundvweni yebantfwana babo.
tgt: ukhetho lwesigungu esilawulwa uku phathwa kwesikole (isgb) lubanjwa kundasa futhi abazali banxuswa ukuthi bazibandakanye ukuze ba bambe iqhaza elibonakalayo emfundweni yezingane zabo.

src: lukhetfo lutawubanjwa kuto tonkhe tikolwa tahulumende kulo lonkhe lelive.
tgt: ukhetho luzobanjwa kuzo zonke izikole zikahulumeni ezweni lonkana.

src: indvuna yelitiko lete mfundvo lesisekelo angie motshekga utsi lolu lukhetfo lolukhulu kakhulu kulelive, ngaphandle kwelukhetfo lwahulumende wendzawo nelukhetfo lwavelonkhe.
tgt: ungqongqoshe weze mfundo eyisisekelo uangie motshekga uthe le yinqubo yokhetho enkulukazi ezweni, engaphandle kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya kanye no hulumeni kazwelonke.

src: "lukhetfo lwesgb lufaka sandla ekutfutfukeni umcondvo lonemandla webuniyo bemmango.
tgt: "ukhetho lwesgb lunegale lo ekutheni umphakathi uzi zwele ingumnikazi wendawo yawo.

src: kuse benta kwetikolwa kuvamise kuba ngulokuncono uma ngabe batali bahlanga nyela ngalokunemdlandla baphindze futsi banake netindzaba tesikolwa.
tgt: imiphumela yesikole ivame ukuba ngcono lapho abazali bezibandakanya ngokugcwele futhi benentshi sekelo ezindabeni zesikole.

src: "utsite isgb inendzima lenkhulu lefanele kutsi iyi dlale ekulinganiseni ti ntfo letifunwa ngubo bonkhe labatsintsekako kwesekela umgomo munye lofananako wekutfola imiphumela ye mfundvo lekahle lephendvu la tidzingo temmango neku tfutfuka kwemnotfo.
tgt: "amasgb anendima enku lu okumele ayidlale eku qinisekiseni ukuthi izidingo zabo bonke ababambiqhaza ziyahambelana, ngenhloso yokufezekisa injongo efanayo yokuzuza imiphumela yezemfundo emihle, ezo kwazi ukubhekelela izidi ngo zomphakathi kanye ne ntuthuko yezomnotho.

src: isgb imelela yonkhe imi khakha yesikolwa, kufa ka ekhatsi batali, bothi shela, tisebenti letingafu ndzisi nebafundzi.
tgt: isgb imele zonke izinhla ka zomphakathi wesikole, okubandakanya abazali, othisha, abasebenzi aba ngafundisi kanye nabafu ndi.

src: sikha tsi sekuba sesikhundleni sesgb yiminyaka lemitsa tfu.
tgt: isikhathi sokusebenza kwamalungu esgb siyimi nyaka emithathu.

src: emandla ekuphatfa sikolwa umtsetfo wetikolwa wase ningizimu afrika unika emasgb emandla labonaka lako ekwengamela tikolwa njengencenye yesakhi wo lesibalulekile sentsandvo yelinyenti.
tgt: amandla okulawula ukuphathwa kwezikole umthetho wezikole zaseningi zimu afrika unika isgb amandla alingene okulawula ukuphathwa kwezikole nje ngengxenye yezinhlaka zenta ndo yeningi labantu ezibalule kile.

src: ngekuhlanganyela kulenchubo yelukhetfo, batali bacinise kisa kutsi sikolwa sisebentela kahle kakhulu tintfo letifunwa bantfwana babo.
tgt: ngokubamba iqhaza enqu bweni yokhetho, abazali ba qinisekisa ukuthi isikole senza lokhu okuphumelelisa intshisekelo yezingane zabo ngendlela ephuma phambili.

src: nanoma nje emalunga esgb akadzingeki kutsi abe neticu temfundvo, batali labanema khono ekugcinweni kwema bhuku, ekubalweni kwetimali kanye nakutinsinta temtsetfo ikakhulu kanye nalabo labanesifiso, futsi labanenshisekelo ngemfundvo, bacelwa kutsi bacabange ngekungenela lolukhetfo.
tgt: yize amalungu esgb kungadingeki ukuthi abe neziqu ze mfundo, abazali abanamakhono okugcina amabhuku, ukuba la imali kanye nemisebenzi yezomthetho kanye nalabo abanentshisekelo, nabanotha ndo lwezemfundo banxuswa ukuthi bacabange ngokungenela ukhetho.

src: v laba labatsintsekako labalandzelako bangakhetfwa kutsi babe kusgb: batali bebantfwana labafundza kulesikolwa.
tgt: kungakhethwa ababambiqhaza abalandelayo ukuze bangene kusgb: abazali abanabantwana abafunda esikoleni.

src: bothishela labakulesikolwa.
tgt: othisha besikole.

src: tisebenti tesikolwa letingasibo bothishela.
tgt: abasebenzi basesikoleni abangasibo othisha.

src: bafundzi labasesikolweni semabanga laphakeme.
tgt: abafundi basikole samabanga aphezulu.

src: yini imisebenti yesgb?
tgt: iyini imisebenzi yesgb?

src: kuncuma inchubomgomo yekwemukela bafundzi esikolweni.
tgt: ukuthatha isinqumo ngenqubomgomo yokubhaliswa.

src: kuncuma inchubomgomo yelulwimi lolutawusetjentiswa esikolweni.
tgt: ukuthatha isinqumo ngenqubomgomo yolimi lwesikole.

src: kuncuma kutsi ngukuphi kwenkholo lokutawentiwa kulesikolwa.
tgt: ukuthatha isinqumo ngezinqubo zenkolo okumele zilandelwe esikoleni.

src: kwakha umtsetfosisekelo nemgomo wesikolwa.
tgt: ukwakha umthethosisekelo wesikole kanye nesitatimende somgomongqangi wesikole.

src: kwakha indlela yekutiphatsa lefanele yebafundzi lebeka tinchubo tekucondziswa kwetigwegwe.
tgt: ukwakha umgomo wokuziphatha.

src: kuphatfwa kwebhajethi netimali.
tgt: wabafundi owendlala izinqubo zokuqondisa izigwegwe.

src: liculo lesive, umjeka, imiklomelo yesive, siphandla sesive netimpawu tibungata kwehlukahlukana vukuzenzele unnamed kulenyanga kunelilanga lelibekelwe kubungata kucala kwenkululeko nentsandvo yelinyenti kanye netimphumelelo tabo bonkhe ba ntfu baseningizimu afrika le ticedza kutondzana, kungevani kanye netemlandvo lobuhlu ngu netekwakha likusasa lelifa nanako ngekubambisana.
tgt: ihubo lesizwe, iflegi, izindodo zesizwe, isiphandla sesizwe kanye nezimpawu zezwe kugubha ukwehlukahlukana vukuzenzele unnamed ngale nyanga kunosuku olubekelwe ukugubha ukufika kwenkululeko kanye nentando yeningi la bantu kanye nokuzuzwe yibo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ngokuphathelene noku suka enzondweni, ukwehluka na kanye nomlando obuhlungu ukuze sakhe ikusasa lethu sonke ndawonye.

src: vuk’uzenzele ibuka kubaluleka kwalolusuku nekutsi lisho kutsi ni kitsi sibantfu baseningizimu afrika.
tgt: ivuk’uzenzele ibheka ukubaluleka kwalolu suku nokuthi luchaza ukuthini kithina bantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: mhla ti27 kumabasa 1994 ini ngizimu afrika yabamba lukhe tfo lwayo lwekucala lwentsandvo yelinyenti.
tgt: mhla zingama27 kumbasa ngowe1994 iningizimu afrika yaba nokhetho lokuqa la lwentando yeningi laba ntu olungacwasi ngokwebala.

src: hulumende lomusha wakhetfwa ngaphansi kwebuholi bamengameli lowasishiya nelson mandela.
tgt: kwakhethwa uhulumeni omusha owawuholwa umongameli ongasekho unelson mandela.

src: kuningi lese kuzuziwe kuleminyaka, kodvwa kuningi lekusafuneka kwentiwe kutfutfukisa live letfu nekuntji ntja timphilo tabo bonkhe bantfu baseningizimu afrika.
tgt: kuningi osekuzuziwe eminya keni edlule, kodwa kuningi oku sadinga ukuthi kwenziwe ukuze kwenziwe ngcono izwe lethu futhi kuguqulwe nezimpilo zabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: lenyanga yamabasa ayibuki kuphela kutsi sichamuka kuphi silive, kodvwa isikhatsi lapho iningizimu afrika ibungata emacawe nemacawekati ayo ngekuwaklomelisa ngemiklomelo yesive.
tgt: le nyanga kambasa akuyona kuphela eyokuthi sibheke ukuthi sesizuzeni njengezwe, ko dwa yisikhathi futhi lapho ini ngizimu afrika igubha khona amaqhawe kanye namaqhawekazi ayo ngokuwanikeza izi ndondo zezwe.

src: loku miklomelo lesezingeni lelisetulu kakhulu leniketwa ngulelive, ngumengameli, aniketa takhamuti talelive nebantfu bemave angaphandle labahlonishwa kakhulu.
tgt: lokhu ukuklo nyeliswa ngezindondo okusez ingeni eliphezulu kakhulu izwe, ngomongameli walo, elikwazi ukuziklomelisa izakhamuzi zalo kanye nabahlonishwa abavela emazweni angaphandle.

src: umtsetfosisekelo waseningizimu afrikaumtsetfosisekelo wabhalwa ngekulandzela sigaba 5 semtsetfo sisekelo wesikhashana (umtsetfo 200 wemnyaka we1993) lowacala kuvunywa mkhandlu wemtsetfosisekelo mhla ti8 inkhwekhweti 1996. wasayinwa waba ngumtsetfo mhla ti10 ingongoni 1996. timpawu tetfu tesive iningizimu afrika yehlukile ku lamanye emave ngenca yekutsi singabungata kuhlukahlukana kwetfu ngekusebentisa timpawu tesive kanye nemjeka sesive, liculo lesive saseningizimu afrika kanye nesiphandla sesive.
tgt: umthethosisekelo waseningizimu afrika umthethosisekelo wabhalwa ngokuphathelene nesigaba 5 somthethosisekelo wesikhashana (umthetho 200 we1993) futhi wemukelwa okokuqala yisigu ngu somthethosisekelo mhla ziyi8 kunhlaba 1996. wasayinwa waba ngumthetho mhla ziyi10 kuzi bandlela 1996. izimpawu zethu zezwe iningizimu afrika ihlukile ngenxa yokuthi siyakwazi ukugubha ukwehlukahluka kwethu ngezi mpawu zezwe kanye neflegi lesi zwe, ihubo lesizwe laseningizimu afrika kanye nesiphandla sesizwe.

src: umjeka weningizimu afrika uhlukile.
tgt: iflegi laseningizimu afrika lihlukile.

src: wadvwetjwa ngilowo bekasisebenti sekusungulwa kwetiphandla tesive, isouth a frican state herald, fred brownell, wacala kusetjentiswa mhla ti27 mabasa 1994. lemibala yalomjeka ayisho lutfo ngakoke akukho kumelelwa kwetintfo tsite temhlaba leticondzaniswa nalemibala yalomjeka.
tgt: ladizayinwa istate he rald saseningizimu afrika, ufred brownell, futhi laqalwa ukuse tshenziswa ngomhla zingama27 kumbasa we1994.

src: kuphakamisa umjeka uma lomjeka ubekwe ngaloku vundlile ebondzeni, umbala lobovu kufanele ube sesincele saloyo lobukako bese kutsi lapho ucunyekwa khona kube ngenhla.
tgt: imibala yeflegi ayinancazelo ethile ngakhoke akukho ngqikithi jikelele okumele iyamaniswe nemibala yeflegi.

src: uma ubekwe wema wabuka etulu, loko locunyekwa ngako kufanele kube sesandleni sesincele saloyo lobukako bese kutsi umbala lobovu ube setulu.
tgt: u‘v’ eflegini ukhombisa uku hlangana kwabantu abahlukene baseningizimu afrika kanye nokuthatha indlela ephambi kwethu ndawonye ngobunye.

src: uma umjeka ubekwe eceleni noma emuva kwalokhulumako, kufanele ubekwe ecaleni lesekudla laloyo lokhulumako.
tgt: ukundizisa iflegi uma iflegi limiswa liqondane nodonga, indawo ebomvu kumele ibe kwesokunxele solibukayo bese umphetho wentambo ube ngaphezulu.

src: uma ubekwe kulenye indzawo lapho kunemhlangano khona, kufanele ube ngasesandleni sekudla salabo labahleli phansi labalalelako.
tgt: uma limiswe lavundla, umphetho wentambo kumele ube kwesokunxele solibukayo bese u mbala obomvu uba phezulu.

src: siphandla sesive siphandla sesive, lephindze satiwe ngekutsi liphawu lesive, siluphawu lolukhulu lolugcamile lwesive.
tgt: uma iflegi libekwe eduze noma ngemva kwesikhulumi emhla nganweni, kumele libe kwesokudla sesikhulumi.

src: idokhumenti lenesingcivito se sive ibaluleke kakhulu ikhomba emandla ekuphatsa lamakhulu, loku kuchaza kutsi ivunywe ngumengameli weningizimu afrika.
tgt: uma libekwe kwenye indawo endaweni okuhlanganye lwe kuyo kumele libekwe kwe sokudla sezethameli.

src: siphandla sesive saseningizi mu afrika sasungulwa ngelusu ku lwenkhululeko ngemnyaka we2000.
tgt: isiphandla sezwe isiphandlwa sezwe, siphinde sazi we ngokuthi uphawu lombuso, si wuphawu lombuso olubonakalayo olusezingeni eliphezulu kakhulu.

src: tintfo letikuso tihlelwe ngendlela lekhombisa kusimama nekubaluleka lokukhulu.
tgt: isiphandla sezwe siyingxe nye esemqoka yophawu le zwe olukhulu.

src: kulwa nesomiso lesikhulu vukuzenzele unnamed njengaloku somiso sesifinyelele emazingeni lapho se kunenkinga lenkhulu enya katfo kapa nasemphuma langa kapa, lapho emazinga emanti emadamu kumasipa la welidolobhakati wasenel son mandela bay asangem aphesenti lange25 kuphela, sesikhatsi nyalo sekutsi bantfu baseningizimu afrika ba bumbane bonge lamanti layi mvelakancane nalaligugu.
tgt: ukulwisana nesomiso esikhulu vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba isomiso se sifinyelele emazi ngeni amabi kakhulu enyakatho kapa kanye nase mpumalanga kapa, lapho amazinga amadamu kumkha ndludolobha inelson man dela bay metropolitan mu nicipality engamaphesenti angama25, sekuyisikhathi sokuba izakhamuzi zase ningizimu afrika zibumbane ukuze zonge leli gugu eliyive la kancane.

src: somiso sikhatsi lesidze sekuna kwemvula lencane kakhulu lokuholela ekutseni kuswelakale emanti.
tgt: isomiso siyisikhathi eside lapho izimvula ziyivela kancane, okwenza kuntuleke amanzi.

src: ngekusho kwadkt.
tgt: ngokusho kukadkt mathieu roualt, ongusolwazi enyuvesi yasekapa emnyangweni wezi fundo eziphathelene nolwandle ioceanography, uthi okuyiyona mbangela yesomiso wumthelela weel niño nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

src: "iel niño sehlakalo semvelo lesenteka ngetikhatsi letitsite lesibuya njalo emva kweminya ka lemitsatfu kuya kulesihlanu futsi singahlala iminyaka lemi bili.
tgt: "iel niño yisikhathi esizifike la ngokwemvelo njalo emva kweminyaka emithathu kuya kwemihlanu, futhi singaqhube ka kuze kuphele iminyaka emi bili.

src: lesimo senyusa emazinga ekushisa elwandle ipacific kanye nelwandle lwasendiya, loko kubese kubangela kutsi kube netimo tesomiso," kwasho yena njalo.
tgt: sinyusa amazinga okushisa nokubanda olwandle ipacific neindian, okuyinto engadala isomiso," ngokusho kwakhe.

src: kugucuka kwesimo selitulu kuchazwa njengekuntjintja kwetimo telitulu mhlaba wo nkhe nome esifundzeni, lokuyi ntfo leyacala emkhatsini kwaya ngasekupheleni kwemnya kalikhulu we20 kubangwa kakhulu kwenyuka kwemazi nga esikhutsa emoyeni lesikhi citeka uma kusetjentiswa emafutsa emvelo.
tgt: ukuguquguquka kwesimo se zulu kuchazwa njengoshintsho esimweni sezulu somhlaba jike lele noma ezifundeni, okwaqala maphakathi nenyakakhulu lama20 kuya ngasekupheleni kwalo futhi lokhu kungumphu mela wokuphakama kwamazi nga esikhutha emkhathini okubangelwa wukusetshenzi swa kwezibaseli.

src: "kuleminyaka lelikhulu leye ngcile iafrika lengaseningi zimu ibukene nekugucuka kwesimo selitulu iminyaka ngeminyaka, lokuholele eso misweni lesikhulu kanye ne kutsikameteka tindlela teku hlalisana kwetintfo letiphilako taselwandle kanye netase mhlabatsini.
tgt: "kuleli nyakakhulu eledlule isifunda esiseningizimu ne afrika sikhahlanyezwe wukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu unyaka nonyaka, okuholele eso misweni esinamandla esesiphazamise impilo yezinto eziphila emhla beni nasolwandle kanye nempilo yabantu.

src: letingucuko tine mtselela lomubi etimbonini tekulima, kutilondvolotama nti nasetinhlantini kanyeke nemnotfo ngebubanti bawo.
tgt: lolu guquko lunomthelela ongemuhle kwezolimo, imithombo yamanzi nakwezokudoba futhi kanjalo nasemnothweni wonkana.

src: tiphindze futsi tibe nemtselela lomubi ekugeleteni kwemanti emifuleni kanye nasetitfonjeni temvelo kanye nekungena elwa ndle kudla lokungumsoco ," kuchaza yena njalo dkt.
tgt: kuphinde kube nomthelela ongemuhle ekugelezeni kwemifudlana nezakhimpilo ezingena olwa ndle," kuchaza udkt roualt.

src: lemitselela lemibi ivakala kakhulu eningizimu afrika ngobe live letfu linemvula lencane ngemnyaka lelinga niselwa kuavareji yemamilili tha lange450, nakucatsaniswa neavareji yemhlaba wonkhe lengemamililitha lange860.
tgt: lo mthelela uzwela kakhulu eningizimu afrika ngoba izwe lethu libhekene nokuntuleka kwezimvula, esezehle nga mamililitha (ml) angama450 ngonyaka, uma kuqhathaniswa nesilinganiso somhlaba esinga ma860 ml.

src: yini imitselela lemibi yesomiso?
tgt: uyini umthelela wesomiso?

src: ngendlovulencane, litiko letekubusa ngekuhla nganyela netendzabuko (icogta) basihlela kabusha batsi lesomiso asisasiyo inhlekelele yesifundza kuphela kepha seyinhlekelele yavelonkhe.
tgt: ngonhlolanja, umnyango we zokusebenzisana kohulumeni kanye nezindaba zendabuko (icogta) ukhuphule izinga lenhlekelele yesomiso lisuka kwelenhlekelele yesifundazwe walibeka ezingeni lenhlekelele kazwelonke.

src: "ngemuva kwekuhlola futsi bukhulu nemtse lela lomubi kakhulu walesomiso lesichu bekako, lesesichu bekele kulokungenani etifundzeni letintsatfu, labalawula tinhlekele le baphindze futsi basihlela kabusha lesomiso batsi sesiyi nhlekelele yavelonkhe nyalo," kwasho inhloko yesikhungo savelonkhe lesilawula tinhle kelele, dkt.
tgt: "ngemuva kokucubungula kabusha izinga nobukhulu balesi somiso esiqhubekayo esesihlasele okungenani izifu ndazwe ezintathu, abenga mele izinhlekelele babeke lesi somiso esigabeni senhlekelele kazwelonke," ngokusho kwenhloko yesikhungo esengamele izinhlekelele zikazwelonke, udkt mmaphaka tau.

src: nanome nje kulukhuni kukala imitselela lemibi yalesomiso emnotfweni, kodvwa kube nemtselela lomkhulu lomubi emkhakheni kwetekulima.
tgt: nakuba kusenzima uku wukala umthelela wesomiso kwezomnotho, sekube nomkhu lu umthelela emkhakheni wezolimo.

src: enshonalanga kapa, loku sifundza sesibili lesikhicita kakhulu kutekulima talelive, kwaphela imisebenti lelinga niselwa kule21 000 ekoteni ye sitsatfu kulomnyaka lophelile.
tgt: entshonalanga kapa, okuyisifundazwe sesibili ngobukhulu esifaka isandla emkhiqizweni ophelele wezwe ohlangothini lwezolimo, ilinga niselwa ezi21 000 imisebenzi elahlekile ngekota yesithathu yonyaka odlule.

src: kukhicitwa kwakolo kwehla ngemaphesenti lange47 nga2017 loko kungabanga kushoda kwemalitha latigidzi letinge90 eliwayini langatsengiselwa emave angephandle kumbe khona lapha eveni.
tgt: umkhiqizo kakolweni wehle ngamaphese nti angama47 ngowezi2017 fu thi kuzoba nokushoda okunga malitha ayizigidi ezingama90 ewayini kumkhiqizo othengiswa emazweni angaphandle kanye nangaphakathi kuleli.

src: kweswelakala kwemanti kutawuba nemtselela lomubi ekuhanjisweni kwekungcola ngemanti, ekunakekeleni te mphilo kanye netekuvakasha.
tgt: ukushoda kwamanzi kuzoba nomthelela ongemuhle kwezo kuthuthwa kwendle, ezempilo nezokuvakasha.

src: yini lokwentiwako kute kubukanwe nalesimo?
tgt: yini eyenziwayo ukuhlangabezana nalesi simo?

src: iapp yetigitjelwa temmango tasegauteng vukuzenzele unnamed litiko lasegauteng le temigwaco nekutfutsa letfule iapp yamakhe lekhikhini, leyatiwa ngekut si pheceleti yigauteng on the move, kute luhlelo lwetitfutsi temmango lwente kutsi bagibeli bachumane netindlela tekutfu tsa letahlukahlukene ngapha ndle kwenkinga.
tgt: iapp yezokuthutha egauteng vukuzenzele unnamed umnyango wezemi gwaqo nezoku thutha egauteng usuqale uhlelokusebenza lwezokuthutha, olubizwa ngegauteng on the move, ohlelweni lwawo lokuthutha umphakathi olusiza umpha kathi ukuxhumana nezinhlobo zokuthutha ezihlukahlukene, ngaphandle kwezihibe.

src: igauteng on the move itawususa kungabata loku khona nawusebentisa titfutsi temmango, ngobe inika bagibeli lwatiso mbamba lwesikhatsi, ishejuli yesigitjelwa kanye neti ndleko tekuhamba ngegautrain‚ metrobus‚ a re yeng‚ rea vaya‚ metrorail‚ ngegautrain bus ser vices‚ johannesburg city sight seeing bus‚ tshwane bus services kanye netinsita tematekisi.
tgt: igauteng on the move wu hlelo oluqeda ungabazane nokudideka okuhambisana nokusetshenziswa kwezithuthi zomphakathi, njengoba luni keza umphakathi imininingwa ne eqondile futhi esheshayo mayelana nezikhathi zokuha mba kwezithuthi zomphakathi kanye nezindleko zegautrain, metrobus, a re yeng, rea vaya, metrorail, amabhasi egautrain, amabhasi ejohannesburg city sightseeing, amabhasi kama sipala wasetshwane kanye namatekisi.

src: akhuluma ngesikhatsi kwe tfulwa leapp ehhovisi lalabo labayisungulile lelisemidrand esikhatsini lesisandza kwendlu la, indvuna yetekutfutsa ye sifundza sasegauteng ismail vadi utsite litiko lisibonile vele sidzingo sekutsi kube khona tebuchwepheshe letihlakaniphile kanye neluhlelo lwetekutfutsa loluhlakaniphile njengalokufaka ligalelo ekutfutfukisweni kwete kutfutsa.
tgt: ekhuluma ngesikhathi kwe thulwa lolu hlelokusebenza emahhovisi abasunguli balo emidrand, umec wezoku thutha egauteng uismail vadi uthe umnyango uyasibona isidingo sezobuchwepheshe no hlelo oluphusile kwezokuthutha oluzobamba iqhaza ekuthuthu kisweni kohlelo lwezokuthutha.

src: "hulumende wesifundza sasegauteng wente lutjalotimali lwesikhatsi sakhe, lwemitamo kanye nemitfombolusito ekwakh iweni kwalesihleliluhambo kute kutsi kubelula kutsi bagibeli bakhone kuchumana lula netinhlobo tetitfutsi letinkhulu talesifundza.
tgt: "uhulumeni wesifunda zwe sasegauteng unikele ngesikhathi, imizamo nezi nsiza ukuthuthukisa lolu hlelo lwezokuthutha olusiza umpha kathi ukwazi ukuxhumana kalula nezinhlobo zokuthu thwa komphakathi ezahlukene esifundazweni.

src: "sesivele siyawabona emandla etebuchwepheshe bekucamba lokusha lahlela kabusha tigi tjelwa temmango.
tgt: ""sesiqalile ukubona amandla ezobuchwepheshe eguqula isimo sezinsizakalo zokuthu thwa komphakathi.

src: kute kunga bata kutsi tingucuko tebuchwe pheshe emhlabeni wonkhe ticala tingucuko letinkhulu emkhakheni wetekutfutsa te mmango, natsi kufanele kutsi sitemukele futsi sititayele leti ngucuko," kwasho yena njalo.
tgt: akukho ukungabaza ukuthi ushintsho lwezobuchwepheshe emhlabe ni jikelele seluqalise uguquko olukhulukazi emkhakheni we zokuthutha, futhi nathi kumele siguquke ukuze sihambisane nalezi zinguquko," kusho yena.

src: vadi ucinisekise kutsi sifundza sitawuchubeka ngekusebentisa umcondvo lomusha, lucwaningo kanye nentfutfuko kugcugcutela kutsi kube nesifundza lesenta tintfo ngekuhlakanipha kute kube nemphumelelo nekufinyelela ti nsita tetigitjelwa.
tgt: uvadi uqinisekisile ukuthi isifundazwe sizoqhubeka noku sebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, ucwaningo nentuthuko ukuthuthukisa isifundazwe esisebenzisa ezobu chwepheshe esizophucula futhi senze kube lula ukufinyelela kwezokuthutha.

src: nasebayidvonsile kuin thanethi, leapp itawusita labo labayisebentisako kutsi bahlele luhambo lwabo ngekutsi bakhe tse indlela yekuhamba laba yifunako, sikhatsi sekuhamba kanye nalokunye labangakhetsa kuko, njengeluhambo lolufisha nalolushiphe kakhuluumfundzi wasejohannesburg nalomunye webagibeli glen dlamini batsi leapp itakwenta tinkhulungwane tebagibeli kutsi bangasakhatsateki nabafuna kuhamba.
tgt: uma ‘seludawunilodiwe’ lolu hlelokusebenza, luzobasiza abalusebenzisayo ukuhlela uhambo lwabo ngokuthi bakhethe uhlobo lwezoku thutha abaludingayo, izikhathi zokuhamba nokunye, njengo kuqoka uhambo olufushane nolusheshayo futhi olungambi eqolo.

src: "impela lena yiapp lemanga lisako sibili.
tgt: "lolu wuhlelokusebe nza olumangazayo impela.

src: ingumtamo lo mkhulu wahulumende futsi ita tintjintja timphilo ikakhulu teba ntfu labasha njengami labahamba basuka esoweto baya enyuvesi yasejohannesburg eauckland park malanga onkhe.
tgt: luwuhlelo oluhle kakhulu oluqaliswe nguhulumeni futhi akungabazeki nakancane uku thi luzosiguqula isimo sezinto, ikakhulukazi kubantu abasha njengami abagibela izithuthi zomphakathi nsuku zonke besuka esoweto belibangise enyuvesi yasegoli eauckland park.

src: "lokungenani njalo sengitawu khona kuhlela luhambo lwami ncono, macondzana netimali, kanye nekubala sikhatsi sekuha mba lengitasitsatsa sekuya lapho ngifuna kuya khona.
tgt: ""okungenani manje sengiya kwazi ukuhlela uhambo lwami kangcono, ngokwemali engi nayo, futhi ngenze nesilinganiso sezikhathi zokuhamba ngize ngifike lapho ngiphokophele khona.

src: "ngicabanga kutsi leapp iyamangalisa sibili nekutsi mine njengemuntfu lengi ngasuye walesifundza, itangisita kakhulu nangifuna kutiyela lapho ngifuna kuya khona," kwasho kha nyo malunga ngesikhatsi acocisa na nevuk’uzenzele eblairgowrie.
tgt: ""ngicabanga ukuthi lolu wu hlelokusebenza olumangazayo impela futhi njengomuntu ongeyena owokudabuka ku lesi sifundazwe, luzongisiza kakhulu uma kufanele ngiha mbe ngezithuthi zomphakathi," kusho ukhanyo malunga, ngesikhathi ekhuluma no vuk’uzenzele eblairgowrie.

src: "nangabe ngite lapha ngitele luhlolokhono lwemsebenti, ngi tawukhona kuhlela ncono kanye nekwati kutfola indlela," kweng eta yena.
tgt: "uma ngize lapha ngizokwe nza inhlolokhono, ngizokwazi ukuhlela kangcono futhi ngazi nendlela yami kanye nokuthi ngiyaphi," kwengeza yena.

src: lusha luyalwemukela luhlelo lweyes vukuzenzele unnamed masego temane uyatfokota ku tsi atfole lwati lwemsebenti, lolutawuha mbisana neticu takhe tedi ploma yehuman resource management, njengalongene lele kuletinsita tekucashwa kwelusha (iyes).
tgt: intsha iyalisekela uhlelo lweyes vukuzenzele unnamed umasego temane une ntokozo enkulu yo kuthola isipiliyoni somsebenzi, esihambela na neziqu zakhe zediplo ma yehuman resource ma nagement, njengombambi qhaza ohlelweni lokuqa shwa kwentsha (iyes).

src: yes, lesandza kuvulwa ngu mengameli cyril ramapho sa, ihlose kulungiselela lusha kutsi batfole umsebenti iba nikete emakhono ebuchwe pheshe ladzingekako kute kuciniswe ku tfutfukiswa kwemno tfo.
tgt: iyes, esanda kwethulwa ngumongameli cyril rama phosa, ihlose ukulungiselela abantu abasha umsebenzi kanye nokubahlinzeka nga makhono emicikilisho edinge kayo ukuze kwakhiwe umno tho othuthukisa izimboni.

src: temane uyachaza kweku tsi ngemuva kwekutfola ticu nga2016 akazange akhone kufaka ticelo temsebenti ngoba bekangenalo lwati lwemsebenti loludzingeka ko.
tgt: utemane uyachaza ukuthi emva kokuphothula iziqu zakhe ngowezi2016 akakwa zanga ukufaka izicelo zomse benzi ngoba wayengenaso isi piliyoni somsebenzi esifanele.

src: "bekulukhuni kufuna umse benti ngaphandle kwekuba nelwati lwemsebenti.
tgt: "kwakulukhuni kakhulu ukufuna umsebenzi ngapha ndle kwesipiliyoni.

src: nge nhlahla ngahlangabetana ne lulaway recruitment age ncy lesebentisana neyes, kantsi banginiketa litfuba lokufundzela umsebenti e msebentini, iinternship.
tgt: nge nhlanhla ngenkathi ngi hlangana nabakwalulaway recruitment agency abase benzisana nohlelo lweyes, banginikeza ithuba lokuthola isipiliyoni emsebenzini.

src: "iyes ingumtamo loyinhla nganisela wahulumende, ti nhlangano tetisebenti nema bhizinisi kutsi banikete ba ntu labasha baseningizimu afrika labasigidzi misebenti lekhokhelwayo kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako.
tgt: "uhlelo lweyes umzamo ohlanganyelwe kahulumeni, abasebenzi kanye nabama bhizinisi ukuze bahlinze ke ngamathuba esipiliyoni somsebenzi akhokhelwayo entsheni yaseningizimu afrika eyisigidi kulesi sikha thi seminyaka emithathu ezayo.

src: lucwaningo lolwenti we lukhombisa kutsi lwati lwemsebenti lwemnyaka munye lolubhala kucv , nencwadzi yereferensi, ku tfutfukisa ematfuba emuntfu lomusha ekutfola umsebenti emahlandla lamatsatfu.
tgt: ucwaningo oluqhutshiwe ngababambiqhaza luveza ukuthi unyaka nje owodwa wesipiliyoni somsebenzi kucv , nencwadi ewubufakazi ngamakhono nolwazi lomu ntu (ireference letter), kwenyu sa amathuba okuthola komu ntu umsebenzi ngokuphindwe kathathu.

src: temane ungete ngekutsi uyawutsandza umsebenti wakhe, ikakhulukati ngoba usita lolunye lusha kutfo la imisebenti njengoba ayi intern lecashako.
tgt: utemane wengeze ngoku thi uyawuthanda umsebenzi wakhe, ikakhulukazi ngoba uphinde athole ithuba loku siza abantu abasha ukuze bathole imisebenzi njengo ba phela enza umsebenzi njengemfundamakhwela eqa sha abantu.

src: ngalesikhatsi kuvulwa iyes mengameli rama phosa watiswa kulabantfu labasha bekucala laba100 labatawube bacashwe yi absa, investec, netcare, sasol neunilever ngaphansi kwa loluhlelo.
tgt: ekwethulweni kohlelo lweyes umongameli ramapho sa waboniswa abantu abasha bokuqala abayi100 abazoqa shwa ngalolu hlelo ngaba kwaabsa, investec, netcare, sasol nabakwaunilever.

src: "lomtamo siwubona njengesisekelo sinye save lonkhe lesikhulu nalesifa ka ekhatsi konkhe lesizama kwakha ematfuba elusha.
tgt: "sibona leli cebo njenge nsika eyodwa ewumzamo ka zwelonke obanzi nodidiyelwe ukuze kudalwe amathuba kubantu abasha.

src: lesinye sisekelo lesise mkhatsini ngulokutfutfu kiswa kwalamakhono nelwa ti lwelusha," kusho menga meli ramaphosa.
tgt: enye insi ka ukuthuthukiswa kwama khono nolwazi lwabantu abasha," kusho umongameli ramaphosa.

src: ucele bosomabhizinisi la basebancane kutsi badlale indzima yabo njengoba bane tikhala letinyenti temsebenti washo nekutsi emabhizinisi lamakhulu angeke akhona kutsatsa lusha lolwanele awodvwa.
tgt: ucele abamabhizinisi ase mancane ukuba nabo badlale eyabo indima njengoba bena bantu abaningi ababaqashayo waphinde wathi amabhizinisi amakhulu akakwazi ukumu matha intsha eyanele wodwa.

src: ngekusho kwaceo weyes tashmia ismailsaville, kubantfu labatigidzi leti ngu15.5 eningizimu afrika labaneminyaka yebudzala lesemkhatsini we18 ne34, tigidzi letingu5.8 abase benti.
tgt: ngokusho kwesikhulu esi phethe (iceo) iyes uta shmia ismailsaville, phaka thi kwabantu abayizigidi ezi li15.5 eningizimu afrika abaneminyaka ephakathi kwe yi18 nengama34, abayizigidi eziyi5.8 abasebenzi.

src: "iyes ihlose kuniketa leyo ncenye yelusha lwetfu, leba nganakwa nguletindlela le kucashwa ngato kwanyalo kulelive, litfuba lekucala lekutfola umsebenti losezi ngeni lelisetulu nalokahle kanye nelwati lwemsebenti babe bakhokhelwa," kusho ismailsaville.
tgt: "uhlelo lweyes luhlose ukunikeza leyo ngxenye ya bantu abasha baleli, abanga nakwa kakhulu yimigomo yamanje yokuqasha ezweni, ithuba lokuqala elibalulekile lokuzuza isipiliyoni somse benzi weqophelo eliphezulu, okhokhelwayo," kusho ui smailsaville.

src: njengenzuzo lengetiwe kumabhizinisi lasemanca ne, labo labacasha bantfu labasha labamnyama, la baneminyaka yebudzala lesemkhatsini we18 ne29, batawulungela kutsi bazuze sibonelelo semtselo weku casha lesilingana nar1 000 ngenyanga.
tgt: umhuhiso owengeziwe kwabamabhizinisi asemanca ne, labo abaqasha abantu abasha abaneminyaka yobu dala ephakathi kweyi18 kuya kwengama29, bazofaneleka izaphulelo zentela zokuqa sha ezilingana ner1 000 nge nyanga.

src: lusha lweyes kufanele: lube neminyaka le18 ne34 budzala.
tgt: abantu abasha bohlelo lweyes kufanele babe: neminyaka yobudala ephakathi kweyi18nengama34.

src: bangasebenti sikhatsi lesindlula tinyanga letisitfupha.
tgt: ukuthi bebangasebe nzi isikhathi sezinyanga eziyisithupha.

src: kube ngulabamnyama (labamnyama bomdza bu, emakhaladi noma emandiya).
tgt: abantu abamnyama (owomdabu, oyikhala di noma oyindiya).

src: uma kwenteka tinka pani tifisa kutfola sibo nelelo semtselo weku casha, lolusha kufanele lube neminyaka lese mkhatsini we18 ne29.
tgt: uma kwenzeka izi nkampani zifuna uku faka isicelo sesaphule lo sentela sokuqasha, intsha kufanele kube ineminyaka yobuda la ephakathi kweyi18 nengama29.

src: lolusha lutawuhola malini?
tgt: ingabe izohola malini le ntsha?

src: kunelulwimi lolusemtsetfweni lolusha loluhlongotwako eningizimu afrika neo semono ikhelobedu ingahle ibe lulwimi loluse mtsetfweni lwema12 eningizimu afrika ngenca yekuhambisana nekubuyi swa kwesitfunti sebaholi bendzabuko.
tgt: iningizimu afrika kungenzeka ibe nolimi olusemthethweni olusha neo semono ikhelobedu ingaphe nduka ulimi lwe12 olusemthethweni eni ngizimu afrika ngokuha mbisana nohlelo lokubuyise la isithunzi sabaholi benda buko.

src: mengameli cyril rama phosa wente lesimeme telo ngalesikhatsi semci mbi wekubeka indlovukati yebalobedu emokwakwa ila stadium ebolobedu, gamodjadji elimpopo.
tgt: umongameli cyril rama phosa wenze lesi simemezelo ngesikhathi sokugcotshwa kwendlovukazi yesizwe sabalobedu enkundleni yezemidlalo imokwakwai la ebolobedu, egamodjadji elimpopo.

src: ikhelobedu lulwimi lolukhulunywa sive seba lobedu lapho khona, masala nabo modjadji oyindlovuka ti yelitulu lengakabekwa leneminyaka leli13 budzala, atawutsatsa lesihlalo nakaba neminyaka le18, ngemuva kwekutsi abekwe njenge ndlovukazi modjadji vii.
tgt: ikhelobedu ulimi olukhu lunywa uhlanga lwaba lobedu indlovukazi yemvula yabalobedu ene minyaka eyi13, umasalana bo modjadji, ezobabusa lapho isineminyaka eyi18, emva kokubekwa njengendlo vukazi modjadji wesivii.

src: utawuphotfula ngekuha mbisana nemihambo nemasiko esive sebalobedu.
tgt: uzothweswa iziqu nje ngokwezinqubo namasiko abalobedu.

src: "loku yincophamlandvo mama winnie madikize lamandela bekatatigcabha ngayo.
tgt: "le yinqubekelapha mbili eyingqophamlando wangempela umama wi nnie madikizelamandela obengaziqhenya ngawo.

src: lesi sihlalo sekuca la futsi ngiso sodvwa sebu ndlovukati kulelive nakule livekati," kusho mengameli ramaphosa.
tgt: lesi yisihlalo sendlovuka zi sokuqala nokuwukuphela kwaso ezweni nasezwenika zi lonkana," kusho umonga meli ramaphosa.

src: mengameli ramapho sa ubuye wacinisekisa ku tinikela kwahulumende ekubuyiseleni kuhlonipha nesitfunti sebuholi bendza buko.
tgt: umongameli ramaphosa uphinde waqinisekisa uku zibophezela kukahulumeni ekubuyiselweni kwesithu nzi nenhlonipho kubaholi bendabuko.

src: bukhosi besive sebalobedu bamukelwe ngalokusemtse tfweni ngenyanga yendlovu lenkhulu nga2016 ngemuva kwekutsi icommission on traditional leadership di sputes and claims (ict ldc) yenta lucwaningo ngesimo sesive sebalobedu, ngekusho kwaticelo letile tfwe kuctldc.
tgt: isihlalo sendlovukazi ya balobedu saqala ukwaziwa ngokusemthethweni ngonda sa wezi2016 emva kokuba ikhomishani yezicelo nezi ngxabano zobuholi benda buko (ictldc) iqhube ucwaningo odabeni lwaba lobedu, njengokwezicelo ezalethwa phambi kwect ldc.

src: "hulumende utinikele ekuphumeleliseni letigaba temtsetfo tesahluko se12 kumtsetfosisekelo, ikakhu lukati lokubuyiswa kwesi tfunti salesikhungo sebuho li bendzabuko embusweni wentsandvo yelunyenti loho lwa ngemtsetfosisekelo," ku sho mengameli ramaphosa.
tgt: "uhulumeni uzibophezele ekuphumeleliseni imibande la yesahluko 12 somthetho sisekelo, ikakhulukazi ukubuyiselwa kwesithu nzi sobuholi bendabu ko bonkana entandweni yeningi labantu ehambisana nomthethosisekelo," kusho umongameli ramaphosa.

src: utsite kuvunyelwa ko muntfu losikati kutsi abekwe njengendlovukati eningi zimu afrika kukhombi sa kutinikela kulomgomo wekulingana ngekwebulili, ngalesikhatsi kubuye kuna kwe lendzima yebuholi ledla lwa bomake kuyo yonkhe imi khakha yemphilo.
tgt: uthe ukwaziswa kwesi hlalo sezindlovukazi eni ngizimu afrika kukho mbisa ukuzibopheze la emgomweni nokwa ziswa kokuphathwa ngokulingana kobulili bonke, ngale nkathi kube kwaziswa nendima yobu holi edlalwa ngabesifazane kuzo zonke izingxenye ze mpilo.

src: "baholi bendzabuko banendzima lebalulekile le kufanele bayidlale ekwa kheni ummango longenabu phuya, longenako kuswe lakala kwemsebenti na lonekulingana.
tgt: "abaholi bendabuko banendima ebalulekile okufanele bayidlale uku ze kwakhiwe izwe eli ngenabubha, ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi nokuphathwa kwabantu ngokulinganayo.

src: baholi betfu bendzabuko kudzingeka ku tsi bahambe phambili eku lweni nekubuyisela emalu ngelo nesitfunti sebantfu ba kitsi."
tgt: abaholi bethu bendabuko badinga ukuba phambili kulo mzabalazo wokubu yisela amalungelo nesithu nzi kubantu bethu.

src: uchubeke wagcizelela lokubaluleka kwalendzima ledlalwe baholi bendzabuko ekubuyiseni umhlaba kubani kati lebafanele.
tgt: "uqhubeke wagcizelela ukubaluleka kwendima e dlalwa ngabaholi bendabu ko ekubuyiseleni umhlaba kubanikazi abafanele.

src: "badzinga kucinisekisa kwekutsi umhlaba ubuyise lwa kulabo labawusebe ntako kantsi labo labatawu niketwa umhlaba kufanele babe netindlela tekuwusebe nta," kusho mengameli rama phosa.
tgt: "badinga ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umhlaba ubuyise lwa kulabo abawuse benzayo kanye nokuthi labo umhlaba obuyise lwe kubona banezindlela zokuwusebenza," kusho umongameli ramaphosa.

src: bantfu labalinganiselwa ku tigidzi leti25 labahlala ema phandleni bakwenta loku ngaphansi kwebuholi beba holi bendzabuko.
tgt: balinganiselwa ezigidini ezingama25 abantu abahla la ezindaweni zasemakhaya ababuswa ngabaholi benda buko.

src: umsebenti weningizimu afrika kufundzisa lusha more matshediso indvuna yetemfundvo lephakeme nekucece sha nalendi pandor utsi iningizimu afrika iyakhona kunika umfundzate bantfwa na bemindeni lephuyile na lehola imiholo lemincane labangena emanyuvesi nasemakolishi emfundvo nekuceceshela umsebenti wemakhono (ematvet) nga2018.
tgt: isibophezelo seningizimu afrika sokufundisa intsha more matshediso ungqongqoshe we mfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha una ledi pandor uthi iningizimu afrika izokwazi ukuba nemi fundaze yezingane eziphuma emakhaya ampofu kanye nalawo anabondli abenza imisebenzi eholela amaholo aphansi ezingena enyuvesi kanye nakumakolishi oku funda indlela yokwenza nokuqeqeshelwa ukusebe nza (amatvet) ngowe zi2018.

src: indvuna pandor utsite ngu msebenti walelive kwesekela leyo mindeni lephuyile.
tgt: ungqongqoshe upandor uthe kuyisibophezelo sezwe ukweseka imindeni empofu kanye nesengcupheni kakhulu.

src: bekakhuluma nebetindzaba lapho avete khona inchubo yekucala kunikwa kwemfu ndvo yamahhala lapha eningi zimu afrika.
tgt: wayekhuluma ngesikhathi sesithangami sabezindaba lapho aveza khona inqubo yo kwethula imfundo ephakeme yamahhala eningizimu afrika.

src: indvuna pandor umemetele ngalokusemtsetfweni kutsi hulumende wengete nge lutjalotimali lwetigidzigidzi letir7.166 esikhwameni semifundzate yebantfwana bemindeni lephuyile nalehola imiholo lemincane labangena emanyuvesi nasematvet kulomnyaka.
tgt: ungqongqoshe upandor ume mezela ukuthi uhulumeni usetshale izigidi zezigidi zamara ndi eziyi7.

src: indvuna pandor ucinisekise kutsi tigidzigidzi ler4.581 ti bekelwe eceleni labo bafundzi labafanele kungena enyuvesi netigidzi ler2.585 tibeke lwe bafundzi basemakolishi etvet.
tgt: 166 ukuze ukho khele imifundaze yezingane ezivela emindenini empofu kanye nezasemindenini ena bondli abenza imisebenzi eholela amaholo aphansi ezi ngena emanyuvesi kanye naku makolishi etvet kulo nyaka.

src: nga2017 hulumende umemetele kutsi imfundvo lephakeme itawubamahhala kubafundzi labaphuyile kanye nalabo labavela emindenini lehola ngemnyaka umholo lohlanganisiwe losengaka dvonswa letinye timali loyima lingena ler350 000. labafundzi basekelwa ngesikimu semfundzate lese ngetiwe, lesitsatsa sikhundla semalimboleko yaphambilini kanye nesikimu lesingasiwo umfundzate lophelele lesi niketwa sikimu savelonkhe sekusita bafundzi ngetimali (insfas).
tgt: ungqongqoshe upandor uqinisekisile ukuthi sekubekwe eceleni izigidi zezigidi zamara ndi ezingama4.581 kwenzelwa izitshudeni ezikwaze ukungena emanyuvesi kanye nezigidi zezigidi zamarandi eziyi2.585 zezitshudeni zakumakolishi etvet.

src: "luphakelo lwekucala lwensfas lwekusekela bafundzi labaphuyile base manyuvesi nasemakolishi etvet lutakwenyuka kusuke la etigidzigidzini ler9.849 nga2017/18 luye etigidzigidzini letinger35.321 nga2020/21.
tgt: ngowezi2017 uhulumeni wamemezela ukuthi imfundo ephakeme izoba mahhala kuzi tshudeni ezimpofu kanye na lezo ezivela emindenini ethola umholo wonyaka ohlangene ngaphambi kwezimali eziba njwayo engaze ifinyelele kwi zi350 000 zamarandi.

src: "loku kusho kutsi kune sidzingo sekutfutfukisa tinhle lo tekusebenta ngemphumelelo kunsfas.
tgt: izitshudeni zesekwa ngesi kimu semifundaze esibanzi, esingena esikhundleni sesi kimu esedlule esasinengxenye eyimalimboleko kanye nengu mfundaze esasihlinzekwa isi khwama sikwazwelonke sokusiza abafundi ngezimali (insfas).

src: ngaleyo ndlelake sente luphakelo lolwengetiwe lwetigidzi letir105 kulolu hlakamsebenti lwetinchitfo mali lwethemu lesekhatsi kute kusitwe insfas kutsi yandzise futsi icinise emandla ayo ekukhona kusebenta," kwasho yona njalo indvuna.
tgt: "ukuhlinzekwa okusisekelo kwensfas kokuxhasa izitshudeni ezivela emindenini empofu kanye naleyo ihola amaholo aphansi ezingena emanyuvesi kanye nakumako lishi etvet kuzokhuphuka ku suka ezigidini zezigidi zamara ndi eziyi9.849 ngowe zi2017/18 ukuya ezigidini zezigidi zamarandi ezinga ma35.321 ngowezi2020/21.

src: litiko letasekhaya limemetela kulwa nemigca lemidze more matshediso litiko letasekhaya lente lisu lekwenta ti ntfo kucinisekisa kutsi takhamuti aticitsi sikhatsi lesidze emigceni.
tgt: umnyango wezasekhaya umemezela ukulwisana nemigqa emide more matshediso umnyango wezase khaya ulungiselela uhlelo lokuqinisekisa ukuthi izakhamuzi azichithi isikhathi eside emigqeni.

src: ngekusho kwendvuna yetasekhaya malusi gigaba imigca lemidze beyibangwa linani lelisetulu lebantfu, indzawo lengakaneli yelihhovisi lelingembili, tinkinga tebuholi kanye nekuvalwa kwemahho visi ngabomgcibelo.
tgt: ngokukangqongqoshe wo mnyango wezasekhaya umalusi gigaba imigqa emide ibibangelwa inani eliphezulu labantu abadinga usizo, isikhala esinganele ema hhovisi omnyango, izinkinga eziphathelene nobuholi kanye nokuvalwa kwamahhovisi awo ngemigqibelo.

src: kulungisa lenkinga, litiko liba la linani lemahhovisi alo eveni lonkhe kutfola kutsi ngukutiphi tindzawo lapho kudzingeka kwentiwa ncono khona tinsi takalo.
tgt: ukuze kulungiswe inkinga, umnyango ubukeza umthelela ngokwezendawo ukuze kuhlonzwe izindawo lapho udinga khona ukwenza ngcono izinsiza zawo.

src: "sitawusungula luklayo lwe kwenetiswa kwetakhamuti, sente kutsi sikhungo sekuchumana se takhamuti sisebente ngemphu melelo, kutfola sisombululo setakhamuti letingena tinga kalindzelwa kanye nendzawo yelihhovisi lelingembili, kubuka nekutsi ngeke yini kube nelu hlelo lolusha lwekusebenta emashifu, kulungisa loluhlelo langcondvomshini lolungakati nti, kwenyusa lizinga lekuvaka sha emahhovisi etfu kwemame nenja lamakhulu, kwenta ncono kuhamba kwemsebenti kanye nekwengeta lizinga lekuchu manana netakhamuti," kwasho yona njalo indvuna.
tgt: "sizogunyaza inhlolovo yokwe neliseka kwezakhamuzi, senze ukuthi isikhungo sokuxhu mana nezakhamuzi sisebenze ngokwezinga eliphezulu, sizothola isisombululo ngokuphathelene nabantu abeza esikhungweni abayinani elingaqageleki kanye nesikhala emahhovisi omnya ngo, ukubheka okungenzeka ngokuphathelene nohlelo olusha lwamashifu, ukulungisa uhle loxhumano lwamakhompyutha olungahlale lusebenza, ukwenyu swa kokuvakasha kwabaphathi abasezikhundleni eziphezulu emahhovisi ethu, ukuthuthu kiswa kokwenziwa komsebenzi kanye nokwenziwa ngcono kokuxoxisana nezakhamuzi," kuqinisekisa ungqongqoshe.

src: lamasu ekwenta tintfo atawu cala kusebenta njengetinya tselo tekungenelela tethemu lemfisha, lesemkhatsini kanye neyesikhatsi lesidze.
tgt: lezi zinhlelo zokuzokwenziwa zizokwethulwa njengezindlela zokungenelela zesikhashana, zesikhathi esiphakathi nendawo kanye nezesikhathi eside.

src: indvuna ichaze kutsi leti nsayeya ngeke tisonjululwe ngekusebentisa tinyatselo tekungenelela letilungisa tintfo ngekushesha futsi icele umma ngo kutsi ubeketele ngesikhatsi litiko lisacala kutisebentisa.
tgt: ungqongqoshe uchaze lezi zi ngqinamba ezingeke zisonjululwe ngokungenelela okusheshayo futhi wacela umphakathi ukuthi ube nesineke ngesikhathi umnya ngo wethula lokhu.

src: "sitimisele ngekwenta konkhe lokusemandleni etfu kulwa nemphi yekuma emigceni, nanome kunetinkinga telitiko kanye naletinye tinsayeya," kwasho indvuna gigaba.
tgt: "simile sizibophezela ekwenzeni okusemandleni ethu ukuze si nqobe ukulwisana nemigqa, nangaphandle kwezingqina mba kanye nezinye izi nselele," kusho ungqongqoshe ugigaba.

src: ngembikwekumemetelwa kwemasu ekwenta tintfo litiko litsite akube khona umbiko wekuhlola kutfola kutsi lemigca singayilawula njani ncono kanye nekwenta ncono tinsitakalo talo.
tgt: ngaphambi kokuthi umemezele izinhlelo zozokwenza umnyango wenza umbiko wokuhlola ukuze uthole ukuthi ungakwazi kanjani ukulwisana nemigqa futhi wenze ngcono izinsiza zawo.

src: lomkhuba waphawula nge tinhlelo tengcondvomshini letingakatinti, inchubo lete imphumelelo yekuhamba kwemsebenti kanye netindle lamasu tekuchumana letinga hambisani letiholela ekutseni kube netakhamuti letingane tiseki kanye nekuba khona kwemigca lemidze.
tgt: umbiko wabeka uhleloxhumano lwamakhompyutha olungahlale lusebenza njengalo kho kulindelekile, uhlelo lokwe nziwa komsebenzi olungasebenzi ngendlela efanele kanye nezindlela zokuxhumana ezingahlanga nisiwe ngendlela efanele eziholela kwizakhamuzi ezingenelisekile kanye nemigqa emide.

src: ngekusho kwendvuna, lama phuzu lalandzelako enta lenki nga kutsi ichubekiseleke embili: ■ kulawula lokungekho ezingeni kulamanye emahhovisi ■ kungasebentiseki ngemphu melelo kwetisebenti ■ kuswelakala kweluhlelo lwekucasha ■ kungalawuli ngemphumelelo imigca ■ kuchubeka ngasikhatsi sinye kweluhlelo lolwentisa bantfu kanye nalolo lolutentekelako ■ kungasatjalaliswa ngekuli ngana kwemahhovisi ngekubuka bantfu labakhona lwatiso lolungasilo lolumayelana nekutsi ema bhuku amatisi lanebhakodi angeke asabakhona.
tgt: ngokukangqongqoshe, lezi zinto ezilandelayo zenza inkinga ibe yimbi kakhulu: ■ ukungengameli ngendlela efanele kwamanye amahhovisi ■ ukungasetshenziswa ngendlela efanele kwabasebenzi.

src: timphawu letingekho ezingeni emahhovisi.
tgt: ■ ukungabikho kohlelo loku bhuka ukubonwa komuntu othile.

src: umlimi longumake uli ma indlela yakhe leya emphumelelweni nonkululeko mathebula kusuka ebuphuyeni nekutsi bameye ngenca yekusebenta epulasini mahlatse matlakane (loneminyaka yebudzala le20) manje ungumlimi wephepha leluhlata satjani lomama tsekako.
tgt: umlimi wesifazane ophokophele empumelelweni nonkululeko mathebula okhule entula futhi ehlekwa ngokusebenza epulazini, manje usezakhele igama ngoku ba umlimi ovelele wophepha abaluhlaza, umahlatse matlakane (oneminyaka yobu dala engama20).

src: mahlatse wacala ngeku volontiya kusebenta ngetimphelansontfo nangemaholide esikolwa epulasini lendzawo lelilima iphepha leluhlata satjani aneminyaka le15 kute asite make wakhe ngekutsi batfole lokuya etfunjini.
tgt: umahlatse waqala ukuvo lontiya epulazini lasendaweni elikhiqiza ophepha abaluhlaza njalo ngezimpelasonto noma kuvalwe izikole eneminyaka eyi15, futhi ezama ukusiza umama wakhe owayengase benzi ukuthi abe nokuya ngasethunjini.

src: matlakane uhlala kagamoi simane ebuchum ngaphandle nje kwepolokwane elimpopo.
tgt: umatlakane uzinze egamoisimane ebuchum eduzane nasepolokwane elimpopo.

src: utsite nanoma nje manje atitfokotela titselo tekusebenta kwakhe ngekutikhandla kodvwa bekungalula ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi.
tgt: nakuba edla izithelo zomsebenzi wakhe, uthi akukaze kube lula nenze.

src: "mine nebantfwana bakitsi sikhule kamatima.
tgt: "ngesikhathi ngikhula no dadewethu nabafowethu bekungelula neze.

src: bontsanga yami bebahlekisa ngami ngesikhatsi ngicala kusebenta epulasini futsi batsi kusebenta epulasini kwebantfu labanga kafundzi.
tgt: ontanga bami bebengenza inhlekisa ngesikhathi ngiqala ukuse benza epulazini bethi ipulazi elabantu abangafundile.

src: "loku bekungephula umoya kepha bengifuna kwati kulima kute kutsi ngichubeke nako njengemsebenti wami lengi wukhetsile," kwasho yena.
tgt: "lokhu kwakungizwisa ubuhlungu kakhulu kodwa ngangifisa ukuqokelela ulwa zi ngezolimo ukuze ngolunye usuku ngigxile kulo mkha kha," elandisa.

src: ngesikhatsi matlakane asatfole likhono wakhulumisana nemnikati walelipulasi johan nel lapho bekavolontiya kho na mayelana nekuhlanyela yakhe inhlanyelo aphindze alime bophepha.
