tgt: kwathi lapho umatlakane eseqokelele ulwazi, waqonda kumnikazi wepulazi ujohan nel, walapho ayevolontiya khona wacela ukutshala imbe wu alime ophepha abaluhlaza.

src: nel wamnika emahektha lamabili emhlaba epulasini lakhe.
tgt: unel wamabela emhlabeni wakhe umhlaba ongamahekthara amabili.

src: "ngamangaliswa kutsi tinhlanyelo letincane kangaka tingaba titjalo letitsela bo phepha labaluhlata satjani labakhulu kangaka.
tgt: "kwangimangaza ukuthi imbewu encane ingashintshaikhiqize ophepha abaluhlaza abakhulu.

src: kubona kutsi titjalo tinakekelwa kanja ni ngekutsi tifakwe bomanyo lo kute kulawulwe tilokatana kwangenta kutsi kulima ngikutsandze kakhulu kunakuca la.
tgt: ukubona ukuthi izitshalo zinakekelwa kanja ni ngomanyolo ukulwisana nezimbungulu kwangenza ngaba nothando lwezolimo kakhudlwana.

src: ngavele ngati khona lapho kutsi loku nguyona yintfo lengifuna kuyenta," kwasho matjakane.
tgt: kusukela ngale so sikhathi kwangicacela ukuthi ilokhu engifisa ukukwenza," ngokusho kukamatlakane.

src: ngemuva kwekuphotfula matikuletjeni wakhe matlakane wabambelela kuya enyuvesi ngemnyaka munye nanoma nje besebamemukele enyuv esi yasejozi (iuj) kutsi uyofundza tifundvo temtsetfo.
tgt: ngemuva kokuphothula umatekuletsheni umatlakane wahlala ekhaya nakuba inyuvesi yasegoli (iuj) yabe imamukele ukuba afundele umthetho.

src: wabuyela emuva kunel wayomcela lolunye futsi lusito loluyenti wabese umbonisa kutsi acele sikhulu sendzawo kutsi singete samupha yini umhlaba.
tgt: wabuyela kunel wamcela ukuba amqwashise kabanzi ngezolimo, unel owamtshela ukuba akakhulume nenkosi yendawo ukuze imabele umhlaba.

src: ngemuva kwekubona inchubekelembili yakhe epulasini lanel sikhulu sendzawo sabese simupha umhlaba longemahektha lange40 epulasini ibabirwa ba tau ya tswala lapho khona manje sekusepulasini lakhe lalima kulo.
tgt: emva kokubona inqubekela phambili yakhe esebenza epu lazini likanel, inkosi yendawo yamabela umhlaba ongama hekthara angama40 epulazini ibabirwa ba tau ya tswala okuyilapho esebenzela khona.

src: libutfo letemvelo livikela bobhejanes dale hes umelusi wetemvelo phakamani nyawo (loneminyaka yebudzala le26), lotinte esichiwini semvelo eumkhuze game reserve kwazuluna tal, ungulumumye webelu si laba1 659 temapaki ave lonkhe aseningizimu afrika (isanparks) lebanike umse benti wekunakekela imvelo etichiwini tekonga imvelo ta hulumende netangasese kuyo yonkhe iningizimu afrika.
tgt: abaqaphi beziqiwu bavikela obhejane dale hes oqaphe ezemvelo uphakamani nyawo (oneminyaka yobu dala engama26), ozinze esiqiwini umkhuze game re serve esifundazweni sakwakwazulunatal, ongomunye wabaqaphi abayi1 659 abathweswe isouth african na tional parks (isanparks) umsebenzi wokuqapha ezemvelo eziqiwini zikahulumeni nezizimele eningizimu afrika yonkana.

src: nyawo, loyincenye yemklamo wekulandzela temvelo lochutjwa yiepwp , ukholelwa ekutsi kubalulekile kufundzisa imimango mayelana nekunakekelwa kwemvelo.
tgt: unyawo, oyingxenye ya basebenzi abaqaphe ezemvelo ngaphansi kweepwp , ukholelwa ukuthi kusemqo ka ukufundisa umphakathi ngokunakekela imvelo.

src: "sifanele kutsi sihambe siyo fundzisa imimango futsi siyente ivisise kutsi kungani kubalule kile kutsi kongiwe imvelo.
tgt: "sifisa ukuphuma sifundise umphakathi ukuthi kungani kubalulekile ukunakekela imvelo.

src: ngu laphoke ummango utawuvisisa kutsi indzima ledlalwa tilwane tasendle", kwasho yena.
tgt: kulaphoke umphakathi uzoqonda indima yezilwane nezinyamazane zasendle," ngokusho kukanyawo.

src: loluhlelo, loluhlomisa bantfu labasha baseningizimu afri ka ngemakhono labawadzingako kute bakwati kusebenta etindzaweni tekonga imvelo nekuhlalisana kwetilwanyana netihlahla, sewente sicinise ko sekutsi nyawo uyakhona kunakekela umndeni wakhe.
tgt: lolu hlelo, okuwuhlelo olufundisa intsha yaseningizimu afrika amakhono ewadingayo ukuze isebenze emkhakheni wokongiwa kwemvelo, izilwane zasendle nezitshalo, lolu hlelo lusize unyawo ukuba anakekele umndeni wakhe.

src: "luphahla lwendlu lelikhaya lemndeni wami manje seyifule lwe kahle kakhulu, alusavuti, futsi loko kungenca yemsebenti wami.
tgt: "umndeni wami usuno phahla olungavuzi, ngoba ngiyasebenza.

src: kuyangitfokotsa kutsi ngatfola lelitfuba," kwasho yena.
tgt: kuyangithoko zisa ukuthi ngathola leli thu ba," kusho unyawo.

src: indvuna yelitiko letemve lo dkt.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wezemvelo udkt.

src: edna molewa sewetse balandzele ligama lebujaha le litsi 'libutfo letemvelo' ngoba badlala umsebenti lomkhulu ekulweni nebugebengu, njenge kutingela kubulawe bobhejane ngalokungekho emtsetfweni.
tgt: edna molewa uhloniphe abaqaphi bezemvelo wababiza ‘ngabaqaphi beziqiwu’ ngo ba ngegalelo elikhulu aba nalo ukulwisana nobuge bengu kwezemvelo, obufana nokubulala obhejane.

src: "kulomnyaka lophelile kwakhishwa balandzeleli be temvelo la1 659 bayiswa etindzaweni letihamba embili ekutingelweni kubuye kubu lawe bobhejane ngalokungekho emtsetfweni kute bayokweleke lela ekuvikelweni kwemvelo.
tgt: "onyakeni odlule balinganiselwa kwi1 659 abaqaphi bezemvelo abasatshalaliswe ezindaweni ezidume kakhulu ngokubulala obhejane ukuze basize ngokuvikela ezemvelo.

src: luhlelo lwekudala imisebenti luvutsa emalangabi adele schormann working on fire (wof) ilawula luhlelo loluhlanganisile lwekulawula imililo lodalela imisebenti yebantfu labasha labanyenti labavela emimangweni lephuyile.
tgt: bami ngomumo basungula amathuba omsebenzi adele schormann iworking on fire (iwof) ilawula uhlelo oludidi yelwe olongamele um lilo oseluqashe intsha eningi emiphakathini encishwe amathuba.

src: ngekwesekelwa ngetima li litiko letemvelo, loluhlelo luwela ngaphasi kweluhlelo lwetemisebenti yahulumende leyengetiwe (iepwp).
tgt: ngokuxhaswa umnyango wezemvelo, lolu hlelo luwela ngaphansi kohlelo olunwetshiweyo lwemisebenzi yomphakathi (iepwp).

src: luniketa litsemba kulusha lolunyenti lolungatfoli imisebenti futsi selube nemphumelelo lencomeka kakhulu ekuvikeleni nasekulawuleni imililo yesiganga, lunciphisa lifutse lwayo.
tgt: lunikeza abantu abasha abangawutholi umsebenzi ithemba futhi seluphumelele kakhulu ekunqandeni naseku vikeleni umlilo emaqeleni, lwe hlisa nomthelela womlilo.

src: loluhlelo lucasha bantfu la bangetulu kwalaba5 000 la bavela emimangweni lephuyile luphindze futsi lubaceceshe kutekwati ngemlilo, temfundvo kanye nekuwucindzetela nala manye emakhono, njengelusito lwekucala, kubata, kupheka, temphilo netekuphepha kanye netekuchumana.
tgt: ngalolu hlelo sekuqashwe abantu abangaphezulu kwezi5 000 abaphuma emiphakathi ni entulayo futhi baqeqeshwa baqwashiswa ngomlilo, ezemfundo, ukunqanda nokuvimba umlilo nakwamanye amakhono, afana nosizo lokuqa la, ukubaza, ukupheka, ezempilo, ukuphepha nezokuxhu mana.

src: sikhulu setekuchuma sewof lebogang maseko uchaze watsi loluhlelo luhlose bantfu labasha luphindze futsi lucasha bantfu labakhubatekile kutsi base bente etikhungweni talo letisetifundzeni.
tgt: ulebogang maseko wezokuxhumana kwiwof uthi lolu hlelo luqondiswe kubantu abasha futhi luqasha abantu abaphila nokukhubazeka uku ze basebenze ezizindeni zalo ezisezifundazweni.

src: "sigcizelelaka kakhulu kutfutfukisa emakhono nekuni ka lusha imisebenti, lusha lolu sha loluvela etikolweni temabanga laphakeme noma lolusandza kuphotfula etikhungweni temfundvo lephakeme.
tgt: "sigcizelela kakhulu eku thuthukiseni amakhono futhi siqasha abantu abasha abasa phuma esikoleni noma abasanda kuthola iziqu ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.

src: kubaceceshwa balohlulelo, labange ma94% ngebantfu labasha, la bange31% bomake bese kutsi labayi3% ngebantfu labakhu batekile," washo acinisekisa.
tgt: kula ba abaqashwe ngalolu hlelo, abangama94% abantu abasha, abangama31% abantu besi fazane kuthi abayi3% kube abantu abaphila nokukhubaze ka," egcizelela.

src: lorraine mokoena (lone minyaka yebudzala le31) wase mpumalanga ungulomunye webaceceshwa lowazuza kulo luhlelo.
tgt: ulorraine mokoena (one minyaka yobudala engama31) wasempumalanga ungomunye wabaqashiwe futhi osezuze kulolu hlelo.

src: bekaloku asebenta lapha kawof yonkhe leminyaka le11 leyendlulile.
tgt: usesebenze iminyaka eyi11 esebenzela iwof.

src: ngemuva kwekuphotfula ma tikuletjeni washikashikeka imi nyaka lemibili angatfoli umse benti.
tgt: emva kokuphothula umateku letsheni, waba nenkinga engawutholi umsebenzi iminyaka emibili.

src: sisi wakhe wabese umtjela ngaloluhlelo lwewof.
tgt: udadewabo wamtshela ngohlelo lwewof.

src: "inchubo yekufaka sicelo beyimatima.
tgt: "uhlelo lokufaka isicelo lwalungelula neze.

src: kuphila nekucina kwemtimba nguyona ndlela lebaluleke kakhulu yekukhetsa labatawungena kulomsebenti futsi baceceshwa bafakwa eti gabeni tabo.
tgt: ukuba qa tha inqubo esemqoka kakhulu kulo msebenzi futhi abantu aba zoqashwa bavocavocwa kanzi ma.

src: ungaphumelela kusivivinyo ubese udzingeka kutsi uphumelele nakuluhlolo lwetemphilo kubeseke kuba ngukhona kucala lucecesho lwekucisha umlilo," kwasho yena.
tgt: uma uphumelela lokhu ku fanele uxilongwe ngodokotela kulaphoke uzoqala uqeqeshelwe ukuba isicishamlilo," esala ndisa.

src: mokoena wacala alijuniya lesicimamlilo futsi sewusebente ngekutikhandla wakhuphu ka waba ngumholi lomkhulu welicembu lebacimimlilo, uhola licembu lebacimimlilo laba18.
tgt: umokoena waqala eyisi cishamlilo esisezingeni eliphansi wasebenza wanyuselwa esikhundleni lapho engomunye wabaholi abaqavile, uhola izicishamlilo eziyi18.

src: "lomsebenti uyintjintjile imphilo yami.
tgt: "lo msebenzi uyishintshile impilo yami.

src: ngimi kuphela lo nesibopho salokuya etfunjini se bantfwana bakitsi nebantfwana bami lababili.
tgt: ekhaya imina ngedwa engisebenzayo ukusiza odadewethu nabafowethu kanye nezingane ezimbili.

src: manje ngiyakhona kondla umndeni wami ngiyise nebantfwana bami esikolweni," kwasho mokoena.
tgt: manje ngiyakwazi ukunakeke la umndeni wami ngikhokhele nezingane zami esikoleni," ngokusho kukamokoena.

src: "ukuvumile kutsi lomsebenti wekucima umlilo ngalokwetayelekile ungumsebenti wemadvodza futsi sewufundze kutsi acine abe nemandla ku lomkhakha.
tgt: "uvumile khona ukuthi ukuba isicishamlilo ngokujwayelekile umsebenzi wabantu besilisa futhi usefunde ukuba isikhondlakhondla kulo msebenzi njengoba engumuntu wesifazane.

src: mokoena uphokophele ekube ni ngumphatsi wemisebenti yemacembu kuleminyaka lemibili letako.
tgt: umokoena ufisa ukuba umph athi olawula konke eminyakeni emibili ezayo.

src: loku kutawumenta kutsi abe nesibopho sawo onkhe emacembu ewof lase mphumalanga.
tgt: lokhu kuzomenza angamele wonke amaqem bu ewof azinze empumalanga.

src: njengoba naku sesifikelwe sikhatsi semililo, mokoena unikete lamasu ekuvikela imililo yesiganga lalandzelako: ungalumeki imililo endzaweni levulekile uma ngabe angeke ukhone kuwu lawula.
tgt: njengoba isikhathi samaqubu la omlilo sisondele, umokoe na usinikeze izixwayiso ezi landelayo zokuvikela umlilo wequbula: ungashisi umlilo endaweni evulelekile uma uzohlulwa ukuwulawula.

src: yenta siciniseko sekutsi une lusito netisetjentiswa letenele tekubukana nato tonkhe timo.
tgt: qikelela ukuthi uthola usizo olwanele nezinsiza ukuze ubhekane nakho konke oku ngenzeka.

src: ungawushiyi umlilo unga kagadvwa.
tgt: ungawushiyi umlilo ungaqa shwe muntu.

src: caphela simo selitulu.
tgt: bheka isimo sezulu.

src: kugucula temfundvo lephakeme amukelani chauke imfundvo lephakeme eningizimu afrika iyagucuka, akusiko kuphela kutsi sekulula ku tfola imfundvo lephakeme kodvwa futsi utfola leco ndziswe kahle kutsi imelane netidzingo tetimboni.
tgt: ukuguqula imfundo ephakeme amukelani chauke isimo semfundo ephakeme eningizimu afrika siyashintsha, njengoba imfundo ephakeme seyingeve nje ifinyeleleka kodwa seyiqondene kangco no ukuze ihlangabezane nezidingo zomnotho.

src: leti ngucuko timcoka ngoba live letfu lisebenta kulungiselela bantfu labasha kute bame lane nemisebenti nekufaka sandla kutemnotfo.
tgt: izi nguquko ziyadingeka nje ngoba izwe lisebenzela uku lungiselela abantu abasha balungele umsebenzi kanye nokuba negalelo kwezo mnotho.

src: njengoba sive sigubha inya nga yelusha, ivuk’uzenzele ibukisisa indlela lusha lwale live luniketwa ngayo ema tfuba ekuphumelela litiko letemfundvo lephakeme nekucecesha.
tgt: njengoba izwe libungaza inyanga yentsha, ivuk’uze nzele ibukisisa ukuthi intsha yezwe ihlinzekwa kanjani ngamathuba ngumnyango wezemfundo ephakeme nezokuqeqesha ukuze i phumelele.

src: naledi pandor, indvuna yetemfundvo lephakeme nekucecesha lebekwe ngendlovana iniketwe u msebenti wekungenisa luhle lo lwemfundvo lephakeme yamahhala kulabo laba phuyile kanye nalabafundzi labavela kumindeni lehola imali lengetulu kwelizinga lelibekiwe kepha labasolo bangakhoni kukhokhela ti ndleko tasenyuvesi.
tgt: njengoba aqokwa ngonhlo lanja njengongqongqoshe wezemfundo ephakeme no kuqeqesha, unaledi pandor unikezwe umsebenzi wo kuqalisa uhlelo lwemfu ndo yamahhala kwaba mpofu kanye nalabo abazi wa njengezitshudeni ezingo ndingasithebeni.

src: emva kwesiteleka lesidze savelonkhe ngaphansi kwesihloko lesitsi: #fees mustfall, kwamenyetelwa ngengongoni kutsi lusha loluvela kumindeni lehola imali lengaphansi kwer350 000 ngemnyaka lutawu tfola imfundvo yemazinga laphakeme nekuceceshwa yamahhala.
tgt: kulandela izibhelu zika zwelonke ngaphansi kwe siqubulo esithi: #feesmu stfall , kwamenyezelwa ngozibandlela ukuthi intsha evela emindenini lapho u mholo wakhona ungapha nsi kwezi350 000 zamarandi ngonyaka izothola imfundo yamahhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqeshwa.

src: kuphake lwa kwalemfundvo kusachubeka fu tsi kutawutsatsa sikhatsi lesinge tulu kwemi nyaka lesihla nu.
tgt: ukuqali swa kokusebenza kwalolu hlelo kuyaqhubeka futhi kuzoqhutshwa esikhathini seminyaka emihlanu.

src: luhlelo lwemfundzateindvuna pandor icinisekise kutsi kungeniswa kweluhlelo lwemfundzate kuchubeka kahle.
tgt: isikimu somfundazeungqongqoshe pandor ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuqaliswa koku sebenza kwesikimu somfundaze ku yaqhubeka nga phandle kwe zinkinga.

src: "loluhlelo lolusha lwemfu ndzate likungenelela loku mcoka kwahulumende wase ningizimu afrika, ngoba, ecinisweni, bantfu baseningi zimu afrika imali yabo yentse la lekhokhela lemifundzate," washo njalo.
tgt: "isikimu esisha somfundaze siwuhlelo lukahulumeni waseningizimu afrika lokungenelela oluba luleke kakhulu futhi, empele ni, olwabantu baseningizimu afrika ngoba yintela yabo ekhokhela lokhu," kusho yena.

src: loluhlelo lwemfundzate luni ketwa labo bafundzi labacala kungena emanyuvesi kanye nasemakolishi etifundvo te buciko bemisebenti yetandla kanye nekuceceshwa (ematvet), kuyo yonkhe iminyaka yekufundza.
tgt: isikimu somfundaze sini kezwa izitshudeni eziqalayo enyuvesi kanye nasemako lishi okufundela umsebenzi wezobuchwepheshe bezandla nokuqeqeshwa (amatvet), kuwona wonke amazinga e minyaka yemfundo.

src: lomfundzate wesekelwe nge mali leyengetiwe yahulume nde letigidzigidzi letir7.166 ngemnyaka we2018 – kwatsi tigidzigidzi ler4.581 tabeke lwa bafundzi labaphumelele kungena emanyuvesi kwatsi tigidzigidzi ler2.585 tabeke lwa bafundzi bemakolishi etvet.
tgt: ukuze kuxhaswe isikimu somfundaze, imali kahulu meni eyengeziwe eyizigidigidi zamarandi eziyi7.166 ibeke lwa eceleni ngowezi2018 – kule mali, eyizigidigidi zama randi eziyi4.581 ibekelwe izi tshudeni ezifanelekile ezifu nda emanyuvesi, ize ezigidigi di zamarandi eziyi2.585 yona ibe ngeyezitshudeni zamako lishi amatvet.

src: indvuna pandor yatsi ema kolishi labukene nemikhakha letsite yetemfundvo angahle abe tikhungo tebuchwephesha letikhicita emakhono lancono kulowo mkhakha wesifundvo.
tgt: ungqongqoshe pandor uthe amakolishi agxile emikhakheni ethile yezemfundo angase abe yizikhungo ezivelele ezaziwa ngokukhiqiza amakhono aphambili emikhakheni yazo.

src: sibonelo, likolishi lelilodvwa lingabukana kuphela nemse benti webunjiniyela betinjini bese kutsi lelinye libukane nebunjiniyela kutetindiza, wa chaza njalo.
tgt: isibonelo, ikolishi elilodwa lingagxila kwezobunjiniyela bokukhenikha bese elinye ligxila kwezokushayelwa kwezindiza, kuchaza yena.

src: wangeta ngekutsi "ngiyatsemba kutsi kuvumela kutsi likolishi libukane kuphela netifundvo letitsite letimba lwa kulikusasa lemakolishi.
tgt: "ngikholwa ukuthi ukugxila emkhakheni owodwa kukho na kulele ikusasa lamakolishi," kwengeza yena.

src: "sifuna emakolishi etfu ente tifundzo letahlukahlukene.
tgt: "sifuna izinto ezahlukile.

src: asifuni kutsi onkhe ente intfo lefanako.
tgt: asi funi wonke amakolishi enze into eyodwa."

src: umshayeli wetikebhe longundzabamlonyeni allison cooper njengemshayeli we tikebhe letidvonsa letinye etransnet lindile mdletshe (loneminya ka yebudzala lenge30) usha yela tikebhe letinemandla letisebenta kusita kudvonsa leminye mikhumbi elugwini lasedurban.
tgt: umshayeli wezikebhe ushisa izikhotha allison cooper njengomshayeli wezikebhe wakwa transnet ulindile mdletshe (oneminyaka yobudala engama30) uye na oshayela izikebhe ezina mandla ezisetshenzise lwa ukulekelela ukuhamba kwemikhumbi echwebe ni lasedurban.

src: nanoma titi ncane ngebukhulu, letikebhe tinemandla kakhulu kantsi kutishayela kudzinga likho no lelisezingeni lelisetulu.
tgt: yize noma zizincanyana, izikebhe ezi donsa ezinye kodwa zina mandla kakhulu futhi uku zishayela kudinga ikhono kakhulu.

src: mdletshe watalwa futsi wakhulela eport shepstone wabese ufundza est faiths.
tgt: umdletshe ongowokuda buka esayidi wase efunda est faiths.

src: "mine ngakhula kamna ndzi kakhulu.
tgt: "kwakumnandi kakhu lu lapho ngakhulela kho na.

src: ngesikhatsi ngisakhula bekute kwesaba, kungafanani nanamuhla, futsi wonkhe umuntfu beka khuliswa sigodzi sakhe."
tgt: kwakungekho kwesa ba, kungafani nezinsuku zanamhlanje, futhi wonke umuntu wayekhuliswa u mphakathi.

src: mdletshe waphotfula matikuletjeni ngemnyaka we2006, ngembi kwekuya edurban university of techno logy kuyofundzela inatio nal diploma kutifundvo te maritime studies ngemnyaka we2007.
tgt: "umdletshe waphothu la umatikuletsheni wakhe ngowezi2006, ngaphambi kokulibangisa edurban university of technology wayofundela inational di ploma kumaritime studies ngowezi2007.

src: emva kwekuphotfula is1 ngemnyaka we2007 kanye nes2 ngewe2008 wacala kuceceshwa kwakhe imi nyaka lemitsatfu elwandle, nesafmarine shipping co mpany.
tgt: emva kokuphothula izi nga lakhe les1 ngowe zi2007 kanye neles2 ngowezi2008 waqhube ka nokuqeqeshwa kwa khe olwandle iminyaka emithathu, kanye nesafma rine shipping company.

src: lapha wafundza ku shayela umkhumbi wemtfwa lo, ahambe ngawo elwandle lolunemagagasi lamakhulu aye kumagu lahlukahlukene eeurope, eafrika naseasia enta imisebenti yemikhu mbi yemitfwalo kanye ne lucwaningo ngetekuphepha.
tgt: lapha wafunda khona ukuthi ushayelwa kanja ni umkhumbi wempahla, maphakathi nolwandle fu thi bema nasemachwebeni ahlukahlukene eeurope, eafrika naseasia ngemi sebenzi ehlobene nemithwa lo kanye nezinhlolovo zezo kuphepha.

src: watfola ticu takhe tekucala aneminyaka le25, abe ngale so sikhatsi acedzela ticu ta khe temaster’s kuport oper ations .
tgt: wathola iziqu zakhe zo kuqala eneminyaka enga ma25, ngenkathi epho thula iziqu zakhe zema ster’s kuport operations ngesikhathi esifanayo.

src: letifundvo temaster’s tamenta waba ngumshayeli wetikebhe loceceshekile.
tgt: iziqu zakhe zemaster’s zimenze wafaneleka ukuba umsha yeli wezikebhe oqeqeshi we.

src: "loku kwaba yinseyeya lenkhulu ngoba kuba ngu mshayeli wetikebhe akudzi ngi kutsi ube neticu temfu ndvo tasenyuvesi, kodvwa kudzingeka kuphela ticu tes1 nes2 kanye nekuceceshe lwa kuba selwandle.
tgt: "lokhu kwakuyinsele le enkulu kakhulu kimina ngoba ukuba umshayeli wezikebhe akudingi ukuba umuntu abe neziqu zemfu ndo, kudinga is1, s2 no kuqeqeshwa olwandle.

src: emva kwaloku, bantfu bavamise kubhalisela kuba bashayeli betikebhe.
tgt: kuba ngemva kwalokhu kuphela lapho abantu beye babhalisele ukuba umsha yeli wezikebhe.

src: ngente kokubili sikhatsi sinye.
tgt: ngenza kokubili ngesikhathi esi sodwa.

src: uma ngiphu ma emsebentini, bengiya esi kolweni ngiyofundza mse benti wesikolwa lowentiwe ngalelo langa," washo njalo.
tgt: emva komsebenzi, ngangiye ngihambe ngiye esikoleni, ngifunde konke okwakwenziwe ngalelo la nga," kusho yena.

src: mdletshe uyakutsandza kuba semantini.
tgt: umdletshe uyakuthanda ukuba semanzini.

src: "emanti a ngakutjela lokunengi mayela na nekutsi lilanga lakho li tawuba njani.
tgt: "ama nzi akutshela okuningi ngokuthi usuku oluzayo luzolethani.

src: lamanye ema langa litawuba ngelelibi ndzile, lamanye libe ngule linebungoti futsi kube nemagagasi lamakhulu.
tgt: ngezinye izi nsuku kuzolile, kwezinye kuba kubi kanti kwezinye kuqubuka amagagasi ama khulu, ngakhoke kuni ngi nje okwenzekayo olwa ndle!

src: imikhu mbi futsi iba nemimo leye hlukahlukene kantsi itfwala imitfwalo lehlukene, leku chaza kutsi kufuneka ilawu lwe ngetindlela letehlukene," kwasho mdletshe, lekumtfo kotisa kakhulu kusebenta nelitsimba lelinebantfu la bahlukahlukene labavela emaveni lahlukene.
tgt: imikhumbi iphinde ibe nemimo eyahlukene fu thi ithwala imithwalo eya hlukene, okuchaza ukuthi kufanele iphathwe nge ndlela ehlukile," kusho u mdletshe, okuthokozelayo ukusebenza namathimba anabantu abahlukahlukene, nabavela emazweni ahlu kene.

src: umsebenti lonetinseyeyakuba ngumake kulomkha kha wetelwandle kumatima kwasho mdletshe, lochaza tintfo letimayelana nebulili njengaletiyinseyeya lenkhulu ngenca yekutsi kusakholelwa kutsi ngumkhakha wema dvodza.
tgt: umsebenzi onezinseleleukuba umuntu wesifazane emkhakheni wezokuthutha ngemikhumbi akulula neze kusho umdletshe, obeka izi nkinga ezigxile kwezobulili njengezinselele eziphambili njengoba kusewumkhakha obukwa njengowamadoda kakhulu.

src: "nanoma bomake batama kungena basebente nge kutikhandla kute babonise bantfu kutsi bayakhona, ku matima kusebenta elwandle.
tgt: "yize noma abesifazane bezama ukuzishutheka no kusebenza kanzima ukuze babonise ukuthi lokhu oku shiwoyo akulona iqiniso, kungumsebenzi onzima.

src: ngikuncobile loku ngekuhlala ngiphansi, nginemoya lokahle wekuphumelela kanye neku sebentisana kute bangi hloniphe.
tgt: nga kunqoba lokhu ngokuba ngi ngaphakamisi umoya, ngihla le ngicabanga ngokunethe mba futhi ngisebenze naba ntu ukuze bangihloniphe.

src: ngemandla ekube ketela nawebuhlakani, unga tincoba letihibe," washo njalo.
tgt: ngokubelesela nokuzimise la, ungazinqoba lezi zithiyo," kusho yena.

src: imphumelelo yamdletshe yekuncoba letihibe ibonakala kundvondvo layitfola nga lesikhatsi alibamba lempha tsi wetebuciko bemisebenti yaselwandle.
tgt: impumelelo kamdletshe yokunqoba lezi zithiyo iyabonakala ngendondo ayi hlomulile njengemenenja eyi bamba kwezobuchwepheshe bemikhumbi nolwandle.

src: "ngatfola umklo melo wekuba ngulohamba embili ngekuphotfula tifundvo masinyane ngoba umsebenti wami watfola umphumela wekuhlolwa kwemabhuku lote lichashati ngeliviki leku cala lekuba libamba kulesikhu ndla."
tgt: "ngahlomula ngendondo ngokuba ngovelele esikhathi ni esifushane ngenxa yokuthi umsebenzi wami wathola u mphumela wocwaningoma bhuku ongenagcobho evikini lokuqala ngibambe kulesi sikhundla."

src: waphindza watfola u mklomelo wekuba yingcwetfu" ngemphala 2017, ngekuvikela imikhumbi kutivunguvungu letimbi kakhulu letake tabo nwa edurban.
tgt: waphinde wahlo mula ngendondo ‘yokuba yiqhawe’ ngomfumfu wezi2017, ngokusiza imikhumbi esichothweni esasisibi kakhu lu esake sabonakala edurban.

src: "kuba ngumshayeli wetike bhe kusho kutsi lesinye sikhatsi kufanele usebente ngekuti misela futsi ube nesibindzi," washo njalo.
tgt: "ukuba umshayeli wezike bhe kuchaza ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi kufanele uqunge ube nesibindi," kusho yena.

src: kutfola ticu takhe temaster’s kwenta wonkhe umehluko.
tgt: ukuphothula iziqu zakhe zemaster’s kwaletha umehlu ko omkhulu.

src: "kutfola ticu tami kwacinise kisa kuhlonishwa balingani bami lababobabe.
tgt: "ukuthola iziqu zami kwaqinisekisa ukuthi ngithola ukuhlonishwa okukhulu ngabalingani bami besilisa.

src: bangibuta onkhe malanga kutsi ngi matasatasa ngani ngoba sibabili kuphela labafundze ngalendlela futsi ngibe weku cala kuphotfula imaritime diploma elugwini lasedurban.
tgt: bangibuza zonke izinsuku ukuthi ngimatasa ngani ngoba sibabili kuphela esesihambe leli banga futhi ngaba owokuqala ukuthola imaritime diploma echwe beni lasedurban.

src: loku kodvwa kwangeta nga hluka," watsi, kuchaza ku tsi tifundvo tetelwandle atisi luhlelo lolulula kutifundza.
tgt: lokhu kuphela kungenza ngibe ngovelele," kusho yena, echa za ukuthi izifundo zokusebe nza emikhunjini nasolwandle akulula ukungena khona.

src: umsebenti wekuba mshayeli wetikebhemdletshe utsi kuba msha yeli wetikebhe kusho kutsi umlawuli wako konkhe lo kwentekako kanye nabo bo nkhe labagibele umkhumbi.
tgt: umsebenzi womshayeli wezikebheumdletshe uyachaza ukuthi umshayeli wezikebhe cishe u lawula isikebhe sonkana kanye nabantu abagibele kuso.

src: kufuneka acinisekise kutsi tinsita tekuphepha netekuci sha umlilo tisesimeni lesikahle futsi kunesicinisekiso saloko, ente lucwaningo lwetekuphe pha njalo ngemnyaka, acinise kise kutsi balingani bakhe lasebenta nabo emkhunjini batfola kuceceshwa lokufane le aphindze asayine ema bhuku abo etekuphepha, abuyekete tivumelwano tekusebenta futsi asite tise benti kutsi tibe neluhlelo lwentfutfuko loluhambisana nemisebenti yabo, acinise kise kutsi tinchubomgomo tenkhapani tiyalandzelwa bese ulawula kuphatfwa kwesitoko afake nemaoda etinsita letidzingekako.
tgt: kufanele aqikelele ukuthi izimpahla zokuphepha ne zokucisha umlilo zisesimweni esifanele futhi ziqinisekisiwe ukuba ziyasebenza, aqhube inhlolovo yezokuphepha yaminyaka yonke esikebheni, aqikelele ukuthi ithimba lithola ukuqeqeshwa futhi asayine i zincwadi zabo zokuqeqeshwa, aqhube izibukezo zo kunganyelwa kokwenziwa komsebenzi, nokusiza abase benzi bakhe bahlanganise uhle lo oluthuthukisiwe ngokuha mbisana nomkhakha wabo womsebenzi, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinqubomgomo zenkampani ziyathotshelwa kanye nokubhekelela izitolo nokufaka amaoda amathu luzi okusebenza.

src: ummango ugubha umkhosi wesivumelwano sekubuyiselwa umhlaba setigidzigidzi letinger21 siya miti ummango wase mphumalanga kapa utawungenelela emkhakheni wetichiwu tetilwane tasendle ngemuva kwekutsi utfole kusekelwa ngetimali nguhulumende kutsi basungule luhlelo lwekulawula sichiwu setinya matane.
tgt: umphakathi ugubha isivumelwano sokubuyiselwa umhlaba obize izigidi zamarandi ezingama21 siya miti umphakathi wase mpumalanga kapa uzozibandakanya kwezemvelo ngemva koku thola ukuxhaswa ngezimali uhulumeni ukuze kuhlele lwe uhlelo lokubamba iqhaza kwibhizinisi lezilwane zasendle.

src: lommango wasedouble drift dvutane nasegrahamstown uhlala bantfu labalinganiselwa ku1 500 labavela emindenini le264.
tgt: umphakathi wasedouble drift ngasegrahamstown uhlangani sa abantu abayi1 500 abaqha muka emindenini engama264.

src: basuswa emhlabatsini wabo nguhulumende waseciskei nga1991, ngalesikhatsi bavulela kutsi kwakhiwe sichiwu seti nyamatane semuntfu lomhlo phe.
tgt: basuswa emhlabeni wabo uhu lumeni waseciskei ngowe1991, ukuze kwakhiwe isiqiwi esasi nabanikazi abamhlophe.

src: lommango usandza kutfola tincwadzi tebuniyo talomhlaba, lewabuyiselwa kubo ngekwa loluhlelo lekwabiwa kabusha kwemhlaba.
tgt: umphakathi usanda kuthola amatayitela omhlaba, owabu yiselwa kuwona ngokupha thelene nohlelo lokubuyiselwa komhlaba.

src: ngekusho kwandvunankhulu wasemphumalanga koloni phumulo masualle, imali etigidzi letinger21 seyibeke lwe kutsi kutsengwe lomhlaba kantsi utawubuyiselwa kuba nikati ngekwetigaba.
tgt: ngokukandunankulu wasempumalanga kapa uphumulo masualle, izigidi zamarandi ezi ngama21 sezibekelwe ukubuyi selwa kwalo mhlaba futhi lokhu kuzokwenziwa ngezigaba.

src: "lesi sinyatselo lesibaluleke kakhulu ngalokuphatselene netekulondvolota kanye neti ngucuko.
tgt: "lokhu kuyisinyathelo esi balulekile ngokuphathelene nokulondoloza imvelo kanye nokwenza izinguquko.

src: lesichiwu siyatfutfu kiswa kutsi sikwati kuncinti sana kahle naletinye tichiwu tetilwane tasendle kantsi hulumende usekela lommango ngekubaniketa imali, tilwane tasendle nelucecesho," kusho masualle.
tgt: lesiqiwi sisathuthukiswa ukuze sikwazi ukuncintisana nezinye iziqiwi futhi uhulumeni weseka umphakathi ngokuwuxhasa ngezimali, ngokunikela izilwa ne zasendle kanye nokuqeqe sha," kusho umasualle.

src: lommango, lebalawula nawo lesichiwu ngekusebentisana neeastern cape parks and tourism agency (iecpta) ngapha nsi kwelikhayalethu com munal property association (ilcpa), batfole imali letigidzi ler6 levela kulitiko letemvelo kutsi basungule umkhakha wekukhulisa umnotfo ngetasendle kulesichiwu lesinemahekta la 1 400 lebatsengelwe sona litiko lekutfutfukiswa kwetindzawo tasemaphandleni netingucuku kutemhlaba.
tgt: umphakathi, ophethe isiqiwi ngokuhlanganyela nesikhu ngo sasempumalanga kapa esibhekelele iziqiwu kanye nezokuvakasha (iecpta) ngaphansi kwelikhayalethu communal property association (ilcpa), uthole izigidi zamarandi eziyisithupha kumnyango wezemvelo ukuze uthuthukise ibhizinisi lomnotho ovela kwezemvelo esiqiwini esingamahekthare ayi1 400 owasithengelwa umnyango wokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nezi nguquko kwezomhlaba.

src: sihlalo welcpa, mxolisi ngesi, utsite lommango wenta sicelo sekubuyiselwa umhlaba nga1998.
tgt: usihlalo welcpa, umxolisi ngesi, uthe umphakathi wafaka isicelo sawo sokunxeshezelwa ngowe1998.

src: nga2012 emalunga emmango aniketwa umhlaba longemahekta lange23 500 lenyalo kubese kungetelwa ngalena lefakiwe lengemahekta la1 400 kulesichiwu.
tgt: ngowezi2012, amalungu omphakathi anike zwa amahekthare angama 23 500 asephinde engezwa nga mahekthare ayi1 400 esiqiwi.

src: "sijabule kakhulu ngoba sesikutfole konkhe lesikudzi ngako.
tgt: "sijabula kakhulu ngoba sigcine sikutholile lokho ebe sikufuna.

src: hulumende usinikete lusito ngetimali kwentela tinsitanchanti.
tgt: uhulumeni usixhase ngezimali ngokuphathelene nengqalasizinda.

src: sinetilwane tasendle, lesifaka ekhatsi emadvube lali10, 15 wetingongoni ne10 leti mphofu," kusho ngesi, kungeta kuloko kutawube kunetinyatsi netimpala njengalokudzinge kako.
tgt: sinezilwane zasendle ezihlanganisa amadube asentabeni ayi10, izindlu zele eziyi15 kanye nezimpofu eziyi10," kusho ungesi, engeza nangokuthi kusazotholakala izinyathi kanye nezimpala maduze nje.

src: ungete kwekutsi lommango bewuceceshwa bakaecpta kutsi basebentise lesichiwu.
tgt: wengeza nangokuthi umpha kathi wawuthola ukuqeqeshwa yiecpta ukuze uqhube isiqiwi.

src: "loluhlelo kutsi kwakhiwe tindzawo tekulala tivakashi letimbili (malodge) kantsi kwa nyalo sakha indzawo yekulala tisebenti tasesichiwini kanye nesibaya lapho kwehliswa khona letilwane," kusho ngesi.
tgt: "sihlele ukwakha izindawo zokuhlala izivakashi (amalodge) ezimbili futhi sisakha izizinda zabaqaphi basesiqiwini kanye nesibaya okuzothululwa kuso izilwane," kusho ungesi.

src: bosotimboni bemakhemikhali labamnyama basefreyistata bakha ematfuba emsebenti more matshediso inkhapani yakule ndzawo lekhicita ema khemikhali iyasi ta ekulweni nekuswe lekala kwematfuba emse benti ngekutsi yakhe ema tfuba emsebenti lasimeme lalinganiselwa kuma70 endzaweni yaseharrismith, efreyistata.
tgt: osozimboni abamnyama abenza amakhemikhali basefreyistata badala amathuba emisebenzi more matshediso inkampani yendawo eyenza amakhemikhali isiza ukulwa nokwentuleka kwemisebenzi ngokudala imi sebenzi ezinzile engama70 eharrismith efreyistata.

src: ikevali chemicals yinkhapani yekucala lephetfwe ba ntfu labamnyama kulendzawo yasefreyistata lekhicita imihlo bo lehlukene yemakhemikhali ekucwenga emanti, ekuhlobisa endlini nekuhlanta imithoyi kanye nekwekunamatselisa.
tgt: ikevali chemicals iyinka mpani yabantu abamnyama yokuqala efreyistata eyakha amakhemikhali okulanza ama nzi, ezenhlanzeko kanye nawo kuhlanza izindlu zangasese kanye neglu yokunamathisela.

src: lenkhapani yasungulwa nga2014 bangani labasihlanu labanelwati ngemakhemikhali, timphahla letitsengiseka masi nyane, kutfutfukiswa kwe mikhicito, kanye netinhlobo letahlukene teglu yekunama tselisa.
tgt: le nkampani yasungulwa ngowezi2014 abangani abahlanu abangongoti ezimbonini zamakhemikhali, izimpahla ezithengisa ngokushesha, ukwe nziwa kwemikhiqizo, kanye nokunamathelisayo.

src: umcondzisi lomkhulu wekevali chemicals funeka khumalo utsi ibis yasekela inkhapani yakhe kutsi itfole imishini nemathulusi kute icale kukhicita nekusungula umkhi cito wekucwenga emanti, weku hlobisa nekubulala emagci wane kanye netinhlobonhlobo teglu yekunamatselisa.
tgt: umqondisi wesigungu seziphathimandla wekevali chemicals ufuneka khumalo uthi ibis yaxhasa inkampani yakhe ukuze ithole imishini kanye nezinsizakusebenza ukuze iqale ukwakha kanye nokukhiqiza izinsiza zokuhla nza amanzi, ukuhlanza kanye nokubulala amagciwane kanye neglu yokunamathisela.

src: "uma sicala kwafanele kwekutsi sifake imali kute lebhizi nisi icale kusebenta kodvwa sabese sesitfola kusekelwa ngetimali belitiko letekuhwe belana netimboni (idti) ngekusebentisa ibis kanye nenhlangano yekutfutfukisa timboni (iidc)," asho anaba.
tgt: "ekuqaleni kwadingeka ukuthi sifake imali ukuze ibhizinisi liqale ukusebenza kodwa ekugcineni sathola umxhaso emnyangweni wezohwebo nezezimboni (idti) ngebis kanye nenkampani yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni (iidc),’ kwengeza yena.

src: ibis iluhlelo lwesibonelelo salenchubomgomo yaboso timboni labamnyama lehlose kuvula ematfuba lakhona kubosotimboni labamnyama eninizimu afrika ngekusebe ntisa indlela yekungenelela noma njani ngetimali nanga lokunye lokungadzingi imali, ngendlela lehlosiwe futsi lecha zwe kahle.
tgt: ibis iwuhlelo lomxhaso lwenqubomgomo yosozimboni abamnyama ehlose ukuvulela amathuba osozimboni abamnyama abasebenza kumnotho waseningizimu afrika ngenxa yokungenelela okuqonde okuthile, okuphokophele ukuzuza okuthile nokuhlelwe ngendlela ethile okuphathelene kanye nokungaphathelene nezimali.

src: khumalo utsi kwabatsatsa imali lelinganiselwa kutigidzi ler18 kutsi lebhizinisi ikhone kucala kusebenta netinyanga letilinganiselwa ku11 kutsi bacale kwenta inzuzo.
tgt: ukhumalo uthe kwabiza izigidi zamarandi eziyi18 ukuze ibhizinisi liqale ukusebenza kanye nezinyanga cishe eziyi11 ukuze liqale ukwenza inzuzo.

src: lenkhapani isabalalisa imikhicito yayo kuyo yonkhe iningi zimu afrika kanye naseuganda, namibia, nasetanzania.
tgt: le nkampani ihambisa imikhi qizo yayo eningizimu afrika yonkana kanye naseuganda, enamibia, kanye nasetanzania.

src: khumalo utse lomtselela lenkhapani lebe nawo etimphi lweni tebantfu bendzawo mkhulu kunekwakha ematfuba emsebenti.
tgt: ukhumalo uthe umthelela inkampani enawo ezimpilweni zabantu bendawo mkhulu kunokudala amathuba emisebenzi.

src: "kuko konkhe nalokungetulu kwekwakha ematfuba emsebe nti kubantfu bendzawo, sinelu hlelo lwekusisa emmangweni lapho sisita khona bomake basemadolobheni nasemakhaya kutsi batisungulele emabhi zinisi lasemancane lasebenta ngekukhicita imikhicito yekuhlobisa nekucoceka emakhaya," asho alandzisa.
tgt: "ngaphezu kokudala ama thuba emisebenzi kubantu bendawo, sinohlelo lokutshala izimali ngokuphathelene neze nhlalo esisiza ngalo abesifazane baselokishini kanye nasezindaweni zasemakhaya ukuthi baqale amabhizinisi amancane agxile ekwakheni imikhiqizo yokuhlanza ikhaya kanye nokuhlanza izindlu zangasese," kusho yena.

src: kwakha ematfuba emsebenti elusha lwasekzn hlengiwe ngobese bantfu labasha laba linganiselwa kuma20 labavela kwazu lunatal balindzeleke kutsi bahlomule embonini lensha yakamahindra lebite imali letigidzi letinger95 leta wube yakha luhlobo lolusha lwemaveni angemadouble cab labitwa ngemapik up ngaphandle nje kancane kwasedurban.
tgt: ukudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi entsha yasekzn hlengiwe ngobese abantu abasha aba ngaphezu kwa ma20 bakwazu lunatali bazohlomula embonini yemahindra ebize izigidi zamarandi ezingama95 ezokwakha uhlobo olusha lwamaveni angamadouble cab abizwa ngokuthi yipik up endaweni engaphandle kwasedurban.

src: bantfu labasha labange25 kwazulunatal sebavele baceceshiwe batfola nemse benti nakuvulwa lenkhapani lensha yemahindra.
tgt: abantu abasha abangama25 bakwazulunatali sebethole ukuqeqeshwa baphide baqashwa ngenxa yokuvulwa kwemboni entsha yemahindra.

src: letisebenti ticeceshwe ngekubambisana nebakamahindra kanye neaih logistics kantsi bata wutfunyelwa eindia kutsi bachubeke nekuceceshwa lapho kudzingeke khona.
tgt: abasebenzi bathola ukuqeqeshwa ngokuba mbisana nenkampani yakwamahindra kanye neaih logistics futhi bazohanjiswa eindia ukuze bayothola okunye ukuqeqeshwa lapho kudi ngeka khona.

src: lokukhicitwa lekuta wube kulingwa ngako kulendzawo sekutawusu ngulwa ngekutsi kukhici twe timoto letitawulingani selwa ku2 000 ngemnyaka.
tgt: ukulinga ukwakhiwa kwezimoto kwesikhungo kuyaqhubeka futhi kuli ndeleke ukuthi kukhiqizwe izimoto eziyizi2 000 ngonyaka, bese ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kube yizimoto eziyizi4 000 ngonyaka.

src: "lokusisa kuhle ekuletseni litsemba kumabhizinisi.
tgt: "ukutshalwa kwezimali kuhle ngokuphathelene nokuzethemba kwezama bhizinisi.

src: kuyachubeka nekukhombi sa kwekutsi lendzawo ya kwazulunatal yindzawo lekahle yekusisa.
tgt: kuyaqhubeka nokukhombisa ukuthi lapha kwazulunatali siyindawo ekahle kwaba tshala izimali.

src: lokhu kubuya kutfumele umla yeto kulabo lebasanga bata kwekutsi idurban yindzawo longayicabanga uma ufuna kusisa," kusho umphatsiswatiko wekutfutfukiswa kwemnotfo, tekuvakasha netemvelo sihle zikalala ngalesikhatsi kuvulwa lendzawo.
tgt: kuthu mela nomlayezo kulabo abalokhu bengabaza ukuthi idurban iyindawo ekahle ngokuphathelene nokutshalwa kwezimali," kusho ungqongqoshe wesifundazwe wokuthuthu kiswa kwezomnotho, ezokuvakasha nezindaba zemvelo usihle zikalala ngesikhathi sokwethulwa kwemboni.

src: utsite lamatfuba emsebenti ekucala lasungulwe kulendzawo atawufaka sandla ekukhuliseni ema khono lakhona kulesi fundza.
tgt: wathi amathuba okuqala okuqashwa azoqhamuka kule nkampani azoba nesandla ekwandiseni isibalo sabantu abanamakhono esifundazweni.

src: munye waletisebenti lone ticu tebunjiniyela sthembiso mthembu utsite uyajabula kakhulu kutsi atfole umsebenti.
tgt: omunye wabasebenzi ofunde wagogoda izifundo zobunjiniyela usthembiso mthembu okujabulela kakhulu ukuthi useyasebenza.

src: "besolo ngihleli ekhaya umnyaka wonkhe nginga wutfoli umsebenti.
tgt: "bengihleli ekhaya unya ka wonke ngingawutholi umsebenzi.

src: lelitfu ba lingisitile kutsi ngikhone kunelisa tidzingo tami nemndeni wami.
tgt: leli thuba selingisize ukuthi ngikwazi ukuzinakekela ngiphinde nginakekele nomndeni wami futhi.

src: noma ngineticu tebunjiniyela bemakhenikhali kodvwa bengingakwati lokunyenti ngekuhlanganisa imoto.
tgt: noma ngine ziqu zemechanical engineer ing bengingazi kangako ngokuphathelene nokuhla nganisa imoto.

src: lokuceceshwa lesikutfolile kusisitile kutsi sibe nelwati lolujulile," asho ananatela.
tgt: uku qeqeshwa abasihlinzeke kona kusisize ukuthi sibe nokuzethemba ngokuphathelene namakhono," kusho yena.

src: sikhulu lesiphetse temisebenti mhlabawonkhe sakamahindra arvind ma tthew utsi lenkhapani ihlose kutsenga ma40% waletinye tetintfo talamaveni emapik up kutitolo takuleli.
tgt: isikhulu sezemisebenzi emhlabeni sakwamahi ndra uarvind matthew sithe inkampani iphokophe le ekutholeni ama40% ezi nsiza zokwakha imoto zeveni yepik up kwabahli nzeka ngezinsiza kuleli.

src: uma imphilo ikunika emalamula, walime amukelani chauke litiko letekulima lasenshonalanga kapa lichuba luhle lo lolusita balimi labasha nalasebabomnkantjubovu ngeluhlelo lwekusita kusu kela kucalwa nje ngelilanga lekucala – uma badzinga lusito lwemali – kute kube ngulapho nabo sebakhona kutimela.
tgt: uma impilo ikujikijela ngolamula, batshale amukelani chauke umnyango wezoli mo entshonalanga kapa uqhuba uhle lo olusiza abalimi abasha nasebethuthukile ngamasu okubeseka kusukela ngosu ku lokuqala lapho bedinga usizo lwezimali kuze kube yilapho sebezimele.

src: loluhlelo lwekusita ne kutfutfukisa balimi selusite bantfu labasha njenga wayne mansfield (lone minyaka lenge33 budzala) wasepaarl, losuke ekube ni ngusitolosiyandzindza lobekatsengisela malume wakhe emakethe yasekapa ngesikhatsi asafundza siko lwa watsengisa ngephandle kweminyele yakuleli laseni gizimu afrika emalamula lawalima yena ngekwakhe emhlabeni lawurentako.
tgt: uhlelo lokwesekwa no kuthuthukiswa kwabalimi selusize abantu abasha aban jengowayne mansfield (one minyaka engama33 ubuda la) wasepaarl, osuke ekubeni asebenze njengomdayisi kamalume wakhe emakethe yasekapa ngesikhathi esa funda isikole njengoba ma nje esedayisa olamula bakhe abatshale esiqeshini somhla ba asiqashile.

src: eminyakeni lelishumi le yendlulile, ngesikhatsi angusomabhizinisi lone minyaka lenge23 budzala, mansfield wala litfuba leku sebenta epulazini lebeka cupha kulo emalamula bese uyawatsengisa.
tgt: eminyakeni eyishumi eye dlule, ngesikhathi engusoma bhizinisi oneminyaka enga ma23 ubudala, umansfield walahla ithuba lokusebenza epulazini ayebheka kulona olamula ukuze athengise kabusha.

src: kwengeta ekutsini bekasesemncane futsi ete nenkhabunkhabu yekulima.
tgt: ngaleso sikhathi wayengenandaba nokulima.

src: nanoma kunjalo, emi nyakeni letsite ekuhambeni kwesikhatsi, wantjintja u mcondvo wakhe ngesikhatsi abona kukhula lizinga leku funwa kwemalamula.
tgt: kodwake, iminyaka emba lwa eyalandela, wawushi ntsha umqondo lapho ebona ukukhula kwesidingo sola mula.

src: "ngaphindze ngacaphela kutsi balimi nabo bebenta loku bekwentiwa ngitsi tsi ne bositolosiyandzindza – bebatipakishela imikhicito yabo bese bayoyitsengisa emakethe ekapa.
tgt: "ngaphinde ngabona uku thi abalimi babenza okwa kwenziwa yithina badayisi abahamba ngezinyawo – babepakisha isitokwe sabo bese besidayisa emakethe yasekapa.

src: ngabese ngiyacaphela kutsi kunge nteka kutsi masinyane nje angeke sibe nebantfu la banyenti lesitawubatse ngisela tsine bositolosi yandzindza," kwasho yena.
tgt: ngabona ukuthi kungekudala thina badayisi abahamba ngezinyawo sizo phelelwa indawo yokudayi sa, "kusho yena.

src: kutsite nga2013, umlimi wendzawo wavuma kucece sha mansfield waphindze wamrentisela umhla ba longemahektha la12.
tgt: ngomnyaka wezi2013, umlimi wasendaweni wavu ma ukucebisa umansfield fu thi wamqashisela amahektha ayi12 omhlaba.

src: waphindze futsi wamfakela emaphayiphi ekunisela lo kwenta kutsi mansfield akho ne kulima.
tgt: waphinde wamfakela uhlelo lokunisela olwenza umansfield akwazi ukutshala.

src: nga2015, wakhona kutse ngisa emalamula lange mathani lange31 ngapha ndle kweminyele yale li laseningizimu afrika kwaphindze futsi kwatsi nga2016, lelinani lakhula kakhulu laba ngemathani la168.
tgt: ngonyaka wezi2015, wa kwazi ukudayisa ngapha ndle lwaleli cishe amathani angama31 kalamula futhi ngowezi2016, lesi sibalo sakhuphuka kakhulu saba ngamathani angu168.

src: loku kwenteke ngenca yelusito lolwatfolwa kulu hlelo lwekusita nekutfu tfukisa balimi lokungu lo lolwenta kutsi nga2015 atfole sibonelelo kuluhle lo lolukhulu lwekusitwa ngetekulima (icasp).
tgt: ngenxa yenkuthazo nosi zo oluvela kuhlelo lokwe sekwa nokuthuthukiswa kwabalimi okwamenza wathola isibonelelo sohle lo oluphelele lokwesekwa kwezolimo (icasp) ngowe zi2015, wakwazi ukubeka isisekelo esiqinile futhi wa chuma njengomlimi.

src: loku kwa menta wantinta wabuye fu tsi waba ngumlimi londlo ndlobele.
tgt: ukwandisa nokuhlomisa abalimiuhlelo lokwesekwa nokuthuthukiswa kwabalimi luhlose ukwandisa noku chumisa imiphakathi yabantu ababengabonelelwa ngaphambilini, ikakhulukazi abahlomuli bohlelo lokwabiwa kabusha komhlaba.

src: kuhlomisa abalimi ngemakhono ebalimiloluhlelo lwekusita nekutfutfukisa balimi luhlose kwakha emakhono emima ngo nebantfu labebakadze bancisheke ematfuba phambi lini, ikakhulu labo labazuze ekuhlelweni kabusha kwe mhlaba.
tgt: lu bhekelela abalimi abasafufusa, abalimela ukuziphilisa, aba limi abancane nabahwebayo.

src: lusita balimi labasakhasa, labalimela kutidlela bese batsengisa loko lokusa lako, balimi labanemhlabatsi lomncane kanye nebalimi labakhulu labalimela kutsengisa etimakethe letinkhulu.
tgt: umqondisi wezinhlelo ze zinsizakalo zokuthuthuki swa kwezolimo kumnyango wezolimo entshonalanga kapa ushaheed martin uthe lolu hlelo selusize abalimi bakwazi ukuzimela.

src: inhi seyifike kutekunakekelwa ngetemphilo letincono vukuzenzele unnamed indvuna yetemphilo dkt.
tgt: inhi iwuhlelo lezinsizakalo zempilo eziphuculiwe vukuzenzele unnamed ungqongqoshe wezempilo udkt aaron motsoaledi uthi umthethosivivinywa womshuwalensi wezempi lo kazwelonke (inhi) uzo thuthukisa izinga lezinsizaka lo zempilo eningizimu afrika.

src: aaron motsoaledi utsi umtsetfosivivinyo wekuchibela tindzaba te mshwalensi wavelonkhe we temphilo (inhi) utawenta kancono lizinga letinsita te temphilo eningizimu afrika.
tgt: umotsoaledi ubekhulu ma kamuva nje enkundleni yabezindaba lapho ambule khona umthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyelwa kwenhi kanye nomthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyelwa kwezikimu zezokwelapha.

src: motsoaledi bekakhuluma emhlanganweni webetindza ba losandza kubanjwa lapho beketfula khona umtsetfo sivivinyo wekuchitjelwa kwetindzaba tenhi kanye nemtsetfosivivinyo wekuchi bela tindzaba tetikimu tete kwelashwa.
tgt: le mithethosivivinywa izo phendla indlela yokufikelela kangcono izinsizakalo zempi lo ngenhi.

src: lemitsetfosivivinyo ivula indlela yekutsi babe banengi bantfu labatfola tinsita tete mphilo ngekusebentisa inhi.
tgt: umthethosivivinywa uyinguqulo yomthetho ewuhlaka.

src: umtsetfosivivinyo luhlaka lwemtsetfo.
tgt: imithethosivivinywa eminingi ibhalwa yiminyango kahulu meni ngaphansi kokuqondi swa ngungqongqoshe ofane lekile.

src: imitsetfosivivi nyo leminyeti yentiwa litiko lahulumende ngekucondzi swa yindvuna lefanele.
tgt: umthethosivivinywa kufanele ugunyazwe yikha bhinethi ngaphambi kokuba uthunyelwe ephalamende.

src: lomtse tfosivivinyo ufanele kutsi ubese uvunywa yikhabhine thi ngembi kwekutsi wetfulwe ephalamende.
tgt: ukwethulwa kwale mithetho sivivinywa yomibili kusho ukuthi iningizimu afrika isiseduze ekufinyeleleni izi nsizakalo zempilo ezingujike lele okusho ukuthi inhi ma duze nje izoba ngumthetho.

src: lokwetfulwa kwalemitse tfosivivinyo lemibili kusho kutsi inigizimu afrika seyi dvute ngesinyatselo sinye ekutsini itfole tekunakekelwa kwebantfu ngelizinga lelihle letemphilo ngalokufananako lokusho kutsike masinyane nje inhi itawuba ngumtse tfo.
tgt: inhi yindlela yokuxhasa ngezimali ezoqinisekisa uku thi zonke izakhamuzi zase ningizimu afrika zihlinze kwa ngezinsizakalo zempilo ezibalulekile, kungakhatha liseki isimo sabo sokusebe nza kanye nokuthi bazokwazi na ukuba nabakufakayo ngqo esikhwameni.

src: inhi iyinchubo yekusita ngetimali letawenta sicinise ko sekutsi tonkhe takhamuti taseningizimu afrika titfola tinsita tetemphilo letibalule kile, ngekungakhatsali ngeti mo tabo temsebenti kanye ne kutsi bayakhona yini kufaka imali ngco kulesikhwama.
tgt: umotsoaledi uthe uhulume ni wazi kahle kamhlophe uku thi abanye abantu bakholelwa ukuthi ngaphambi kokukhu luma ngenhi, kunesidi ngo sokulungisa izinsizakalo zempilo ezikhungweni zokwe lapha zikahulumeni ezidonsa kanzima kuqala.

src: motsoaledi utsite hulu mende uyati kutsi kukhona bantfu labakholelwa eku tsini kungakacalwa nje kutsi kukhulunywe ngenhi, ku nesidzingo sekutsi kucalwe ngekulungisa simo setinsita tetemphilo letintengantenga ko sasenigizimu afrika.
tgt: uthe uhulumeni uzazi kahle izinkinga zekhwalithi embi kanye nokuntuleka koku sebenza kahle ohlelweni lwezempilo lukahulumeni.

src: utsite hulumende uyatati letinkinga telizinga lelibi ne kweswelakala kwemakhono kutekunakekelwa ngetemphi lo tahulumende.
tgt: umotsoaledi uthe uhle lo lokuthuthukiswa kwe zwe (indp) luye lwayi gqamisa ngokungananazi nokuthi ekuqaliseni uku sebenza kwenhi, izinga eliphansi lezinsizakalo ze mpilo kanye nezindleko ezi khona zezinsizakalo zempilo embonini ezimele kudingeka kubhekanwe nazo.

src: mtsoaledi utsite luhlelo lwekutfutfukisa lwavelonkhe (indp) yakucaphela loku nekutsi futsi ekufezekiswe ni kwalenhi, kudzingeka kutsi kulungiswe lelizinga le libi letinsita tetemphilo kanye netindleko tetinsita tete mphilo letibitwa tikhungo tete mphilo letitimele.
tgt: ngenkathi izichibiyelo ezi bhekiselwe kwimithethosivi vinywa zidingidwa, umnya ngo uzoqalisa ukusebenza okungenani amaphrojekthi amane enhi, okuzobanda kanya izinsizakalo zempilo ezikoleni, izinsizakalo zempi lo zalabo abakhubazeke ngo kwengqondo, izinsizakalo zempilo zabesifazane aba khulelwe abanezinkinga ngokukhulelwa kwabo ezi bhedlela ezingama22 ezithi nteka kakhulu kanye nokwe lashwa komdlavuza (ionco logy), ngosizo oluqondile egauteng nakwazulunatali, kodwa futhi nezinye izifunda zwe zingashaywa indiva.

src: ngesikhatsi kusasebanjwe tinkhulumomphikiswano mayelana netichibelo tale mitsetfosivivinyo, lelitiko lita wufezekisa lokungenani imi klamo lemine yenhi, lefa ka ekhatsi tinsita tetemphilo etikolweni, tinsita tetemphi lo talabagula ngengcondvo, tinsita tetemphilo tabomake labakhulelwe labanebumati ma nekukhulelwa kwabo eti bhedlela letinge22 letitsintse ke kakhulu kanye newesi fo semdlavuta (ioncology), ngekusita kakhulu igau teng nekwazulunatal, ko dvwake kube kungabekwa eceleni letinye tifundza.
tgt: umotsoaledi uphinde wathi izindleko zezinsizakalo ze mpilo embonini ezimele azi finyeleleki kuzakhamuzi ezi ningi, njengoba owayelijaji eliyinhloko usandile ngcobo ebekwe ukuba ahole ikho mishini yezokuncintisana ukuze kuqhutshwe inhlolo vo ngezindleko zezinsizakalo zempilo embonini ezimele.

src: motsoaledi uphindze watsi tindleko letibitwa tikhungo temphilo letitimele atifinyele lwa takhamuti taseningizimu afrika letinyenti.
tgt: "izichibiyelo esizethulayo zihlose ukuhlinzeka usizo oludingwa kakhulu yiziguli ezizithola zihlupheka kakhu lu," kusho yenaumotsoaledi uthe isichibi yelo sokuqala somthethosivi vinywa sizoqeda ukukhoki swa kwabantu imali engeziwe.

src: sekubekwe loyo bekakadze alijaji lelikhu lu sandile ngcobo yikho mishini yetekuncintisana ku tsi ente lucwaningo ngetindle ko tetinsita tetemphilo leti bitwa tikhungo tetemphilo letitimele.
tgt: izinkokhelo ezicazelwa umthengi zichaza ukuthi isikimu sikhokha ingxenye ethile yesikweletu umhlinze ki kungaba isibhedlela noma udokotela ozimele – ayibize isiguli.

src: imisebenti yesikhungo sekunika lusito ngeticelo letifakiwe yanga2018 vukuzenzele unnamed yini sikhungo sekunika lusito ngeticelo letifakiwe?
tgt: icentral application clearing house (icach) yowezi2018 vukuzenzele unnamed iyini icentral application clearing house?

src: sikhungo sekunika lusito ngeticelo letifakiwe (icach) luhlelo lwesikhashana lolacalwa litiko letemfundvo lephakeme nekucecesha kusita titjudeni letifuna kungena eluhlelweni lwetikolo temfundvo lephakeme nekucecesha ngemuva kwamatekuletjeni (ipset) kodvwa kutfolakale kwekutsi tingahle tibukane nesimo lapho khona: bafake sicelo ngesikhatsi esikhungweni labasitsandzako kodvwa sicelo sabo sangamukeleki kantsi nyalo sikhatsi sesihambile kutsi bangafaka lesinye sicelo kulenye indzawo.
tgt: central application clearing house, ebizwa ngokuthi yicach, umzamo wesikhashana womnyango wemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha yasungulwa umnyango wemfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha ukuze isize abafundi abafuna izikhala zokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme abafisa ukungena ohlelweni lwemfundo elandela ukuqeda isikole nokuqeqeshwa (ipset) kodwa kungenzeka ukuthi ibhekene nesimo lapho: befake isicelo kusenesikhathi ezikhungweni zemfundo abazikhethile kodwa izicelo zabo zachithwa, manje osekuphele isikhathi sokubhalisa kwesinye isikhungo.

src: bafundzi labangemukelwa bangakafaki sicelo ngoba bangenako loko lokudzingekako kute bafake sicelo sekufundza ngenca yemiphumela yabo lengemihle yelibanga le11 kodvwa kutfolakale kwekutsi imiphumela yabo yelibanga le12 iyabavumela kwekutsi bangangena.
tgt: labo abazoba ngabafundi abangasifakanga isicelo ngoba bengakwazanga ukuthola imiphumela edingekayo kubanga le11 ukuze babhalise kodwa bathole ukuthi imiphumela yabo yebanga le12 iyahlangabezana nalokho okudingekayo ukuze babhalise.

src: abakafaki sicelo kusenesikhatsi ngenca yesizatfu lesitsite noma lesinye noma abakafaki sicelo nje sanhlobo.
tgt: abangazange basifake isicelo ngesikhathi ngenxa yesizathu esithile noma abangazange basifake nhlobo isicelo.

src: abati kwekutsi bafuna kufundzela ini nabacedza matekuletjeni.
tgt: abangazi nhlobo ukuthi bazofundani lapho beqeda umatikuletsheni.

src: bayati kutsi bafuna kufundzela ini kodvwa abanasiciniseko sekutsi loku labakhetse kukufundzela kungumsebenti lolungile yini.
tgt: abazi kancane ngalokho abafuna ukukufunda kodwa abangenasiqiniseko ukuthi ingabe lo mkhakha ubalungele na.

src: tinsita letiniketwa yicach ticelo tematfuba ekufundza leticondziswe kupset (emanyuvesi, emanyuvesi etheknoloji, ematheknikhali nemakolishi ekufundzela umsebenti nemkhakha wetemfundvo nemitimba yekucecesha.
tgt: imisebenzi ehlinzekwa icach izicelo zamathuba okufunda epset (emanyuvesi, emanyuvesi obuchwepheshe, emakolishi emfundo yezobuchwepheshe namakhono emisebenzi kanye nokuqeqeshwa kanye nesector education and training authorities).

src: lwatiso netinsita ngetimali (lwatiso nge nsfas).
tgt: ulwazi mayelana nosizo lwezimali (ulwazi lwenfsas).

src: tinsita tekutfutfukiswa kwetemisebenti (kwelulekwa, lwatiso, kwecwayiswa nekuhlelela umsebenti/lwatiso ngekusekelwa ngetimali kanye netindlela tekusitwa ngetimali).
tgt: imisebenzi yokuthuthukisa amakhono omsebenzi (ukwelulekwa, ulwazi, iseluleko kanye nokuhlelela umsebenzi/ulwazi ngalokho ongakukhetha maqondana noxhaso kanye nokuthola imali yokufunda).

src: kusekelwa kwemaciko lasebenta ngetandla (sikhungo savelonkhe sekusekelwa kwentfutfuko yemaciko lasebenta ngetandla).
tgt: ukwesekwa kwabafundela imisebenzi yezandla (isikhungo sokweseka ukuthuthukiswa kwemisebenzi yezandla kuzwelonke).

src: loluhlelo lwecach lucala ngamhla ti3 bhimbidvwane 2018, masinyane ngembi kwekukhishwa kwemiphumela yeluhlolo lwensc, kantsi lutawusebenta kudzimate kuphele inyanga yendlovana nga2018.
tgt: imisebenzi yecach iqala ngomhla ka 3 kumasingana 2018, ezinsukwini ezimbalwa kusanda kuphuma imiphumela yokuhlolwa yensc futhi izosebenza kuze kube sekupheleni kukanhlolanja 2018. icach isebenza kanjani?

src: sigaba seku1: titjudeni letingakatsatfwa ndzawo kulesinye setikhungo labafake sicelo kuto, noma letifuna ematfuba ekufundza epset, tingatsintsana necach ngekusebentisa inombolo yamahhala: 0800 356 635, iwebhusayithi: www.
tgt: isigaba 1: abafundi abangasitholi isikhala ezikhungweni abafake izicelo kuzo, noma abafuna amathuba okufunda epset, bangaxhumana necach kunombolo yamahhala (0800 356 635), iwebhusayithi (www.

src: ungabuye utfole kabanti ngekuvakashela likhasi labo lefacebook lelitsi: cach_sa.
tgt: eminye imininingwane ungayithola ekhasini labo le facebook (cach_sa).

src: sigaba sesi2: emaejenti atawushayela lomfundzi lofake sicelo mahhala, batamshayela kulesikhungo sekutsintsana bese babhalisa yonkhe imininingwane ledzingekako eluhlweni lwedatha yecach, kufaka ekhatsi loku umfundzi langatsandza kukufundzela kanye nesifundza langatsandza kufundzela kuso.
tgt: isigaba 2: amaejenti azoshayela umfundi, ofuna isikhala sokufunda esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, ucingo mahhala, ngokusebenzisa isikhungo sezingcingo, kubhaliswe nemininingwane kusizindalwazi secach, kuhlonzwe umkhakha umfundi awubhalisele kanye nesifundazwe afisa ukufunda kuso.

src: sigaba sesi3: imininingwane yonkhe yalona lofake sicelo kanye nemiphumela yamatekuletjeni itawucinisekiswa ibuye idluliselwe kuleso sikhungo semfundvo lephakeme kwentelwe kutfolelwa sikhala nekungeniswa kuleso sikolo uma kuphumeleleka.
tgt: isigaba 3: imininingwane eqondene nomfakisicelo kanye nemiphumela kamatikuletsheni kuzoqinisekiswa futhi kudluliselwe esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme nokuqeqesha ngokuzenzakalela ukuze mhlawumbe umfundi abhaliswe noma afakwe esikhungweni.

src: sigaba sesi4: luhlelo lwecach lutawucinisekisa lolwatiso lwemfundzi bese balutfumela etikhungweni letisolo tinetikhala letivulekile.
tgt: isigaba 4: imisebenzi yecach izoqinisekisa imininingwane yomfundi futhi iyidlulisele ezikhungweni ezisenezikhala.

src: lapho kusolo kunetikhala khona kantsi bafundzi banako loku lokudzingekako, tikhungo titawushayela labo labafake ticelo ngco.
tgt: lapho kukhona izikhala, abafakisicelo behlangabezana nakho konke okudingekayo, kuzoxhunywana nezikhungo ngqo.

src: lekufanele ukwati icach angeke yacinisekisa noma bani lofake sicelo kutsi utasitfola sikhala sekufundza.
tgt: amaphuzu okumele aqashelwe icach ayikwazi ukuqinisekisa umfakisicelo ukuthi uzosithola isikhala.

src: icach angeke yati kwekutsi lesikhungo sitamphendvula nini lona lofake sicelo kute bamtfolele indzawo.
tgt: icach ayikwazi ukubona ukuthi isikhungo sizomthinta nini umfakisicelo ukuze mhlawumbe athole isikhala.

src: icach ibasita njani labafake ticelo labangenasiciniseko sekutsi bafundzele ini noma labo labangenako loko lokudzingekako kutsi bangene eluhlelweni lwe pset?
tgt: icach isiza abafakisicelo abangenasiqiniseko sokuthi bafuna ukufundani noma labo abangahlangabezani nalokho okudingekayo ukuze bangene ohlelweni ipset?

src: luhlelo lwecach lusebentisana netinsita tekutfutfukisa emakhono velonkhe (icds) lesita ekuniketeni lwatiso lolufaka ekhatsi yonkhe intfo ngetemisebenti nekululekwa nge: imisebenti nalongakufundzelwa.
tgt: imisebenzi yecach isebenza ngokubambisana nesikhungo sokuthuthukisa imisebenzi kuzwelonke (incds) esiza ngokuhlinzeka ngolwazi lwezemisebenzi olunzulu kanye neseluleko mayelana: imisebenzi kanye nemikhakha efundwayo ukukhetha isifundo.

src: kukhetsa tifundvo.
tgt: ulwazi ngokuhlola kokuchibiyela.

tgt: ukulungiswa kwemiphumela yakamatikuletsheni.

src: kubhalela kutfola imiphumela lencono yamatekuletjeni.
tgt: amathuba okufunda ahlinzekwa uhlelo lwe pset.

src: ematfuba ekufundza laniketwa beluhlelo lwepset.
tgt: izindlela ezingakhethwa zoxhaso kanye nosizo lwezezimali.

src: tindlela tekuniketwa kwetimali nelusito ngetimali tekufundza.
tgt: ulwazi ngezinqubo zesicelo kanye nezinsuku zokuvala.

src: lwatiso lolumayelana netinchubo tekufaka ticelo netinsuku tekuvalwa.
tgt: ukufakwa kwesicelo kwengxenye yesibili yonyaka kanye nezinsuku zokubhalisa.

src: kusutsa kuhambisana nekutfola imiphumela lemihle more matshediso bantfwana labange tulu kwetigidzi leti yimfica kulolonkhe laseningizimu afrika laba setikolweni tahulumende sebayakhona kwenta umse benti wabo kancono, sibo nga loluhlelo lwahulumende lolucinisekisa kwekutsi tisu tabo tihlale tisemfi ngekudla lokunemsoco.
tgt: izisu ezigcwele ziholela emiphumeleni engcono more matshediso bangaphezu kwezigi di abafundi abafu nda ezikoleni zika hulumeni eningizimu afrika yonkana abakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wabo wesikole ngenxa yohlelo lukahulumeni oluqinisekisa ukuthi izisu zabo zigcwele ukudla okunempilo.

src: litiko letemfundvo lesise kelo (idbe), ngekusebentisa luhlelo lwavelonkhe lwe tikolo lwekondla (insnp), liyengcile injongo yalo yekunika kudla bantfwana bakuleli labalinganiselwa kumaphesenti lange75.
tgt: umnyango wezemfundo eyisisekelo (idbe), ngoku sebenzisa uhlelo lokuhli nzeka ngokudla okune mpilo ezikoleni (insnp), usebenze waze weqa umgo mo wawo wokuhlinzeka ngokudla kubafundi bakule li abangama75%.

src: lweni onkhe malanga ba ntfwana labalinganiselwa eti9 032 622 velonkhe.
tgt: umqondisi wensnp kulo mnyango, uneo rakwena, uthe izikole eziyizi20 619 zipheka futhi ziphakele abafundi abalinganiselwa kuzi9 032 622 ezweni nsu ku zonke.

src: utsite tikolo letingasiyo ince nye yaloluhlelo kufanele kutsi tivakashele emahhovisi asesigodzini sabo uma ngabe tifuna kuba yincenye yalo.
tgt: uthe izikole ezingabanda kanywanga ohlelweni ku mele ziqonde emahhovisi esifunda uma zifuna ukuba yingxenye yohlelo.

src: n gemnyakatimali wa nga2015/16, tigidzi letili nganiselwa kur5 703 tafa kwa kuloluhlelo.
tgt: onyakeni wezimali wezi 2015/16, isabelomali esabe lwe lolu hlelo silinganise lwa kuzigidigidi eziyisi 5 703 zamarandi.

src: rakwena utsite lemali lecitfwe kuloluhlelo iyachi tjiyelwa njalo ngemnyaka kute ihambisane nekunyuka kwetintfo, kantsi ibhajethi yanga2017/18 ilinganiselwa kutigidzi letir6.4.
tgt: urakwe na uthe imali esetshenziswa ohlelweni iyakhushulwa minyaka yonke ukuze ku hlangatshezwane nokukhu phuka kwamanani ezinto, is abelomali sonyaka wezimali wezi2017/18 silinganiselwa kuzigidigidi eziyisi6.4 zam arandi.

src: loluhlelo lucedza kulamba kwesikhashana kantsi futsi lufaka sandla kunhlalakahle yebantfwana.
tgt: lolu hlelo luqeda indla la yesikhashana futhi lube negalelo esimweni senhla lakahle yabafundi.

src: "bantfwana labanyenti ba vela emakhaya lahluphekile langakhoni kuba nekudla labangakudla, kantsi ku labanye bafundzi, lokudla labakudla esikolweni ngiko kudla labakudlela lilanga lonkhe.
tgt: uthe, "izingane eziningi zi buya emakhaya adla imbu ya ngothi, futhi kwabanye abafundi, ukudla kwase sikoleni yikho kuphela ukudla abakudlayo ngosu ku.

src: kudla labakudla esi kolweni kuyabasita kutsi bakhone kufundza, kulale lisisa nekutimbandzakanya eklasini," washo njalo.
tgt: ukudla okutholakala esikoleni kubanikeza umd landla wokufunda, bakwazi ukugxilisa umqondo kanye nokuzibandakanya eklasi ni."

src: emanani ebafundzi lababha lisako etikolweni nalabange na sikolo anyukile ngenca yaloluhlelo lwekutfola kudla esikolweni.
tgt: ukubhaliswa esikoleni kanye nokuya esikoleni kwabafundi kuthuthukile ngenxa yohlelo lokuhlinze kwa kwezingane ngokudla.

src: kungasikudzala, ikhabhi nethi ivume kushicilelwa kwe mbiko wekulingani swakwensnp lobhalwe litiko letekuhlela, kuca phela kanye nekulungisa (idpme).
tgt: kamuva nje, ikhabhinethi igunyaze ukushicilelwa kombiko wokuhlola insnp odidiyewe umnyango we zokuhlela, ukuqapha kanye nokuhlola (idpme).

src: uchaza imphume lelo netinyatselo letingatsa tfwa kuphumelelisa lemita mo.
tgt: lo mbiko ubonakalisa impu melelo kanye nezinyathe lo ezithathiwe ukuze ku thuthukiswe lolu hlelo.

src: umcondzisi wekulinganisa kadpme, jabu mathe, utsite injongo lenkhulu yekuli nganisa kwekutsi kuhlolwe kutsi ngabe insnp yenti wa ngalendlela letawuba nemiphumela lekhombisa umehluko lomkhulu kutem philo kantsi kube nenzuzo emfundvweni yebafundzi.
tgt: umqondisi wezokuhlo la kudpme, ujabu mathe, uthe inhlosongqangi yoku hlola wukuhlola ukuthi ingabe insnp iqaliswa ngendlela engaholela em phumeleni omuhle ozohlo mulisa abafundi maqondana nezempilo kanye nezemfu ndo.

src: uphindze wagcizelela kwe kutsi injongo yaloluhlelo seyiphelele kwekutsi kwenti we kancono temphilo nesimo sekudla kahle kwebafundzi labaphuye kakhulu eningi zimu afrika.
tgt: ugcizelele ukuthi inhlo songqangi yohlelo isiyonke ukuthuthukisa isimo seze mpilo kanyene sok ondlek a k wab afun di ababuya eminde nini edla imbuya ngothi eningizimu afrika.

src: loluhlelo lu hlose kufinyelela kubo bonkhe bantfwana laba setikolweni tahulumende letisemkhakheni welizi nga lebuphuya 1 kuya ku3, letilinganiselwa kumaphe senti la60 etikolweni leti phuye kakhulu eningizimu afrika.
tgt: lolu hlelo luqondiswe kubafun di abafunda ezikoleni zika hulumeni eziku quintile 13, okungamaphesenti anga ma60 ezikole ezinezingane eziqhamuka emindenini em pofu eningizimu afrika.

src: loluhlelo luphindze futsi lusite ngekwehlisa buphuya emimangweni ngekwakha ematfuba emsebenti. "
tgt: uhlelo luphinde lusize ukuqeda ubub ha emi phakathini ngokudala ama thuba omsebenzi.

src: lokulinganisa kutfole kwekutsi insnp inika ematfuba kulabatinikele kusebenta ngalokudla la bangetulu kweti50 000 njalo ngemnyaka lekufanele kutsi baphekele bantfwana, kantsi batfola imali yekubabonga lenger960 njalo ngenya nga," kusho mathe.
tgt: "ngenkathi kuhlolwa ku tholakale ukuthi insnp ihlinzeka abantu abalungi selela abafundi ukudla ben gaholelwa, abangaphezu kwezi50 000 minyaka yon ke, ngethuba lokukhokhe lwa isibonelelo semali yokugibela okungama960 amarandi ngenyanga," ku sho umathe.

src: "loku kusho kutsi tigidzi letinger576 ngemnyaka ti yiswa kumholo wekubabo nga kute kuzuze emalunga emmango."
tgt: "sekukonke kwakha inani lwezibonelelo eziyizigidi ezingama 576 zamarandi ngonyaka ezisiza amalungu omphakathi."

src: loluhlelo lukhutsata ku tsi kubekhona lokwentiwa kutemnotfo njengoba boso mabhizinisi labasebancane, labasemkhatsini nalese bakhulile kanye netinhjlanga no letisebenta ngekuhlanga nyela tiyazuza njengebantfu labatfula tinsita kuleto ti fundza ngekutsi umsebe nti uniketwe ngekulingana (kazulunatal, egauteng, empumalanga nasenyaka tfo kapa).
tgt: uhlelo luphinde lusimamise ukuqhutshwa kwemisebe nzi ethuthukisa ezomnotho njengamabhizinisi aman cane nasafufusa kanye nezigungu ezisebenza ngokubambisana, phecelezi amacooperatives okuyi wo azuzayo njengabahli nzeki bemisebenzi kulezo zifundazwe ezinezindawo ezihlinzeka ngemisebenzi eziqhelelene (kwazuluna tali, egauteng, empumala nga nasenyakatho kapa).

src: kutsenga tibhidvo ku leyo ndzawo kunemtselela wekuniketa inzuzo etiko lweni nas em m angweni kubuye kukhulise tekulima etigodzini tasemakhaya.
tgt: ukutholakala kwemifi no endaweni kunamathu ba okuhlomulisa izikole nemiphakathi kuphin de kuthuthukise ezolimo zasendaweni.

src: yolisa uphotsa indlela yakhe leya emphumelelweni dale hes lutsandvo lwebuciko luholele fuma kutsi asungule ibhizinisi lephumelelako.
tgt: uyolisa wenza ubuhlalu obumholela empumelelweni dale hes uyolisa fuma usethuthuke ngo kumangalis ayo ukusukela ekuphileni impi lo yobumpofu empumala nga kapa, ukuya ekutholeni uthando lwezobuciko kanye nomsebenzi wezandla futhi manje useqhuba eyakhe imi hlangano yokucobelelana ngolwazi ukuze abelane ngamakhono akhe nabantu besifazane abangasebenzi.

src: yolisa fuma uhambe luhambo loluma ngalisako kusu kela ekuphileni imphilo yebuphuya emphuma langa kapa, kuya lapho afinyelela kutfola kho na lutsandvo lolukhu lu lwebuc iko nem s e benti wetandla kantsi nya lo ubamba imihlangano sikolwa lapho ashiyelana khona ngemakhono akhe nalabanye bomake labanga sebenti.
tgt: ufuma wazalelwa eloki shini elingaphandle kwase queenstown empumalanga kapa, ehlala endlini encane namalungu omndeni wakhe ayi15.

src: "batali bami bebete imali leyanele yekungitfumela esi kolweni.
tgt: "umndeni wami wawunge nayo imali eyanele yokungi hambisa esikoleni.

src: njengaloku bengi ngakafundzi, kwadzingeka kutsi ngizame yami indlela yekwenta imali," kwasho yena njalo fuma.
tgt: njengoba ngangingafundile, kwadinge ka ukuthi ngithole indlela yami yokwenza imali," kusho ufuma.

src: wacitsa emaawa lamanyenti afundza kukhrosheta wase uya ekapa wayowuhlala na dzadzewabo.
tgt: wachitha amahora amaningi efunda ukukhrosha (uku nitha) wase eya ekapa eyo hlala nodadewabo.

src: fuma waseke utifundzisa kwenta umsebe nti webuhlalu lobuphotsiwe, wase uya embekweni epaarl wayofuna khona emadlelo laluhlata.
tgt: ufuma wabe esezifundisa ukwenza umsebenzi wobuhlalu, wase ethuthela embekweni epaarl ukuyofuna amadlelo aluhlaza.

src: "bebabanyenti bantfu labe bafuna umsebenti webuhlalu lobuphotsiwe.
tgt: "babebaningi abantu ababe funa okwenziwe ngobuhlalu.

src: ngaleyo ndle lake ngase ngibuka imikhici to lembalwa yebuhlalu ngase ngicala ngiyayehlukanisa kahle ngayinye ngayinye kute ngitfole kahle kutsi yentiwe njani.
tgt: ngokhoke ngathatha imi sebenzi embalwa eyenziwe ngobuhlalu ngase ngiyiqaqa isinyathelo ngesinyathe lo ukuze ngithole ukuthi yayenziwe kanjani.

src: ngaseke ngiyatifu ndzisa kutsi ngente yami imi khicito ngase ngicala kuyi tsengisa lapha esikhungweni sasekhwezi epaarl," kwasho yena.
tgt: ngase ngizifundisa ukwenza imi khiqizo yami ngase ngiqala ukuyithengisa eikwezi cen tre epaarl," kusho yena.

src: fuma bekangulomunye webakhiciti bemsebenti weta ndla labasafufusa labange20 labakhetfwe ngumasipala wasekhaya idrankenstein kanye nenhlangano yeteku vakasha yasedrakenstein (idlta), kutsi ahambele luhlelo lwetinsuku letine lwekuceceshwa lebeluhlelwe yicraft and design institute (icdi).
tgt: ufuma wayengomunye wabakhiqiza umsebenzi wezandla abangama 20 abakhethwa ngumasipala wendawo wasedrakenstein kanye nedrakenstein local tourism association (dlta), ukuze bayokwethamela uhlelo lokuqeqesha lwezinsu ku ezine olwalusingethwe yicraft and design institute (icdi).

src: loluhlelo lufundzise labo labalungenele kutsi bakhi cite imikhicito lesibonelo semikhicito letsandzwa batsengi letawubasita kutsi basungule emabhizinisi abo.
tgt: uhlelo lwafundisa ababe bambe iqhaza ukuthi bakhi qize amasampula emikhiqizo ethandwa ngamakhasimende ezosiza abenza umsebenzi wezandla ukuthi bathuthu kise amabhizinisi abo.

src: "lomhlanganosikolwa usifundzise kutsi singabhala njani emapulani emabhizinisi etfu.
tgt: "emhlanganweni wokuco belelana ngolwazi safundiswa ukuthi singazenza kanjani izinhlelo zethu zokuhlelela ibhizinisi.

src: ngiyabonga kakhulu ngalelitfuba lenginikwe lona, ngobe ngitawukhona kuchu ba ibhizinisi yami," kuchaza yena njalo fuma.
tgt: ngibonga kakhulu ngaleli thuba, ngoba sengizo kwazi ukuthuthukisa ibhizini si lami," kuchaza ufuma.

src: imikhicito yakhe yebuhlalu lobuphotsiwe nalakukhro shetile nyalo sekutsengwa batsengi ngisho basegerma ny nabasesweden.
tgt: imikhiqizo yakhe yobu hlalu kanye nekhroshiwe seyithengwe nangamakhasi mende akude akogermany nakosweden.

src: "ngaletinye tikhatsi be kumatima, kodvwa ngenca yekusekelwa bakacdi namasipala, sengicalile kwe nta imadlana lengisita kutsi ngondle bantfwabami labane.
tgt: "bekuba nzima ngesinye isikhathi, kodwa ngenxa yokwesekwa yicdi kanye nomasipala, sengikwazile ukuqala ukwenza imali kanye nokweseka izingane zami ezine.

src: emaphupho ami lamanyenti asayafezeka nyalo," kwasho yena fuma njalo.
tgt: sekufezeka namani ngi amaphupho ami," kusho ufuma.

src: yolisa wancuma kutsi ufuna kwendlulisela lwati lwakhe kanye nemakhono akhe kubomake bendzawo labangasebenti, kute kutsi nabo bacale bente imali labayidzingako yekondla imindeni yabo.
tgt: uyolisa wanquma ukuthi ufuna ukwedlulisela ulwa zi kanye namakhono akhe kubantu besifazane abanga sebenzi basendaweni, ukuze nabo baqale ukuzenzela imali abayidingayo ukuze beseke imindeni yabo.

src: lutsandzo lwekuhlanyela tibhidvo lwamholela ebhizinisini lephumelelako hlengiwe ngobese ngesikhatsi ntombi fikile ngaleka acala ahlanyela tibhidvo ejalidini lakhe bekangaca bangi kutsi ngalelinye lilanga utawuba ngumnikati webhi zinisi yekulima lephakela ti tolo tendzawo kanye netikolo lapho bantfwana badla khona.
tgt: uthando lukangaleka lokulima imifino lwamqhubela ebhizinisini hlengiwe ngobese ngesikhathi unto mbifikile ngaleka eqala ukutshala imifino egcekeni lakhe wayengazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga uzoba nebhizinisi lezolimo elithengisela izi tolo zendawo kanye nezi nhlelo zokupha abafundi ukudla ezikoleni.

src: ng aleka (loneminyaka yebudzala lenge67) udzabuka kwaxolo eport shepstone, kwa zulunatal.
tgt: ungaleka (oneminya ka yobudala engama67) ngowakwaxolo eport shepstone, esifundazweni sakwazulunatali.

src: uhlanyela sipinashi, emakha bishi, ticadze, ematamatisi, emaanyanisi, emabhontjisi nabhanana.
tgt: ulima isipinashi, iklabishi, izaqathi, utamatisi, uanya nisi, ubhontshisi kanye nobhanana.

src: ibhizinisi yakhe izuze umklomelo wekuba ngu mkhiciti lophuma embili nga 2016 ngesikhatsi semiklomelo yabosomabhizinisi labasikati, ifemale entreprenuers awards, yelitiko letekulima lakwazu lunatal.
tgt: ibhizinisi lakhe liphumelele umklomelo wokhiqiza imifino ehamba phambili ngowezi2016 ngesikhathi semiklomelo yefemale entrepreneurs awards yomnyango wezoli mo wakwazulunatali.

src: ngaleka utsite manje ngesikhat si acala ahlanyela tibhidvo, bekafuna kusita umndeni wakhe kutsi utfole kudla lokusandza kuvunwa kodvwa lutsandvo lwakhe lolukhulu lwamholela kulebhizinisi yakhe.
tgt: ungaleka uthe ngesikhathi eqala ukutshala imifino, wayefuna ukusiza umndeni wakhe ukuthi uthole imi funo kodwa le ntshisekelo yakhe yamqhubela ebhizi nisini.

src: uphindze futsi wacasha bomake lababili kutsi basebente kulelipulazi lakhe.
tgt: useqashe nabantu besifazane ababili bendawo abasebenza epulazini lakhe.

src: "kwanyalo ngisahlanyela umkhicito wami emhla beni lomahektha lamabili kodvwa awukaneli.
tgt: "okwamanje ngitshala imifino yami emhlabeni ongamahekthare amabili kodwa awanele.

src: bantfu bafuna tibhidvo tami ngobe angibasebentisi bomanyolo bemakhemikhali ngisebe ntisa umcuba lengiwutsatsa esibayeni setinkhomo," kwasho yena.
tgt: abantu bafuna imifino yami ngoba angisebenzisi umanyolo ona makhemikhali ngisebenzisa umquba ovela ezibayeni," kusho yena.

src: ngaleka use waba nguthishela ngaphambilini bekanelutsandvo lolukhulu lwekulima ngesikha tsi asasebenta njengathishela lapha esikolweni salabancane egcilima primary.
tgt: ungaleka, owayenguthi sha, uthi waba nothando lwezolimo ngesikhathi esasebenza njengothisha egcilima primary.

src: "bengitsi nangiphuma esi kolweni ngiye emasimini.
tgt: "bengibuya esikoleni bese ngiya emasimini.

src: benginenshisekelo lenkhulu yekudla kudla lokunemphilo.
tgt: ngangikuthanda kakhulu ukudla ukudla okunempi lo.

src: ngesikhatsi ngifinyelela emnya keni wekutsatsa umhlalaphasi lebengikufuna nje kutsi ngibe ngumlimi ngesikhatsi sami le siseceleni.
tgt: ngesikhathi sengithatha umhlalaphansi into kuphela engangifuna ukuyenza uku lima ngesikhathi engangi ngenzi lutho ngaso".

src: "ngacala ngesipinashi, ikhabi shi nebhithiruthi ngakutsengisa emtfolamphilo wendzawo.
tgt: "ngaqala ngesipinashi, iklabishi kanye nobeetroot ngase ngiyokudayisa emtho lampilo wendawo.

src: onkhe malanga bengi buyela emuva ekhaya bangi ts engele s onkhe s ito ko sami.
tgt: ngangi buya uphele wonke umkhi qizo wami nsuku zonke.

src: loko kwangikhu tsata kutsi ngihlanyele kakhulu," kwasho yena njalo.
tgt: lokhu kwangigqugquzela ukuthi ngitshale nakakhu lu," kusho yena.

src: ngaleka uchaza kutsi kulima tibhidvo kunetinsayeya kwato noko.
tgt: ungaleka uchaza ukuthi ukutshala imifino kunezi nselele zako.

src: "tibhidvo balimi labanyenti abatijabuleli kutihlanyela ngobe tidzinga simo selitulu lesihle.
tgt: "imifino ayithandwa aba limi abaningi ngoba isimo sezulu kumele sibe sihle.

src: akukafuni kutsi kubandze kakhulu nome kushise kakhulu," kwasho yena.
tgt: kumele singabandi noma singashisi kakhulu," kusho yena.

src: ngaleyo nzuzo ngaleka layi tfola kulebhizinisi yakhe yekuli ma sewukhone kuphindza futsi atsenge emahektha emhlaba la matsatfu langetiwe lapho atawu hlanyela khona tihlahla telitiya.
tgt: ngenzuzo ungaleka aye nze ebhizinisini lezolimo usethenge amanye amahe kthare amathathu omhla ba lapho ezotshala khona izihlahla zetiye.

src: "ngiphindze futsi ngatfola titolo lapho ngitawubaphakela khona ngaletihlahla telitiya.
tgt: "sengithole nendawo engi zoyithengisela izihlahla ze tiye.

src: tivakashi taphesheya atiwuvali umlomo ngemphatfo yeningizimu afrika dale hes takhamuti tamasipa la wemalokishi asegeorge enshonala nga kapa titawube tinika ti vakashi taphesheya busuku letingeke tibukhohlwe nga lomklamo wedine with lo cals.
tgt: abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle abawuvali umlomo ngezibiliboco zakuleli dale hes abantu basemaloki shini akumasipala wasegeorge entsho nalanga kapa bazozwisa aba vakashi baphesheya kwezi lwandle ubusuku abangeke baphinde babukhohlwe ngecebo ledine with locals.

src: lomklamo uyincenye yekubungata inyanga ye tekuvakasha lapho masipa la akhetsa khona emacembu lasitfupha lasuka elokishini lasethembalethu nasepaca ltsdorp kutsi amukele ti vakashi letivela phesheya ngesidlo lesinato tonkhe ti biliboco kanye nekwenta imidlalo yekujabulisa leti vakashi.
tgt: leli su liyingxenye yoku gubha inyanga yezokuvaka sha lapho umasipala eqoke amathimba ayisithupha aselokishini lasethemba lethu nasepacaltsdorp uku ba amukele abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle ngesidlo esihamba nazo zonke izibiliboco kanye nezikaqedisizungu.

src: kutilungiselela kwamukela letivakashi, lamacembu ange nele emaseshini ekuticecesha lamayelana netekuvakasha netekudla.
tgt: njengengxenye yokulungi selela ukubungaza lokhu, amathimba abehambele ukuqeqeshwa okuhlobene nezokuvakasha nokupheka.

src: lamacembu afundziswe emakhono lahambisana neku cala nekuchuba emabhizinisi, ngenhloso yekutsi aphume lele kwenta imali kulemboni yetekuvakasha.
tgt: bafundiswa amakhono ahambisana nokuqala kanye nokuqhuba ibhizinisi, lapho injongo kungukukwazi uku gcina behlomula ngomholo embonini yezokuvakasha.

src: nomzamo entile (lone minyaka yebudzala lenge31) loyincenye yalamacembu la sitfupha ungumholi welice mbu iexplore our hood, la sethembalethu.
tgt: unomzamo entile (one minyaka yobudala enga ma31) oyingxenye yamaqe mbu ayisithupha uhola ithi mba leexplore our hood, eli qhamuka ethembalethu.

src: entile wacala iexplore our hood kute agcu gcutele umoya wekusebenti sana egeorge.
tgt: uentile wasungula iexplore our hood ukuze akhuthaze umoya wobunye egeorge.

src: "sabona kutsi bekuneku ngavani kumimango leye hlukahlukene yasegeorge.
tgt: "saqaphela ukuthi kwaku negebe phakathi kwemi phakathi eminingi yasegeorge.

src: sifuna bantfu bete emaloki shini batobona kutsi sinelisiko lesixhosa lelinemandla leku fanele kutsi batibonele lona," kwasho entile.
tgt: sifuna abantu beze emalokishini bazobona uku thi sinesiko lamaxhosa eliqa vile okufanele beze bazozi bonela lona," kusho uentile.

src: kumalungiselelo enyanga yetekuvakasha, lelicembu sevele lente timbili tindlela tekuhlola kutilungiselela, lamukela emalunga emboni yetekuvakasha.
tgt: njengoba sekusondela inya nga yezokuvakasha, ithimba selivele liphothule ngempu melelo izivivinyo ezimbili zokulinga lolu hlelo, lemuke la amalungu abevakashile evela embonini yezokuvaka sha.

src: "sikulungele kuvakashe lwa futsi siyatfokota kakhu lu kwamukela tivakashi taphesheya.
tgt: "sizibona sesikulungele futhi sinentokozo enkulu yokwamukela abavakashi baphesheya kwezilwandle.

src: kudlala ngemagagasi kususa bantfwana emgwaceni vuyo ndlovu kuntjweza emantini akusiwo umdlalo noma indlela yeku tijabulisa kulusha loluhlala emkhatsini kwelidolobha kati lasedurban kwazu lunatal kodvwa kuyindle la yekubalekela kuganga.
tgt: amagagasi agcina izingane zingabi uvanzi emgaqweni vuyo ndlovu lukuhuhuluza emanzini akuwona nje umdlalo noma umkhuba woku zithokozisa kubantu abasha abahlala enkabeni yedolo bha lasedurban esifunda zweni sakwazulunatali kodwa futhi kungenye ye zindlela zokubalekela izi nkinga zomphakathi.

src: isurfers not street chi ldren yinhlangano lebo nelela kuphakelwa kweti fundvo tekuntjweza tama hhala ebantfwaneni labahla la emigwaceni nelusha le libondzinga sitsebeni leli tfolakala emkhatsini kwale lidolobhakati.
tgt: isurfers not street chi ldren iyinhlangano ehli nzeka ngezifundo zamahha la zokuhuhuluza emaga gasini ezinganeni ezihlala emgaqweni kanye nentsha eswele ehlala khona enka beni yedolobha.

src: lenhlangano ibukene ngco nekulwa nekuswelakala kwemakhaya ebantfwaneni futsi icinisekisa kutsi lusha lwenta lokutsite lokwakha ko ngetimphilo talo.
tgt: inhlangano iwumzamo ngqo wokubhekana nokwa nda kwezingane ezingena makhaya futhi uqinisekisa ukuthi intsha yenza okuthi le okuhle ngezimpilo zayo.

src: masipala wasethekwini madvute nje ucedza kwese kela lenhlangano ngekuni kela ngemabhodi eku ntjweza lali10.
tgt: umasipala wetheku usa nda kweseka le nhlangano ngokunikela ngamabhodi okuhuhuluza emagagasini ayi10.

src: lamabhodi entelwe ku tsi asebente kutfutfukisa tekuntjweza futsi entiwe ngeligwebu lelenta ku tsi labo labasafundza ku ntjweza bandande emantini bangangcwili.
tgt: amabhodi akhelwe izi nhloso zokuthuthuka fu thi akhiwe ngegwebu futhi asiza abahuhuluzi abasa yizimfundamakhwela uku ba bakwazi ukuntanta phe zu kwamanzi.

src: umphatsi walomasipa la welitiko lekutfutfukisa temidlalo nekukhibika te ddi adams watsi lamabhodi atawusita labo labanesifiso sekuntjweza.
tgt: imenenja yomnyango we zokuthuthukiswa kweze midlalo nezokungcebeleka kumasipala uteddi adams uthe amabhodi lawa azosi za abahuhuluzi abasafu fusa.

src: "lomnikelo uyincenye yendlelamasu yamasipa la yekutfutfukisa temi dlalo nekucinisekisa ku tsi lonkhe lusha, ngapha ndle kwekubuka buhla nga nelizinga letenhla lo, luyafinyelela kutinsi ta ngalokulinganako kute lusitakale lwente kancono kuluhlobo lwemdlalo lelu wutsandzako.
tgt: "umnikelo lo uyingxenye yecebo likamasipala lo kuthuthukisa ezemidlalo kanye nokuqinisekisa uku thi yonke intsha, kunga khathalekile ubuhlanga ne zinga, iyakwazi ukufinye lela izinsiza ezizoyileke lela ibe yimiqabavu emi dlalweni eyikhethile.

src: "langelihle nkosi (lone minyaka yebudzala le16) lomntjwezi ubonge lomasi pala ngalomnikelo.
