tgt: "ulangelihle nkosi (one minyaka yobudala eyi16) naye ongumhuhuluzi ubonge umasipala ngalo mnikelo.

src: "kuyangitfokotisa kuta kutifundvo tekuntjweza ngoba tiyangincedza ku gcina umtimba wami usesimeni lesikahle fu tsi ngiyatsandza kudlala ngemagagasi."
tgt: "ngiyakuthokozela ka khulu ukuhambela izifu ndo zokuhuhuluza emgaga sini ngoba zingisiza ngiqine emzimbeni futhi ngiyaku thanda kakhulu ukuhuhu luza emagagasini."

src: nkosi wa gcugcutela labanye laba nesifiso sekuntjweza kutsi bete babeyincenye bafundze kabanti ngekuntjweza.
tgt: unkosi ukhuthaze abanye abahu huluzi abasafufusa ukuba beze bazoba yingxenye yalo mkhankaso futhi bafunde kabanzi ngokuhuhuluza emagagasini.

src: sandile mqadi umceceshi wesurfers not street chi ldren club, watsi lenhla ngano beyihlose kufu ndzisa bantfwana emakho no ekuntjweza njengendle la yekubasusa emgwaceni.
tgt: usandile mqadi ongumqe qeshi wokuhuhuluza ema gagasini wesurfers not street children club, uthe inhlangano yayisophe uku fundisa izingane amakhono okuhuhuluza emagagasini njengendlela yokuzikhipha emgaqweni.

src: "sisita bantfwana la bahlala emigwaceni nala bo lababuya kumimango lephuyile.
tgt: "sihlinzekela izingane ezi hlala emgaqweni kanye na labo abavela emiphakathini eyayinganakiwe ngapha mbilini.

src: tinsita tetfu atikhokhelwa kantsi futsi samukela bantfu labasha labaneminyaka yebudzala lesuka kulesihlanu kuya ku lenge23," kwasho mqadi.
tgt: izinsiza zethu zimahhala futhi yonke intsha eneminyaka esuka kwemihlanu iya kwenga ma23 yamukelekile," ku sho umqadi.

src: wangeta ngekutsi lama bhodi masipala lanikele ngawo atawusita imitamo yabo futsi bantfwana la baningi batawukhona kuba yincenye yaloluhlelo.
tgt: wengeze ngokuthi ama bhodi okuhuhuluza anike lwe umasipala azolekelela imizamo yabo kanti ziningi izingane esezizokwazi uku ba yingxenye yohlelo.

src: isurfers not street chi ldren club yetfula tifu ndvo tekuntjweza kusu ka ngemsombuluko kuya kulesihlanu ngensimbi ye08h30 kanye neye13h30.
tgt: isurfers not street chi ldren club inikeza izifundo zokuhuhuluza emagagasini kusukela ngomsombuluko kuya kulwesihlanu ngo08h30 kanye nango13h30.

src: litiko letemphilo elimpopo libeka kumunyisa ezingeni lelisha lekungaze kufikwe kulo kanego lewele namore matshediso kumunyisa kumco ka ekukhuleni lokunemphilo kwemntfwana nasekudleni kwetinswane kodvwa bo make labaningi labasebe ntako batfola bumatima ku chubeka nalenchubo emva kwekuphela kwelivi se babuyela emsebentini.
tgt: ezempilo elimpopo sezidlulisele ukunceli sa ibele eqophelweni eliphakeme kanego lewele no more matshediso ukuncelisa ibele yikonakona kudla okunomsoco noku thuthukisa impilo yezinsa na kodwa komama abaningi abasebenzayo kuba nzima ukuqhubeka nokuncelisa ibele lapho sebebuyela e msebenzini emva kokuphela kwekhefu langemva kokube letha.

src: loku kubangwa kutsi kute tindzawo letikahle eti ndzaweni letiningi bomake labanentinswane labasebe ntela kuto lapho bangakha ma lubisi noma bamunyise bantfwana babo ngesikhatsi semsebenti, kubenta balahle kelwe sifiso sekuchubeka bamunyise ngenca yekutsi bacitsa sikhatsi lesinyenti basemsebentini bantfwana bangekho nabo.
tgt: lokhu kungenxa yokuthi azikho izindawo ezifane lekile emsebenzini lapho omama abaseyimidlezane bengakwazi ukukhama ubi si noma bancelisele khona izingane zabo ngesikhathi somsebenzi, ngenxa yalo khoke baye badikibale uku ncelisa ngoba phela bachitha ingxenye enkulu yesikhathi besemsebenzini bengahleli nezingane zabo.

src: kumtamo wetfu wekubuka na nalenseyeya, litiko le temphilo laselimpopo li sungule ligumbi lelilekuca la lekumunyisa nekukhama lubisi emahhovisini alo.
tgt: njengomzamo wokubhe kana nale nselele, umnya ngo wezempilo elimpopo sewethule undabizekwayo wokuqala ngqa oyigumbi lokuncelisela noma lo kukhamela khona ubisi nga phakathi emahhovisi akho na.

src: leligumbi lekumunyisa le tfulwe ngumphatsiswatiko dkt.
tgt: igumbi lokuncelisela lethulwa ngungqongqoshe wezempilo esifundazweni udkt phophi ramathuba.

src: licanjwe ngeligama lama ke albertina sisulu lesigu bha umkhosi weminyaka le likhulu yekutalwa kwakhe lomnyaka.
tgt: liqanjwe ngomama a lbertina sisulu esigubha imi nyaka elikhulu yokuzalwa kwakhe kulo nyaka.

src: siyatsemba kutsi leligu mbi angeke lisekele kuphe la bomake labamunyisako, kodvwa litawugcugcutela la manye ematiko kutsi asekele bomake labamunyisako eti ndzaweni labasebentela kuto.
tgt: kwethenjwa ukuthi igu mbi leli ngeke nje ligcine ngo kweseka omama abancelisayo abasebenzayo kuphela, ko dwa lizophinde likhutha ze neminye iminyango ukuba yeseke abesifazane abancelisayo ezindaweni zomsebenzi.

src: tisebenti talelitiko tingavu mela bantfu labasala neba ntfwana kutsi baletse ti nswane emsebentini nge tikhatsi tekudla kute timu nyiswe.
tgt: abasebenzi bomnya ngo bangakwazi nokuba abazanyana babo babale thele izingane emsebenzini ngesikhathi sesidlo sasemini ukuze bazincelise ibele.

src: leligumbi linga setjentiswa futsi bomake labafuna kukhama lubisi ngesikhatsi semsebenti.
tgt: igu mbi lizophinde lisetshe nziswe nangomama abafuna ukukhama ubisi ngesikhathi somsebenzi.

src: lomunye wetisebenti talelitiko mpho kutumela longumake wemawele lane tinyanga leti11, umfana nentfombatane, uyalitfokote la leligumbi.
tgt: omunye wabasebenzi bo mnyango umpho kutumela nongumama wamawele a nezinyanga eziyi11 ubuda la, umfana nentombazane, wesese kakhulu ngale nsiza.

src: "leligumbi litasisebe ntela sibomake ngoba li tawuphindza lisinike litfuba lekukhama lubisi ngekukhu luleka endzaweni lelungele loko," washo njalo.
tgt: "igumbi lokuncelisela li zoba wusizo kakhulu kithina bomama ngoba lizophinde lisinikeze ithuba lokukhama ubisi lwebele ngokukhulule ka futhi endaweni ekukhu thazayo lokhu," kusho yena.

src: bomake labavakashela li tiko nganoma ngabe ngutiphi tizatfu bahamba nebantfwa na babo nabo batawuvunye lwa kusebentisa leligumbi kumunyisa bantfwana.
tgt: omama abavakashela u mnyango behamba nezi ngane zabo ngenxa yanoma yiziphi izizathu nabo ba zovunyelwa ukusebenzisa igumbi leli ukuze bancelise izingane zabo ibele.

src: umphatsiswatiko ramathu ba watsi ialbertina sisulu breastfeeding room ngiyo yodvwa kuso sonkhe si fundza.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wesifunda zwe uramathuba uthe igu mbi ialbertina sisulu breastfeeding room yilo lo dwa esifundazweni.

src: umphatsiswasito utsemba kutsi lomkhankhaso uta wugcugcutela kukhula neku vikela tindlela letivulekile tekumunyisa ngenhloso yekuzuza kukhula loku mcoka lokunemphilo e mntfwaneni.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wesifu ndazwe uramathuba wethe mba ukuthi lo mzamo uzo ba negalelo emkhankasweni wokukhuthazwa nokuvike lwa kwezinqubo zokuncelisa ibele lingaxutshwe nalutho ngenjongo yokuba impilo yengane ithuthuke kahle.

src: "lubisi lwelibele lunayo yonkhe imisoco ledzingwa tinswane futsi ayikho lenye indlela lelingentiwa ngayo ngaphandle kwekumunyi sa," kwaso umphatsiswa tiko.
tgt: "ubisi lwebele luqukethe wonke umsoco odingwa usa na futhi ayikho enye indlela yokulukhiqiza ngaphandle kokwemvelo," kusho ungqo ngqoshe wesifundazwe.

src: kubhalisa umshado wesintfu kuvikela imindeni dale hes eningizimu afrika, imishado yesintfu iyincenye leyamuke lekile kumasiko nemigu bho yesintfu.
tgt: ukubhalisa umshado wesi ntu kuvikela imindeni dale hes eningizimu afrika, imishado yesintu yamukeleka nje ngenxenye yamasiko nenda buko.

src: noma kunja lo, kubalulekile kwati kwe kutsi lemishado kufanele iphatfwe ngekulingana nangalokusemtsetfweni, kute kwekutsi lamalunge lo abo bobabili lekuyindvo dza nemfati bavikelekile.
tgt: nokho, kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi le misha do iqhutshwe ngendlela efanele nesemthethweni, ukuze amalungelo endoda nonkosikazi avikeleke.

src: umcondzisi ngetemtsetfo kukhomishana yekulinga na ngekwebulili marissa van niekerk, uchaza imi shado yesintfu netintfo letibalulekile lekufanele bantfu batati.
tgt: umqondisi wezomthetho wekhomishana yezokuli ngana ngokobulili umari ssa van niekerk, uchaza imi shado yesintu kanye nama phuzu abalulekile okumele abantu bawakhumbule.

src: vuk: iyini imishado yesi ntfu?
tgt: vuk: iyini imishado yesintu?

src: mvn: imishado yesintfu yenti wa ngekusebentisa emasiko nemihambo lehlonishwako kubantfu baseningizimu afrika.
tgt: mvn: imishado yesintu iqhu tshwa ngokosiko nangoku sebenzisa izindlela zesintu ezilandelwa izakhamuzi za seningizimu afrika.

src: vuk: nguyiphi imitsetfo leku fanele lemishado ihambisane nayo?
tgt: vuk: le mishado kumele ila ndele emiphi imithetho?

src: mvn: imishado yesi ntfu ilawulwa ngemtsetfo wekunakwa kwemishado yesintfu, 120 wanga1998.
tgt: mvn: imishado yesintu ilawu lwa ngokomthetho wokwazi sa imishado yesintu we1998 (umthetho 120 wowe1998).

src: letidzingo letilandzelako kufanele kufinyelelwe kuto: ■ emacala omabili kufanele avume kutsi ayashada.
tgt: kumele kwaneliseke izidingo ezilandelayo: ■ bobabili abathintekayo ku mele bavumelane ngoku shadana ■ bobabili abashadayo kumele babe neminyaka engaphezu kweyi18, ngaphandle kwalapho abazali noma abanakekeli ngokomthetho behlinzeke ngemvume lapho oyedwa noma bobabili bebancane ngokomthetho.

src: ■ labalingani bobabili ku fanele babe ngetulu kwe minyaka le18, ngaphandle kwekutsi labatali noma bondli ngalokusemtse tfweni baniketa imvume uma ngabe munye noma bobabili bangebantfwana.
tgt: ■ umshado kumele ubha liswe kumnyango wezase khaya ezinyangeni ezi ntathu kushadiwe ukuze kuvikelwe izintshisekelo zabashadikazi, izingane kanye namalungu omnde ni uma kwenzeka kuba nesahlukaniso somshado noma ukufa.

src: ■ lomshado kufanele ubha liswe kulitiko letase khaya kungakapheli tinyanga letintsatfu kute kuvikelwe tinshisekelo tebalingani, bantfwana nemndeni uma kwentekile kwaba nekudivosa neku fa.
tgt: ■ lapho kubhaliswa umsha do, abashadikazi kumele baphathe amakhophi oma zisi kanye nesivumelwano selobolo (uma sikhona).

src: lokungenani kufanele kube nafakazi munye lovela emndenini ngamunye.
tgt: kumele kube nofakazi oyedwa okungenani ovela emndenini ngamunye.

src: ■ indvodza lefuna kushada umshado wesintfu wesibi li nalomunye umfati ku fanele ibhalele enkhantolo ifake sicelo.
tgt: ■ umyeni ofuna ukushada ngokwesintu okwesibili nomunye unkosikazi kumele afake isicelo enka ntolo.

src: ■ bantfu labayincenye ye mshado wesilungu angeke bashade umshado wesi ntfu.
tgt: ■ abantu abashade umshado wesilungu abanakungena emshadweni wesintu.

src: lomtsetfo wekunaka u mshado wesintfu ubeka kwe kutsi bobabili laba labasha dile banemalungelo lafanako njengendvodza nemfati.
tgt: umthetho wokwaziswa kwemishado yesintu uthi bobabili abathintekayo e mshadweni banamalungelo alinganayo njengendoda ne nkosikazi.

src: vuk: ngutiphi tinkinga leti ngaba khona emshadweni wesintfu?
tgt: vuk: ngeziphi izinkinga ezi ngase zivele emshadweni wesintu?

src: mvn: kungabhaliswa kuba nga tinkhinga letinkhulu.
tgt: mvn: ukungabhaliswa ko mshado kudala izinkinga ezi nkulu.

src: kubhaliswa kuniketa bufa kazi bekutsi lomshado ukho na, kucinisekisa kwekutsi umshado longakabhaliswa ukhona kulukhuni.
tgt: ukubhalisa kuhli nzeka ngobufakazi bokuthi impela umshado ukhona, ngakho kuba nzima ukufa kazela ubukhona bomshado ongabhalisiwe.

src: loku ku tawuba nemtselela emandleni enkhantolo ekukhona ku vikela balingani nabadivosa, kuhlomula kulifa laloshonile kanye nemalungelo ebantfwa na nemalunga emndeni.
tgt: lokhu ku zoba nomthelela emandleni enkantolo okuvikela amalu ngelo abashadikazi lapho behlukanisa umshado, ukwa biwa kwamafa lapho ku nomshadikazi oshonile kanye namalungelo ezingane kanye namalungu omndeni.

src: lolunye ludzaba lolubalule kile emshwadweni wesintfu kwekutsi ebalingani abakuvi sisi kudivosa nekwehlukana.
tgt: enye inkinga engase ibe khona wukuthi abashada umshado wesintu bavame ukupha mbanisa ukwahlukanisa u mshado nokwahlukana ngale komthetho.

src: kubalulekile kuveta kwekutsi yinkhantolo lenemandla nemvume kuphela lengani keta idivosi.
tgt: kubalulekile uku gqamisa ukuthi yinkantolo kuphela enamandla okwa hlukanisa umshado.

src: hulumende welekelela emakhaya dale hes ngenca yekwenyuka kwentsengo yeku dla netintfo tase khaya hulumende usebe nta ngekutikhandla kwe hlisa lomtfwalo wetimali lobekwe emahlombe eba ntfu baseningizimu afri ka ngenca yekungatsa tfwa kwentsela yeku dla lokutsite.
tgt: uhulumeni usiza imindeni dale hes njengoba izindleko zokuphila zikhu phuka uhulume ni usebenza ngokuzikha ndla ukunciphisa umthwa lo wezezimali othwelwe izakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika ngokuthi kube ne mpahla ethile ezoba sesiga beni sokungakhokhelwa i ntela yokuthenga.

src: kugatsatselwa intsela kuhlo se kwe lekele la emakha ya lanemholo lo mncane, bese aci tsa incenye lenkhulu yemali lebayiholako eti ntfweni tasekhaya.
tgt: inhloso yokuthi kube nesi gaba sempahla engakhokhe lwa intela yokuthenga wu kusiza imindeni ehola imali encane, esebenzisa ingxenye enkulu yomholo ukuthenga impahla yasendlini.

src: tintfo letingatsatselwa i ntsela atifakelwa i15% yentsela ntsengo (ivat).
tgt: impahla efakwe esiga beni sokunga yikhokhi inte la yokuthenga ayikhokhelwa i15% yente la yentengo (ivat).

src: loku ku hloswe kusi ta ba ntfu ba seni ngizimu afrika kutsi bonge i mali.
tgt: ku hloswe ukuthi ilekelele izakha muzi zase ningizimu afrika ukulo ndoloza imali.

src: kunetinhlo bo teku dla lokuba lulekile leti19 leti ngafake lwa ivat letifaka ekha tsi loku: u mbila, sitambu, lilayisi, sinkhwa lesimnyama, ti tselo, tibhidvo, ti nhlanti nemacandza.
tgt: kunezinhlo bo zokudla eziyi19 ezi ngakhokhelwa ivat ezibanda kanya: impu phu, isitam bu, irayisi, isi nkwa esinsu ndu, izithelo, imifino, i nhlanzi esekanini namaqa nda.

src: kwengeta, tintfo letifa na nedizili, phethiloli napharafini, kanye na letinye tinsita letifaka ekha tsi kucashwa kwendzawo yekuhlala, sitimela neteku tfutsa tasemgwacweni neti nsita tekufundza, nato ange ke tiyikhokhe ivat.
tgt: phezu kwalokho, impahla enjengodizili, uphethilomu nopharafini, kanye nezihli nzekelo ezithile okubanda kanya imiqasho, ezoku thutha ngojantshi nango mgwaqo kanye nezemfu ndo, azikhokhelwa ivat.

src: ngenyanga yendlova na hulumende umemetele kwekutsi utawukhuphu la ivat kusukela ku14% kuya ku15%.
tgt: kunhlolanja uhulumeni wamemezela ukuthi uzo nyusa ivat isuke ku14% iye ku15%.

src: hulumende ubuye wabona kwekut si emakhaya laphuyile atawucindzeteleka kakhulu ngetimali.
tgt: uhulumeni uya zi ukuthi imindeni eswe le izosindwa kakhulu kwezezimali.

src: kwehlisa lokwenyu ka kwemazinga ekuphi la, ndvuna wetimali nhlanhla nene ucoke litsimba lelitawukhi pha tiphakamiso kwe kutsi ngutiphi letinye tintfo tasekhaya leti ngangetwa kuleti leti ngatsatselwa intsela.
tgt: ukuze kuthulwe umthwa lo wokunyuka kwezindleko zokuphila, ungqongqoshe wezezimali unhlanhla nene waqoka ithimba elalizoqha muka nezincomo zokuthi ngeziphi ezinye izimpahla ezidingeka emakhaya okwa kumele zifakwe esigabeni sokungakhokhelwa ivat.

src: ngekuva kwelucwaningo lolubanti nekutsintsana ne bantfu, lelitsimba lancoma kwekutsi letinye tintfo tifa kwe kuloluhla.
tgt: emuva kocwaningo olu nzulu nokubonisana no mphakathi, leli thimba lancoma ukuthi kunenye impahla okumele ifakwe ohlwini.

src: sithibe uphila imphilo yakhe lencono njengomuntfu lonealbinism galoome shopane lerato sithibe uyintfo mbatane lenealbinism.
tgt: usithibe uphila impilo emnandi kakhulu enebala elimhlophe galoome shopane ulerato sithibe ungu muntu wesifazane ophila nebala eli mhlophe, ialbinism.

src: uyatigcabha ngekuba nalo mba la esikhu njeni sa khe futsi akavume li tinkho lelo leti ngasiliciniso kutsi timtsi kamete.
tgt: uyazigqaja ngebala lakhe ngokungavumeli ezinkoleloze zilawule impilo yakhe.

src: "kubalule kile kubantfu labafana na mi kutsi banga vumi kutsi labanye ba chaze kutsi babobani.
tgt: uthe, "kubalulekile ukuthi abantu abanjengami banga bavumeli abanye abantu ukuthi balawule ububona.

src: ti gcabhe ngekuba nealbinism ngoba wakheke waba mu hle," asho alandzisa.
tgt: zigqaje ngebala lesikhumba sakho ngoba wakhiwe ngobuhle obumangalisayo."

src: sithibe (loneminyaka lenge28) lohlala ekroonstad esifundzeni sasefreyistata, uchaza kwekutsi simo sakhe sihamba emndenini lapho khona umuntfu wakhona uba nemelanin lenganele le menta abe mhlophe esikhu njeni sakhe, etinweleni noma emehlweni.
tgt: usithibe (oneminyaka yobudala engama28) wasekroo nstad efreyistata, uchaze ukuthi isimo sakhe siwufuzo lokuthi umuntu usuka engenazo izakhi ezanele zokukhiqiza umbala wesikhumba, izinwele noma namehlo.

src: "asisiwo umutsi noma bantfu labafana netilwane letingatiwa kutsi tivelaphi njengoba bantfu bacabanga.
tgt: "asiwona umuthi noma izilwane njengokokucabanga kwabantu.

src: singebantfu njengalabanye bantfu.
tgt: singabantu njengabo bonke ababantu.

src: "sithibe wenta tintfo letinyenti.
tgt: "usithibe utholakala emikhakheni eminingi.

src: ungunobuhle lobuye asebentise timphahla tekugcoka tesimanje kwatisa nekucwayisa ngebantfu la banealbinism kantsi ubuye amelele bantfu labaphila nekukhubateka efreyistata.
tgt: uwunobuhle omodelayo, osebenzisa imfashi ni ukuqwashisa abantu ngokuba nebala elimhlophe futhi uyi sishoshovu sabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka efreyistata.

src: utsi ukhulele emndenini lonelutsandvo longazange umente ative anemehluko noma angatsandvwa kahle ngoba amhlophe esikhu njeni.
tgt: uthe wakhula emndenini ongazange umenze azizwele ehlukile noma engathandwa ngokwanele ngenxa yokuba nebala elimhlophe.

src: "bengingavisisi kwekutsi kungani umbala wesikhu mba sami wehlukile kunala banye bantfu, kungani njalo uma ngiphumela ngapha ndle bantfu bangibite nge magama futsi bangibuke njengesihambi.
tgt: "ngangingaqondi ukuthi kungani ibala lesikhumba sami lehlukile kunelabanye abantu, ukuthi kungani ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ngiphumela phandle abantu bangibize ngamagama angalungile futhi bangibuke njengomuntu ongafanelwe ukuba kuleyo ndawo.

src: "lokwecwaswa lokubekwa kubantfu labanealbinism kwenta sithibe awubonge kakhulu umndeni wa khe, awunikete ludvumo ngalokuba ngumfati lotime le nalocinile lelekanguye namuhla.
tgt: "isihlamba esihambisana nokuba nebala elimhlophe senza usithibe awubonge kakhulu umndeni wakhe, ubonga bona ngokuba ngumuntu wesifazane onamandla nozethembayo.

src: letinye tintfo laphumelele kuto sithibe nalekatigcabha ngato tifaka ekhatsi kutsi aniketwe umchele wekuba ngumiss free state albi nism 2018 nekutsi akhetfwe njengalomunye walabase maphetselweni kula bayiface of free state fashi on week 2018. njengoba inyoni kuyi nyanga yekwatisa ngealbi nism, sithibe utsi utawujabu la kubona bantfu labanyenti labanealbinism bativeta kantsi benta tintfo letinhle kulomkhakha wabonobuhle naleminye imikhakha.
tgt: ezinye izinkathi usithibe aziqhenya ngazo kakhulu zi bandakanya ukuthola isicoco emncintiswaneni wonobuhle abanebala elimhlophe imiss free state albinism 2018 noku khethwa njengomunye wabadle umhlanganiso embuki sweni wemfashini iface of free state fashion week 2018. njengoba umandulo kuyi nyanga yokuqwashisa ngo kuba nebala elimhlophe usi thibe uthe kuzomjabulisa ka khulu ukubona nabanye aba ntu abanebala elimhlophe bephumela obala benza izinto ezimangalisayo emkhakheni wonobuhle kanye nakweminye imikhakha.

src: sithibe uphila imphilo yakhe lenco no njengomuntfu lonealbinism ngabe bantfu labanealbinism bangatinakekela njani?
tgt: usithibe uphila impilo emnandi kakhulu enebala elimhlophe abantu abanebala elimhlophe bangazinakekela kanjani?

src: abavikele kushiswa lilanga ngesikhatsi lilanga lishisa kakhulu (kusukela nga9 ekuseni kuya ku3 ntsambama).
tgt: gwema ukushiswa ilanga lapho ilanga lishisa kakhulu (ngehora lesi9 ekuseni kuya kwelesi3 ntambama).

src: konkhe lodzinga ku kwati ngekucala ib&b dale hes ngabe ufuna kunge nisa imali ngekutsi unikete tivakashi indzawo yekulala, ubanikete indzawo labangahlala kuyo kamnandzi ngalesikhatsi ba vakashile endzaweni yanga kini?
tgt: konke okumele ukwazi ngokuqala ib&b dale hes ufuna ukwenza ima li ngokuhlinzeke la izihambeli nge ndawo yokuhlala, ubana kekele ngendlela eseqophe lweni eliphezulu ngenkathi zivakashele indawo yanga kini?

src: mabed and breakfast (mab&b) atindlela letine nzuzo ngekutsi ube nguso mabhizinisi kumboni ye tekuvakasha.
tgt: amabed and breakfast (amab&b) angenye yezindle la ezinenzuzo enkulu yokuba ngumnikazi webhizinisi e mkhakheni wezokuvakasha.

src: naku konkhe lodzinga kukwati ngekucala b&b yakho.
tgt: nakhu konke okumele ukwa zi ngokuziqalela eyakho ib&b.

src: iyini ib&b?
tgt: yini ib&b?

src: ngekusho kwetourism grading council of south africa, emab&b mabhizinsi lanendzawo yekulala leneti nsita letifanako naletiniketwa emakhaya.
tgt: ngokomkhandlu oklama amazinga ezokuvakasha eningizimu afrika, itourism grading council of south africa, amab&b ahlinzeka ngendawo yokuhlala ehlinze ka ngemisebenzi ekhethekile kuphela engatholakala ekhaya.

src: likamelo ngalinye kufanele libe nendlu yekugezela, kantsi sidlo sasekuseni kufanele sibe khona kulamanani ekulala.
tgt: igumbi ngalinye kumele libe nendawo yokugezela yalo, futhi isidlo sasekuseni kumele sibalwe emananini okuhlala.

src: kungeta kuloko, kuniketa tinsita kulelikamelo kufanele kwenteke onkhe malanga ngalesikhatsi tivakashi titahle li.
tgt: phezu kwalokho, igumbi kumele lilungiswe nsukuzonke ngenkathi isihambeli sakho sisahlala khona.

src: ib&b ivumele kutsi ibe namakamelo etivakashi la matsatfu kuphela.
tgt: amab&b akanakuba namagumbi ezihambeli anga phezu kwamathathu.

src: uma ngabe linemakelo langetulu kunalo ku, ngakoke indzawo yakho kufanele kutsi ibitwe ngekutsi yiguest house.
tgt: uma amagumbi ezihambeli engaphezu kwalokhu, ibhinizisi lakho kumele lichazwe ngokuthi iguest house .

src: ngutiphi tinchubo lekufanele utilandzele kute ucale libhizinisi yeb&b?
tgt: ngeziphi izinqubo oku mele uzilandele ukuze uqale ib&b yakho?

src: sinyatselo sekucala lekufanele usitsatse kutsi uye kuma sipala wendzawo uyafaka sicelo sekuniketwa imvume yekusebentisa indzawo yakho njengebhizinisi leninendzawo yekulala.
tgt: isinyathelo sokuqala okumele usithathe ukuqonda kumasi pala wakho wasendaweni uye kofaka isicelo sokuthi umuzi wakho uklamwe njengesa khiwo sokuhlinzeka ngendawo yokuhlala izihambeli.

src: ungahle udzinge imvume kubomakhelwane wakho, bese ukhangisa tatiso kwatisa bantfu, uma ngabe bafuna kuphawula kulesicelo sakho.
tgt: ungase udinge ukuthola imvume kubanikazi bemizi owakhe lene nayo, nokufaka izaziso zokwazisa umphakathi, uma kwenzeka ufuna ukufaka iziphikiso.

src: uma ngabe utfola imvume kumasipala, kungadzingeka kwekutsi uhambisane na letinye tidzingo temtsetfo.
tgt: uma sewuthola isigunyazo e sivela kumasipala, kuzodinge ka ukuthi ulandele imithetho ethile emisiwe.

src: tintfo letibalulekiie lekufanele utinakeindzawo – indzawo lapho ku tfolakala khona ib&b yakho ibaluleke kakhulu.
tgt: izinto ezibalulekile oku mele uzibhekeindawo – indawo ib&b yakho ekuyo ibaluleke kakhulu.

src: uma ngabe uhlala endzaweni lengahehi tivakashi, ngakoke kutawuba lukhuni kwenta kutsi ibhizinisi yakho iphumelele.
tgt: uma uhlala endaweni engazihehi izihambeli, akuzukuba lula ukuthi ibhizinisi lakho liphu melele.

src: timali – tekuvakasha tiba khona ngetikhatsi letitsite, nga koke kutawudzingeka kutsi wonge kakhulu kute uchubeke usebente ngetikhatsi letingasi matasatasa ekhatsi nemnyaka.
tgt: ezezimali – ukuvakasha ku ngavama kakhulu ngezikhathi ezithile zonyaka, ngakho kudingeka ube nemali oyi bekile eyanele ukuthi ukwazi ukuphila ngezikhathi zonyaka ezingekho matasa.

src: kuphila imphilo lensha – imphi lo loyiphilako itawuntjintja nga lokuphelele uma ngabe uba ngumnikati web&b.
tgt: indlela yokuphila entsha – indle la ophila ngayo izoshintsha kakhulu uma sewungumni kazi web&b.

src: kutawu hlala kudzingeka kwekutsi uhlala uvuka ekuseni uyolala ebusuku, kantsi kutawufuna wente tingucuko ngenca yeti vakashi letitawuta ekhaya la kho.
tgt: kuzodingeka ukuthi uvuke ekuseni kakhu lu uphinde ulale ebusuku kakhulu, futhi kuzodingeka ujwayele ukuhlalisana kahle nezihambeli emzini wakho.

src: kantsi kutawufanele ku tsi wente siciniseko sekuhlala ulungisa ugcine netivakashi takho tinelisekile ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi.
tgt: okunye okuzodingeka uku thi ukunake ukunakekela nokugcina izihambeli zakho zanelisekile ngaso sonke isikhathi.

src: kukhangisa ib&b yakho – timboni tetindzawo tekulala tiyancintisana, ngakoke kutawudzingeka kutsi usise sikhatsi sakho nemali ekukhangiseni ib&b.
tgt: ukukhangisa ngeb&b yakho – umkhakha wezokuhlalisa izihambeli ugcwele ukunci ntisana, ngakhoke kuzodinge ka unikele ngesikhathi sakho nemali ngokuthi ukhangise ngeb&b yakho.

src: emadvodza emadvo dzeni: yiba yindvo dza, mfana wami vukuzenzele unnamed ngesikhatsi *tshepo mofokeng aneminya ka le10 budzala, uphile ati kutsi dzadzewabo lomdzala loneminyaka le17 wadlwengulwa.
tgt: ingxoxo ephakathi kwamadoda: yiba yindo da, mfana wami vukuzenzele unnamed ngesikhathi *utshepo mofokeng eneminya ka yobudala eyi10, wayekhona kudlwengulwa udadewabo oneminyaka eyi17.

src: ngesikhatsi lomhlaseli wadzadzewabo labehlomile atjela tshepo kutsi alale phasi angabukeli, usakuva nanyalo kukhala kwadzadzewabo.
tgt: ngesikhathi umdlwenguli owayehlome ngesikhali etshela lo mfanyana ukuthi akalale phansi futhi angabuki, usakuzwa na manje ukukhala kukadadewabo.

src: ngemuva kwalokuhlasela, lendvodza yatjela letela mani kutsi tibaleke tingabuki emuva.
tgt: ngemva kokudlwengula, le ndoda yatshela utshepo noda dewabo ukuthi bagijime futhi bangabheki emuva.

src: ngesikhatsi babaleka kabuhlungu baya ekhaya, dzadzewabo wamtjela kutsi akatsembise kutsi ngeke atjele muntfu ngalokudlwengulwa kwakhe.
tgt: ngesikhathi bethatha uhambo olubuhlungu lokulibangisa ekhaya, udadewa bo wamenza wathembisa ukuthi ngeke atshele muntu mayelana nokudlwengulwa.

src: tshepo wakugcina esifubeni loko kodvwa lemfihlo yamenta wahlala njalo amunyu emoyeni.
tgt: utshepo wenza njengalokho ethembisile kodwa le mfihlo yamenza waba muncu.

src: "ngesikhatsi ngikhula, bengimbona lomdlwenguli ahambahamba khona lapha ekatlehong kantsi loko kwangenta ngatfukutsela kakhulu.
tgt: "ngesikhathi ngikhula, ngangimbona umdlwenguli ekatlehong futhi ngaya ngokuba nolaka.

src: angizange ngikwemukele kutsi akazange atjeziswa ngalesento sakhe.
tgt: ngangingakwazi ukwe mukela ukuthi wayengazange ajeziselwe into ayenzile.

src: "ngesikhatsi sekamdzala, se kalibhungu leselicinile, tshepo akazange akhone kubamba lulaka lwakhe, bekamhlasela njalo lomuntfu lowadlwe ngula dzadzewabo nakatfuke wambona.
tgt: "ngesikhathi esekhulakhulile, futhi eyibhungu elinamandla, utshepo wayengasakwazi uku gcina ngaphakathi ulaka lwakhe, futhi wayeshaya owahla sela udadewabo la embona khona.

src: wantjintja ekubeni ngumntfwana lonekuthula waba ngumfanyana lohlala atfutkutsele.
tgt: wayeka ukuba yingane enokuthula waphenduka umuntu omusha onolaka.

src: timbili tintfo letasindzisa tshepo kulendlela yakhe yebudlova.
tgt: zimbili izinto ezasindisa utshepo kule ndlela yobudlova.

src: kwekucala, bekabu sisekile kutsi abe nababe kanye nemnakabo lomdzala labebati kutsi budlova abusilo likhambi nanome kodvwa bebangati kutsi kubangelwa yini kutsi tshepo atiphatse ngalendlela, bakhona kumeluleka bambuyisela endleleni lecondzile.
tgt: okokuqala nje, wayebusiswe ngobaba kanye nomfowabo omdala ababazi ukuthi udlame lwalungeyona impendulo nomake babengazi ukuthi kungani utshepo eziphatha ngale ndlela, bakwazi ukumholela endleleni yokuziphatha efanele.

src: kwesibili kungenelela kwemaphoyisa kajantji lelabona ngesikhatsi tshepo ahlasela kwekugcina umdlwenguli wadzadzewabo.
tgt: okwesibili kwaba ukungenelela kwamaphoyisa aqapha kuja ntshi wesitimela abona ngesikhathi utshepo ehlasela owadlwengula udadewabo.

src: lomdlwenguli wasala aphuke umlente kodvwa ngesikhatsi tshepo achazela emaphoyisa kajantji kutsi lomuntfu wentani yonkhe leminyaka leyandlu la, ancuma kutsi alikhulule lelibhungu ngekulecwayisa.
tgt: umdlwenguli wasala ephuke umlenze kodwa ngesikhathi utshepo echazela ama phoyisa aqapha kujantshi wesitimela ukuthi le ndoda yayenzeni eminyakeni emini ngi edlule, akhetha ukumdedela kodwa amyala.

src: lomdlwenguli wamikiswa esi bhedlela kodvwa akazange aye kuyowumangala.
tgt: umdlwenguli wayiswa esibhedlela futhi aka zange alivule icala.

src: sekuvamile kuhlaselwa kwabomake, nanome kunjalo tshepo bekakhatsatekile kakhu lu.
tgt: ukuhlaselwa kwabantu be sifazane kuyaqhubeka nokuba yinto ejwayelekile, noma ku njalo, futhike utshepo wayeya ngokukhathazeka ngalokhu.

src: ngesikhatsi asasengumfu ndzi lapha epretoria technikon, wasita ekusunguleni licembu lekucaphelisa emadvodza ngendzima yawo lekumele kutsi ayidlale emmangweni kantsi nga2004, wabhalisa licembu lemadvodza isouth african men’s action group (isamag) njengenhlangano lengekho ngaphasi kwahulu mende.
tgt: ngesikhathi eyisitshudeni sasepretoria technikon, wasiza ukusungula ithimba eliqwashi sa amadoda mayelana nendi ma yawo emphakathini fu thi ngowezi2004, wabhalisa isouth african men's action group (samag) njengenhla ngano engekho ngaphansi kuka hulumeni.

src: lamuhla, isamag ineti sebenti leti10 letisebenta ngalokugcwele egauteng, efreystata, enyakatfo nsho nlanga, elimpopo nasempu malanga.
tgt: namhlanje, isamag isina basebenzi abasebenza ngoku gcwele abayi10 futhi inamhho visi egauteng, efreyistata, enyakatho ntshonalanga, elimpopo kanye nasempumala nga.

src: lenhlangano itimisele ngekuletsa luntjintjo kutenhlalo.
tgt: izinikele ekugqugquzeleni izinguquko.

src: umlayeto wayo lomcoka utsi ‘emadvodza sibili akabahlu kumeti bomake.’ (real men don’t abuse women) .
tgt: umyalezo wabo oyinhloko uthi ‘real men don’t abuse women’ (amadoda angempela awabahlu kumezi abantu besifazane)’.

src: ligama lesingisi lelitsi "real" limele responsible (kuba nemtfwalo), enlightened (kukhanyelwa), archetypal (kuba sibonelo) kanye naloving (kutsandza)," kusho yena njalo tshepo.
tgt: "ureal umele la magama esi ngisi: uresponsible, enlightened , archetypal (ukuba yisibone lo) kanye noloving ," kusho utshepo.

src: "luhlelo lwekubeka laba dvuna ebuholini labasikati bangafakwa lube nemtselela emadvodzeni lamanyenti.
tgt: "iningi lamadoda lifunzelelwe ukuba yizinhloko kwabesilisa.

src: bekashaywa asasebantfwana ngakoke akasiboni sizatfu sekutsi kungani bangakhulisi bantfwababo nabo ngaleyo ndlela.
tgt: babeshaywa besebancane futhi ababoni ukuthi kungani kunga mele bakhulise izingane zabo ngendlela efanayo.

src: emasikweni lamanengi, emadvodza ayabusa bese kutsi bomake bona babe sezingeni linye nebantfwana ngaleyo ndlelake kwemukelekile nje kutsi nabo bomake bacondziswe tigwegwe ngendlela lefananako neyebantfwana," kwasho yena njalo tshepo.
tgt: emasikweni amaningi, kuphethe amadodafuthi abantu besifazane babo nwa njengabasezingeni elifa nayo nezingane futhi kuyinto ethathwa njengeyemukelekile ukubajezisa ngendlela efanayo," kusho utshepo.

src: "wonkhe umuntfu unendzima lekumele kutsi ayidlale ekugu culeni tingcondvo," kwasho tshepo.
tgt: wonke umuntu unendima okumele ayidlale ngokupha thelene nokuguqula indlela abantu abacabanga ngayo, kusho utshepo.

src: ukholelwa ekutseni bantfwa na kufanele kutsi bakhuliswe ngaphandle kwekubafaka umcondvo wekutsi intfo letsite yentiwa bulili lobutsite kuphela.
tgt: ukholelwa ekutheni abantwana kumele bakhuliswe ngapha ndle kokubunjwa ngokobulili.

src: umkhukhu uguculwe waba spa lesinetsetekile nonkululeko mathebula uthaini masakane utentele ligama ngekutsi agucule umkhukhu wakhe ube spa, indzawo yekutilungisa kutsi ube muhle .
tgt: umjondolo ongatheni uguqulwe waba yispa esisezingeni eliphe zulu nonkululeko mathebula uthaini masakane usezenzele iga ma ngokuguqula umjondolo wawenza ibeauty spa .

src: ibhizinisi yakhe isebotshabelo efreystata, ivictory body and nail studio , ikhula ngemfutfo futsi iheha bantfu tindzawo tonkhe kutsi batewumonyo ngwa.
tgt: ibhizinisi lakhe, elisebo tshabelo efreyistata, ivictory body and nail studio , likhula ngamandla futhi liheha abantu abaqhamuka ezindaweni ezahlukene abazela ukuzo mfanyazwa umzimba kanye nokucwalwa.

src: emva kwekutsengisa itupperware aneminyaka le19, lentfombi leneminyaka lenge28 budzala itsi beyivele inelutsa ndvo lolukhulu lwekuticalela ibhizinisi yayo ngakoke seyi jabulile nyalo kutsi seyilicalile leli bhizinisi.
tgt: waqala ukudayisa utupperware eneminyaka eyi19, lona oneminyaka engama28 njengamanje uthe wayelokhu enothando lokuba nebhizini si lakhe futhi kuyamjabulisa ukuthi waziqalela ibhizinisi lakhe.

src: "ngicale ngekutsi ngise bentele lomunye kulemboni kulaphoke ngatfola khona sipiliyoni," kwasho yena njalo, angeta ngekutsi wenta tifu ndvo tekutimonyonga, icosmetology ekolishi lasemothe letvet lelisebloemfontein.
tgt: "ngaqala ngisebenzela othile kule mboni futhi yilapho engathola khona isipiliyoni," kusho yena, wengeza na ngokuthi wafundela ukuba yicosmetologist emotheo tvet college yasebloem fontein.

src: ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi wakulungela kutsi akhone aphume atimele futsi akazange asabuka emuva kusukela leso sikhatsi.
tgt: ekugcineni wayeseku lungele ukuphuma azimele futhi akazange esabheka emuva kusukela ngaleso sikhathi.

src: ibhizinisi yakhe ina makhasmende lamanyenti ebotshabelo futsi linani lama khasimende akhe liyakhula.
tgt: ibhizinisi lakhe li namakhasimende amaningi ebotshabelo futhi liyakhula futhi unamakhasimende ahla le eza kuye.

src: emakhasimende akhe uwalu ngisa tinzipho temino neteti ntwane, kufocofocotwa, kususa boya nekulungiswa buso.
tgt: kuhlinzekwa ukwenziwa kwezinzipho zeminwe, ezezinzwane, ukumfanyazwa umzimba, ukususwa kweziboya (wax ing) kanye nokubhucungwa kobuso.

src: titfombe tespa sakhe le sisemkhukhwini latitfumele etinkhundleni tekuchumana tibe nelisasasa lelikhulu, lapho ba ntfu bebadvumisa khona umco ndvo lomusha wamasakane basho nekusho futsi kutsi uya wakhutsata emantfombatana aselokishini.
tgt: izithombe zakhe azifaka ezinkundleni zokuxhuma na zomjondolo oguqulwe wenziwe ispa sikanokusho esihle zidle ubhedu kamuva nje, abantu bencoma uku qhamuka namasu amasha kukamasakane futhi bethi unika ugqozi amantomba zane asemalokishini.

src: spa lesisemkhukhwini we masenke lamanyako lobukeka njengalotayelekile lapha nge phandle, lespa sinelingekhatsi lelinetsetekile lelilungele kahle kakhulu kutimonyonga.
tgt: sisemjondolo kathayela obukeka ungojwayelekile ngaphandle, ispa sisezi ngeni eliphezulu ngaphakathi elikufanele ukumfanyazwa umzimba kanye nokucwa lwa.

src: "kuta kwebantfu labangaka kwabangetulu kwaloko bengi kucabanga.
tgt: "lokhu okwashiwo abantu kwangimangaza.

src: bonjiniyela labasebancane bacece shwa bukhoma ekwakheni imigwaco vukuzenzele unnamed akunaliklasi lelincono lanjiniyela losacece shwa kunekutsi aye endzaweni lekwakhiwa kuyo lenebulukhuni nalenetintfuli asebente ngemishini lebanga umsindvo kanye nemadvodza nebafati labajuluke bamanti nte basebenta ngekutikha ndla.
tgt: onjiniyela abancane bathole ukuqeqeshwa bezibambele ngezabo ekwakhiweni komgwaqo vukuzenzele unnamed alikho ikilasi eli ngcono konjiniyela abasaqeqeshwa u kwedlula izizinda zokwakha ezimahhadlahhadla, ezi gcwele izintuli nokuduma kwemishini nemijuluko ya madoda nabesifazane be matasa besebenza kanzima.

src: thabiso dladla nasumay maharaj bonjiiniyela laba sitako labatfolakala lapho kusetjentelwa khona (emaare) labafundza umsebenti kubalingani babo labane lwati labasebentisana nabo ngalesikhatsi kulungiswa umgwaco wen2 losemkha tsini wasemthunzini nasempa ngeni ogwini lolusenyakatfo yakwazulunatal.
tgt: uthabiso dladla nosumay maharaj bangabasizi bonjini yela [amaare] esizindeni abacobelela ulwazi koza kwabo abasemnkantshubo mvu esizindeni sokukhuli swa nokuthuthukiswa ko mgwaqo onguthelawayeka un2 phakathi kwendawo yasemthunzini nasempange ni ogwini olusenyakatho ne sifundazwe sakwazuluna tali.

src: "senta imisebenti lecishe ifane njengemaare.
tgt: "senza umsebenzi othi awu fane ncamashi nowamaare.

src: senta lucwaningo, siyabala, senta imi yalelo yebasiti, imiyalelo ya sesayithini kantsi siphendvu la noma miphi imibuto yabo njiniyela lesiyibutwa ngulaba labakhako," kusho dladla.
tgt: siyahlola, sibale isitokwe, senze lokho esiyalelwa uku thi sikwenze njengabasizi, senze imiyalelo yesizinda, siphinde siphendule noma yimiphi imibuzo emayelana nobunjiniyela evela enka mpanini eyakhayo," kusho udladla.

src: maharaj lowacala kulomkla mo ngenyanga yengci nga2016, kantsi ngaphambilini bekasakha tindledlana letise celeni kwemgwaco enta ne midvwebo yejiyomethri eport elizabeth esikhungweni se kucecesha sasanral, utsite sewuvele ufundze tifundvo letinyenti letibalulekile suke la wenyukela ngasenyakatfo.
tgt: umaharaj oqale kulo mse benzi ngoncwaba 2016, futhi phambilini obenza amadizayini ezindlela zoku hamba ngezinyawo onqenqe meni lomgwaqo kanye nawe jiyomethri ebhayi esanral centre of excellence, uthi usefunde lukhulu njengoba esefudukele esifundazweni sakwazulu natali.

src: "sengifundze indlela bu njiniyela bekwakha lebu lukhuni ngayo nekutsi tintfo tihlangana njani kutsi tise bente.
tgt: "sengi funde ngobunkimbinkimbi becivil engineering kanye nendlela konke okuhlangana ngayo ukwenza izinto zise benze.

src: akusiko nje kwenta imidvwebo yetindledlana letiseceleni kwemgcwaco kuphela.
tgt: akukhona nje kuphela ukudizayina izindlela zoku hamba ngezinyawo onqenqe meni lomgwaqo.

src: kusebenta ngetakhi wo, emadreyini nemidvwebo yejiyomethri.
tgt: sisebenza ngezakhiwo, amapayipi oku chitha amanzi kanye nama dizayini ejiyomethri.

src: kahlehle kusho kufundza kuhlanganisa tintfo tonkhe ndzawonye bese utenta kutsi tisebente," asho njalo.
tgt: empe leni lokhu kuphathelene nokufunda ukuhlangani sa zonke izinto ndawonye ukuze zisebenze," kulandisa umaharaj.

src: dladla wangena kulomkla mo ngemuva kwetinyanga leti10 ngemuva kwekutsi ayosebenta kuloluhlelo lwe kucecesha lwakasanral.
tgt: udladla wazibandaka nya kulo msebenzi cishe ezi nyangeni eziyi10 ngemuva kokuba yingxenye yohlelo lakwasanral lokuqeqe sha.

src: ujabulile kutsi utawusebe nta kulomklamo lomatima lekawuchaza njengalomkhu lu kantsi ufaka ekhatsi ema bhuloho lamakhulu lambalwa kanye nemabhuloho lama ncane ekugijimisa emanti.
tgt: kuyamthokozisa ukuba yingxenye yalo msebenzi oyi nselelo awuchaza ngokuthi uhlukile futhi ubanzi impela futhi ubandakanya amabhu loho nemihubhe yamapayipi evulekile.

src: "bengisebenta nangekuba ngumhloli ngibuye ngisite labakhi lapho badzinga ku caciselwa kumidvwebo.
tgt: "bengilokhu ngenza umse benzi wokuhlola kanye nokulekelela inkampani eyakhayo uma idinga uku caciselwa ngemidwebo.

src: uma kufika endzabeni yekusebe nta ngemihlaba, sibuye sihlole lomhlaba longetulu leku gcwaliswe ngawo kanye na longephasi.
tgt: mayelana nomsebenzi opha thelene nokumba nokulungi sa isizinda okuzokwakhiwa kusona, siphinde sihlole ama tshe nomhlabathi wokuvala imigodi kanye nomhlabathi ongaphansi kwendawo okwa khiwa kuyona.

src: sisandza kucala kwenta umsebenti wekuhla nganisa umhlaba nematje kute kufakwe ibtb kantsi senta luhlolo lwawo wonkhe umsebenti lowentiwe bakhi," asho ayibeka.
tgt: kamuva nje sesiqale nokwenza umsebe nzi wokwakha umgwaqo ngetiyela, ngakhoke sisebe nzisa ibtb siphinde sihlole wonke umsebenzi owenziwa yinkampani eyakhayo," ku sho udladla.

src: sumay utsi kusebenta ku lomklamo kuta netinkhinga tako.
tgt: usumay uthi ukusebenza kulo mklamo kunazo izinse lelo.

src: bafundzi etikolweni tase makhaya batfola lusito more matshediso litiko lemfundvo lesisekelo licale lu hlelo lolutawuhlo mulisa bafundzi labanyenti emimmangweni yase makhaya leyayincishwe ematfuba ekufundza phambi lini.
tgt: abafundi ezikoleni zase makhaya bathola usizo more matshediso umnyango wezemfu ndo eyisisekelo wethule uhlelo olu zohlomulisa iningi labafu ndi abancishwe amathuba kwezemfundo emiphakathi ni yasemakhaya.

src: lomklamo wabasiti ngemfundvo yasemakhaya (ireap) luhlelo lweminya ka lemitsatfu lolutawucala kusetjentiswa nga2018 kute kube nga2021 njengeluhle lo lwekulinga, kantsi luhlose kuhlomulisa tikolo leti188 eningizimu afrika ngaleso sikhatsi.
tgt: umkla mo wabasizi bothisha ezi ndaweni zasemakhaya (ireap) wuhlelo lweminya ka emithathu oluzoqala u kusebenza njengohlelo oluli ngwayo kusukela ngowe zi2018 kuya kowezi2021, futhi kulindeleke ukuthi lu hlomulise izikole ezilinganise lwa kwi188 eningizimu afri ka kulesi sikhathi.

src: lelitiko linelitsemba lekutsi loku kutawufaka sandla ku mazinga ekufundza neku fundzisa kuloluhlelo lwemfu ndvo lesisekelo.
tgt: umnyango uyethemba ukuthi lokhu kuzolekelela ekuphuculeni izinga lokufu nda nokufundisa ohlelweni lwemfundo eyisisekelo ezi ndaweni zasemakhaya.

src: loluhlelo lusalingwa eti godzini letimbili kusinye sa letifundza letintsatfu letinga kasebenti kahle etindzaweni tasemakhaya.
tgt: okwamanje lolu hlelo lu salingwa ezifundeni ezimbi li esifundazweni ngasinye kwezintathu ezisezindaweni zasemakhaya ezingaqhubi neze kahle kwezemfundo, okubalwa kuzona isifunda ialfred nzo east district kanye neor tambo coa stal district empumalanga kapa, isifunda ilembe kanye nomzinyathi kwazuluna tali, ngokunjalo nesifunda isekhukhune kanye nemo pani elimpopo.

src: tifaka ekhatsi sigodzi sasealfred nzo east neor tambo coastal emphu malanga kapa, sigodzi sa seilembe nesaseumzinya thi kwazulunatal, kanye nesigodzi sasesekhukhune nesasemopani elimpopo.
tgt: umqondisi omkhulu wophiko lwezokuqaliswa nokuthuthukiswa kohlelo lokufunda emnyangwe ni wemfundo eyisiseke lo useliki tlhabane, uthe umnyango usuqashe intsha ephothule umatikuletshe ni elinganiselwa kuma750 ukuba ibe ngabasizi bothisha ezikoleni ezisezindaweni zasemakhaya.

src: umcondzisi lomkhulu wekusetjentiswa kwekha rikhulamu nekunotsiswa kwayo kulitiko lemfundvo lesisekelo seliki tlhabane, u tsite lelitiko selimeme bantfu labasha labalinganiselwa kulabange750 lebaphase matikuletjeni kutsi basite ngetemfundvo etikolweni tasemakhaya.
tgt: "sebethole ukuqeqeshwa okuyisisekelo okuzobasiza ukuqhuba umsebenzi aba belwe wona.

src: "baceceshiwe kancane lo kutabenta kutsi bakhone kusebenta lemisebenti la baniketwe yona.
tgt: bazofakwa ezi ngeni eliyisisekelo kanye nasezingeni elimaphakathi, okubandakanya ibanga 14," kuchaza utlhabane.

src: batawu fakwa kusigaba sekucala nalesisemkhatsini, lekufaka ekhatsi libanga 1 kuya ku4,"asho achaza.
tgt: abasizi bothisha ezi ndaweni zasemakhaya kulindeleke ukuba balekelele emisebenzini ehlukahlukene yohlelo lokufunda, ikakhulu kazi ukuphucula amakhono okubala, ukubhala nokufu nda.

src: labasiti ngetemfundvo yasemakhaya balindze leke kutsi basite ngetintfo letihlukene letiphatselene nekharikhulamu, ikakhu lukati kwenta kancono kunyumeresi, ilitheresi ne makhono ekufundza.
tgt: "lokhu kuphinde kube yindlela yokuhlomisa ngama khono intsha esezindaweni ezibhekene nezinselelo kwe zomnotho, ngokuthuthukisa amakhono abo nokubanikeza isipiliyoni somsebenzi," ku sho utlhabane.

src: "lena ngulenye indlela yekuniketa lusha emandla etindzaweni letinemnotfo longahambi kahle ngeku tsi kutfutfukiswe emakhono nelwati lwemsebenti," kusho tlhabane.
tgt: uthe abasizi bothisha ezi ndaweni zasemakhaya kulindeleke ukuba behlise umthwalo kothisha ezikoleni zasemakhaya ngokubalekele la emisebenzini ephathelene nohlelo lokufunda efana nokuhlela nokuhlangani sa amaqembu omsebenzi wesikole owenzelwa ekhaya, amaqembu ezibalo, amaqe mbu okufunda, amaqembu obuchule kwezobuciko kanye nemiklamo yezolimo.

src: utsite labasiti ngemfu ndvo yasemakhaya balindle ke kutsi behlise lomtfwalo wabothishela etikolweni tasemakhaya ngekutsi basite ngemisebenti lephatselene nekharikhulamu njengeku sebentisana nabo ngemi sebenti yasekhaya, emace mbu lenta tibalo, emace mbu lafundzako, emace mbu emisebenti yebuciko, nemiklamo yetekulima.
tgt: uthishanhloko untombi kayise mkhize wasesikoleni iozwathini primary school endaweni yakwanodwengu esifundeni ilembe uthemba ukuthi lolu hlelo luzosiza ini ngi labafundi bakhe abane nkinga esifundweni sokufu nda kanye nenyumeresi.

src: umphatsisikolo ntombi kayise mkhize wasesiko lweni semabanga laphansi iozwathini primary lese ndzaweni yasenodwengu esigodzini saseilembe une litsemba lekutsi loluhlelo lutawusita bafundzi ngema khono ekubala nekufundza.
tgt: isikole sakhe sinabafu ndi ababhalisile kulo nyaka abalinganiselwa kuma387 kusuka ebangeni r kuya kwelesi7.

src: "bafundzi betfu labanyenti bavela emakhaya lange nabatali kantsi labanye ba nakekelwa bogogo.
tgt: "iningi labafu ndi bethu livela emakhaya aphethwe yizingane kanti futhi abanye babo banakeke lwa ngogogo.

src: abanabo bantfu labangabasita ngemi sebenti yesikolo yasekhaya noma babakhutsate kutsi bafundze, kantsi loku kwe hlisa lizinga labenta ngalo eklasini," asho achaza.
tgt: abanabo aba ntu abazobasiza ngomse benzi wesikole owenzelwa ekhaya noma abazobagqu gquzela ukuba bafunde izincwadi, futhi lokhu kunomthelela ongemu hle ekuqhubeni umse benzi wabo egunjini loku funda," kuchaza uthisha nhloko.

src: "lenye inkinga kwekutsi bafundzi betfu labasema bangeni laphansi bafundzi swa yonkhe intfo nge sizulu kantsi uma ba ndlulela kumabanga lase mkhatsini kufanele bagu cuke bente tonkhe tifundvo ngesingisi, ngakoke kuba yinkinga lenkulu kubo kutsi bagucuke.
tgt: "enye inkinga uku thi abafundi bethu abasezi ngeni eliyisisekelo bafundi swa zonke izifundo ngesizu lu kuthi uma sebeqhubekela ezingeni elimaphakathi ku fanele bashintshe benze ini ngi lezifundo ngesingisi, nga khoke kuba inselelo enkulu uma sekufanele bashintshe.

src: ngalesikhatsi sekulinga, sikale lomtselela nemphume lelo ngekutsi sente lucwani ngo nekuhlola kwaloluhle lo lwereap .
tgt: "kulesi sigaba sokulingwa kwalolu hlelo, sizohlola umthelela nempumelelo yalo ngokuthi siqaphe fu thi sihlole uhlelo lwereap .

src: sibuye safuna lusito lalabasitfupha laba neticu tasenyuvesi kodvwa basengakasebenti njenge bachumanisi balomklamo.
tgt: siphinde saqasha nabafu ndi abayisithupha abaneziqu zemfundo ephakeme aba ngakawutholi umsebenzi abasebenza njengabalawu li nabahlanganisi bohle lo.

src: idriving ambitions ifundzisa bantfu labakhubatekile kushayela vukuzenzele unnamed bantfu labakhubatekile bavamise kuba ne bumatima bekutfola ematfuba lafananako nala babo labanemitimba lenga kakhubateki.
tgt: abakwadriving ambitions bafundisa abantu abakhubazekile ukushayela vukuzenzele unnamed abantu abakhubaze kile ngokuvamile bakuthola kunzima ukufinyelela amathuba afa nayo nabantu abangenakho ukukhubazeka.

src: kunye kwaloku kufundza kushayela imoto.
tgt: okunye kwalawa mathuba ukufunda ukushayela imo to.

src: kepha luhle lo lolungakavami lwenhlanga no iquadpara association of south africa (iqasa) selu fundzise bantfu laba120 labakhubatekile kushayela timo to letakhiwe tafanela tidzingo tabo, labange80 balabantfu sebawatfolile emalayisensi abo ekushayela.
tgt: kodwa uhlelo oluyingqayizivele lwabakwaquadpa ra association of south afri ca (iqasa) luye lwafundisa abantu abayi120 abakhubaze kile ukuba bakwazi ukushayela izimoto ezilungiselelwe bona, kanti abangama80 kulaba bantu baye bakwazi ukuthola izincwadi zabo zokushayela.

src: "bantfu labakhubatekile bahlala njalo babukene netinsayeya letinkhulu kakhulu nekuhamba baye lapho bafuna kuya khona, ikakhulu ngoba abakwati kuse bentisa tigitjelwa temmango letinyenti.
tgt: "abantu abakhubazekile ba vame ukubhekana nezinselele ezinkulu lapho bezama uku ya ezindaweni, ikakhulukazi ngoba abakwazi ukusebenzisa iningi lezinhlelo zokuthutha zomphakathi.

src: besifuna kuyisombulula lenkinga futsi, lokuba luleke kakhulu, kwenta bantfu kutsi bakhone kucasheka," kwasho sikhulu lesiphakeme (iceo) sakaqasa ari seirlis naye lokhubateke sicu semtimba sangentasi.
tgt: besifuna ukuxa zulula le nkinga futhi, okuba luleke kakhulu, senze abantu baqasheke," kusho isikhulu esiphezulu (iceo) seqasa uari seirlis naye okhubazeke kwesingezansi.

src: loku bekunguyona nshiseke lo lechuba luhlelo lwedriving ambitions, lolwasungulwa nga2013.
tgt: kwakuyilena injongo eyayiqhuba uhlelo lwabakwadriv ing ambitions, olwasungulwa ngowezi2013.

src: iqasa yahlangana nenkampani yakaavis lecashisa ngetimoto yakhulumisa na nayo ngekufundzisa bantfu labakhubatekile kutsi bakwati kushayela timoto letakhiwe ta fanela tidzingo tabo.
tgt: iqasa yahla ngana nenkampani eqashisa izimoto iavis ukuze baxox isane ngokufundisa abantu abakhubazekile ukushayela izimoto ezilungiselelwe bona.

src: "iavis yasivisisa lesidzingo, yaphindze futsi yakubona kubaluleka kwabo njengoba nje bacashisa ngetimoto letishayelwa ngetandla kuphela.
tgt: "abakwaavis basiqonda isidingo, futhi bakubona uku baluleka kwalokhu kubona, njengoba beqashisa ngezimoto ezishayelwa ngezandla.

src: bavu ma kusinikelela ngetimoto tetfu tekucala kutsi tisetjentiselwe kufundzisa kushayela," kwasho seirlis.
tgt: bavu ma ukunikela ngemoto yethu yokuqala eyayizosetshenziselwa izifundo zokushayela," kusho useirlis.

src: kufaka ticelo tekuba kulo luhlelo kuvulelwe bantfu labakhubateke imikhono nemi lente kanye nalabo labakhu bateke sicu semtimba sangentasi lasebavele banawo emalayisensi ekufundzela kushayela.
tgt: izicelo zalolu hlelo zivulelekile kubantu abakhubazeke izingalo nemilenze kanye nabakhubaze ke isingezansi asebevele benayo ilayisensi yokufundela ukushayela.

src: "bahlolwa bodokotela labe laphana ngekukwentisa umse benti lotsite (maoccupational therapist) kwenta siciniseko se kutsi bayakhona yini kunyakata masinyane futsi kalula nekutsi futsi bayakhona yini kushayela ngetilawuli letentiwe tafane la tidzingo tabo ngaphandle kwekuba sesimeni lesiyingoti.
tgt: "baye bahanjiswe kudokote la wokunyakaza kwamalungu omzimba, phecelezi ioccupa tional therapist , ukuze iqinise kise ukuthi umzimba wabo uya kwazi ukunyakaza ngendlela engabenza bakwazi ukushaye la izimoto ezenzelwe abantu abakhubazekile ngaphandle kokubabeka engozini.

src: kubeseke kwentiwa luhlolo lwekuncuma kufaneleka kusi twa ngetimali kute kutfolakale kutsi ingabe bangakhona ku lukhokhela malini loluhlelo, bese kutsike lena lenye imali yekuphelelisela bayayikhokhelwa," kwachaza seirlis.
tgt: kube se kubhekwa ukuthi umuntu lowo angakwazi ukukhokha imali engakanani kulolu hlelo, bese konke okunye kukhokhelwe ngabaxhasi," kuchaza useirlis.

src: bahlanganyeli baneluchunge chunge lolugcwele lwetifundvo tekufundza kushayela, kute kube ngulapho sebaku lungele kutsi sebangenta luhlolo lwabo.
tgt: ababambiqhaza bathola uchungechunge oluphelele lwe zifundo zokushayela, kuze kube sebekulungele ukuhlolwa.

src: lomunye lowachuba kahle kakhulu kuloluhlelo lweqa sa ngucarol khoza, lowatfola ingoti yemoto eminyakeni lemibili leyendlulile.
tgt: umuntu owalisebenzisa ngempumelelo leli thuba labakwaqasa ngucarol khoza, owabandakanyeka engozini yemoto eminyakeni emibi li edlule.

src: lengoti yamshiya akhubateke sicu sem timba sangentasi.
tgt: wasala ekhubazeke kwesingezansi.

src: igo george ihola embili ekuhlomiseni bantfu labakukhubatekile vukuzenzele unnamed kufinyelela tigitjelwa temmango kuvamise kuba yinsayeya kubantfu labakhubatekile ngoba emabhasi lamanyenti kanye nemakhumbi ete tisetjentiswa letidzingekako kute kugitjeliswe bagibeli labakhu batekile.
tgt: igo george isiza ekuhlomiseni abantu abakhubazekile vukuzenzele unnamed ukufinyelela ezoku thutha zomphakathi ngokuvamile kuyinselele kubantu abaphila nokukhubazeka njengoba amabhasi amaningi namatekisi engenazo izinto ezidingekayo ukuthutha abagibeli abakhu bazekile.

src: bomasipala kulo lonkhe le live lakitsi nabo manje sebeme ngetinyawo basombulula lenkinga.
tgt: omasipala bakuleli nabo sebezibandakanye kulolu hle lo lokusombulula le nkinga.

src: masipala wendzawo wasegeorge wendlala emazinga lamasha ekutsi tigitjelwa temmango tingabasebentela kanjani bantfu labakhubatekile.
tgt: kanti umasipala wasegeorge usukhuphule kakhulu iqophelo lokuthi izinhlelo zezokuthutha umphakathi kumele zime kuphi lapho kusetshenzelwa abantu abakhubazekile.

src: ngekusitwa ngetimali tesi bonelelo lesivela kulitiko letekutfutsa, inchubo yetigitjelwa letingemabhasi lajike letako (ibrt) ego george kwamanje inemabhasi lamancani lange35, emabhasi lamakhulu lange36 kanye nema bhasi lasemkhatsini ngebukhu lu lange33.
tgt: njengoba luxhaswe ngezimali ngumnyango kazwelonke we zokuthutha, uhlelo lwezoku thutha ngamabhasi asheshayo (ibrt) igo george njenga manje lunamabhasi amancane angama35, amabhasi ajwayele kile angama36 namabhasi amakhudlwana angama33.

src: wonkhe lamabhasi akhiwe afanela titulo letine masondvo.
tgt: wonke la mabhasi akhiwe ngendlela ehlinzekela izihlalo zabakhu bazekile.

src: lamabhasi lamakhulu kanye nalawo lasemkhatsini ngebukhulu anetindzawo tekweelekthronoki tekuhamba tihlalo temasondvo, tihla lo letikhetsekile kanye naletinye tisetjentiswa letetayelekile.
tgt: amabhasi ajwayelekile kanye namakhudlwana afakwe ipha sishi lezihlalo zabakhubazekile elisebenza ngogesi, izihlalo ezikhethekile kanye nezinye izinto ezijwayelekile.

src: lamabhasi lamancani anakwa ngalokukhetsekile, lokwatsi, ngesikhatsi acala kusetjentiswa nga2015, aba wekucala ngca eningizimu afrika kuba nesisetjentiswa lesingumshini wekuphakamisa bagibeli la bahleti etihlalweni temasondvo.
tgt: kuye kwagxilwa kakhulu emabhasini amancane, wonake, okwathi ngesikhathi eqala ukukhishwa ngowezi2015, aba ngawokuqala eningizimu afrika ukuba nomshini wokukhuphula abagibeli abanezihlalo zabakhubazekile.

src: aphindze futsi abe nendzawo yetihlalo temasondvo kanye neminyango levulwa iphindze ivalwe yimishini lesebenta nge mandla emoya (ngehydrau lics), leyenta kube lula kutsi bagibeli labakhubatekile bakwati kungena ebhasini.
tgt: aphinde futhi abe nekhosombane lezihlalo zabakhubaze kile nezicabha ezisebenza nge hayidrolikhi, okwenza kube lula ukuthi abagibeli abakhu bazekile bangene ebhasini.

src: "leli ngilo kuphela luhlobo lwemabhasi eningizimu afri ka lelifinyeleleka ngalokuphe lele," kwasho umphatsi wego george james robb.
tgt: "lolu ukuphela kohlelo lwamabhasi olufinyeleleka ngokuphelele eningizimu afrika," kusho imenenja yego george ujames robb.

src: "lena ngulenye yetinsika letibaluleke kakhulu kunchu bo yego george.
tgt: "lena enye yezinsika ezi balulekile zohlelo lwego george.

src: kubalule ke kakhulu kutsi wonkhe muntfu egeorge akwati kufinye lela tigitjelwa temmango kute kutsi akwati kutfola ematfuba emsebenti, ekuyotsenga etitolo, etenkholo, ekukhibika kanye ne tinsita letifanana nekunakekelwa ngetemphilo.
tgt: kubalulekile ukuthi umuntu ngamunye egeorge akwazi ukusebenzisa ezoku thutha zomphakathi ukuze akwazi ukufinyelela amathuba omsebenzi, ezitolo, ezenkolo, ezokungcebeleka kanye nezinsiza ezifana nokunakekelwa kwezempilo.

src: "bagibeli labakhubatekile bayakutfokotela kucatjangelwa kwetidzingo kanye netinsayeya tabo temihla nemalanga tekuya etindzaweni letikhashane nase khaya, kanye nekutimela lokuta nekutsi batihambele bona ngekwabo."
tgt: "abagibeli abakhubazekile bakubonga kakhulu ukucatshangelwa kwezidingo zabo kanye nomshikashika wo suku nosuku wokufinyelela ezindaweni ezikude nekhaya, nokuzimela okulethwa ukukwazi ukuzihambela ngokwabo.

src: rodrique felix, lomunye walabasebentisa lamabhasi, wabandzakanyeka engotini yesidududu etinyangeni le18 letengcile.
tgt: "urodrique felix, omunye wabasebenzisa uhlelo lwama bhasi, wabandakanyeka engozini yesithuthuthu ezinyangeni eziyi18 ezidlule.

src: kwamanje sewu hamba ngesihlalo semasondvo kepha utsi lamabhasi akwenta kube lula kutsi aye esibhedlela.
tgt: njengamanje uhamba ngesihlalo sabakhuba zekile kodwa uthi usizo lwama bhasi lwenze kwaba lula ukuba akwazi ukuya esibhedlela.

src: "empeleni, yonkhe igeorge itivuna kahle kakhulu ngalokwecile tihlalo temasondvo, lokuyintfo lenhle kakhulu," kwasho rodrique.
tgt: "empeleni, idolobha lonke lasegeorge lwenza impilo ibe lula kubantu abahamba ngezi hlalo zabakhubazekile, okuyinto enhle kakhulu," kusho urodrique.

src: yati tinhlobo tekuhlukunyetwa letihlukene vukuzenzele unnamed uma ngabe uku budlelwano lapho uhlukunyetwa khona noma umntfwana lo nakekelwa nguwe uyahlu kunyetwa, ungatsatsa tinya tselo tekutivikela noma uvikele lomntfwana nge kutsi uye enkhantolo noma ubike loludzaba embutfweni wemaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (isaps).
tgt: yazi izinhlobo ezahlukene zokuhlukunyezwa vukuzenzele unnamed uma usebudle lwaneni obuhlu kumezayo noma uma ingane oyinakekelayo ihlukunyezwa, ungathatha izinyathelo zokuzivikela noma zokuvikela ingane ngokuya ezinkantolo noma ngokubika lolu daba embu thweni waphoyisa aseni ngizimu afrika (isaps).

src: umtsetfo wekuhluku nyetwa emakhaya uniketa labo labahlukunyetwako emakhaya kuvikeleka lokundlulele lokungentiwa ngekusebentisa umtsetfo.
tgt: umthetho obhekelele u dlame lwasekhaya uzi vikela ngokugcwele izisulu zodlame lwasekhaya.

src: kuhlukunyetwa kwente ka ngetindlela letihlukene kantsi kubalulekile kutsi bomake bavisise letinhlobo letihlukene tekuhlukunye twa kute bativikele.
tgt: ukuhlukumeza kwe nzeka ngezindlela ezahlu kene futhi kubalulekile ukuthi abantu besifazane bazi izindlela ezahlukene zokuhlukumeza ukuze ba zivikele.

src: kuhlukunyetwa emakhaya kwenteka ngalesikhatsi umuntfu abuketana naloku:ukushaywa: sibonelo, uma ngabe ushaywa noma wetfu swa ngeludlame.
tgt: udlame lwasekhaya lwe nzeka uma umuntu ehle lwa yilokhu:ukushaywa: isibonelo, uma ushaywa noma wesatshiswa ngodlame.

src: kuhlukunyetwa ngetemacansi: uma ngabe lolohlukunye kwato adlwenguliwe noma acindzetelwe kutsi ente tento letiphatselene nemacansi noma abukele tento tetemacansi leti hlambalatako.
tgt: ukuhlukunyezwa ngoko cansi: uma isisulu sidlwe ngulwa noma siphoqwa ukuthi senze noma sibukele okuphathelene nocansi okwe hlisa isithunzi.

src: kuhlukunyetwa emoyeni, ngemlomo noma ngekwengco ndvo: loku kwenteka uma nga be umuntfu uhlala adzelelwa njalo, entiwe ative amncane noma abitwe ngemagama lahlambalatako.
tgt: ukuhlukumeza ngoko mphefumulo, ngamazwi kanye nangokomqondo: lokhu kwenzeka uma umu ntu ehlale ethukwa, ejivazwa noma ebizwa ngamagama ajivazayo.

src: kuhlukunyetwa ngekwete mnotfo: loku kwenteka uma ngabe ungavunyelwa kwekutsi utentele imali yakho.
tgt: ukuhlukumeza ngokupha thelene nomnotho: lokhu kungenzeka uma isisulu sivi njelwa ukuthi sithole iholo.

src: kwetfuswa: sibonelo sekwe tfuswa kungalesikhatsi lolohlukunyetwako atfola imi layeto noma emasms lamsa bisako nalatfusako.
tgt: ukwesabisa: isibonelo sokwesabisa yilapho isisu lu sithola imilayezo noma amasms asesabisayo futhi ethusayo.

src: kuhlukunyetwa: sibonelo kungaba ngendlela yekutfola tincingo njalo njalo noma ulandzelelwa njalo kuba nala kubukako kantsi loku kuku bangele kutsi wesabe.
tgt: ukukhathazwa: kungaba isibonelo ngokuthi uhlale ushayelwa ucingo noma uma uhlale ugadiwe futhi lokhu kukwenza ukuthi wesabe.

src: kulandzelelwa: kwenteka ngalesikhatsi lona lokuhlu kumetako aloku akulandzela noma afune kukhuluma nawe ngenkhani ungatsandzi kukhu luma naye.
tgt: ukulandelwa: kwenzeka uma umhlukumezi ehlala ekulandela noma ephoqa ukukhuluma nawe ungafuni.

src: kukhulumisana kubalulekile kute wati umntfwanakho vukuzenzele unnamed akusilula kukhuli sa umntfwana, ko dvwa lusito lolunca ne loluvela kubosolwati lungaba lusito lolukhulu ekucinisekiseni kwekutsi wenta ngendlela lekahle longakhona ngayo.
tgt: ukuxoxisana kusemqoka ekutheni wazi ingane yakho vukuzenzele unnamed akulula ukukhulisa ingane, kodwa usizo oluncane oluvela kongoti lungasiza kakhulu ekutheni wenze okungcono ongakwazi ukukwenza.

src: ngekusho kwechildline south africa, inhlangano lengatfoli inzuzo levikela bantfwana kuto tonkhe ti nhlobo teludlame kantsi ye nta kube nendlela yekuna kwa kwemalungelo eba ntfwana eningizimu afrika.
tgt: uchildline south africa, inhlangano engenzi nzuzo evikela izingane kuzo zonke izinhlobo zodlame futhi ekhuthaza ukuhlonishwa kwamalungelo ezingane eni ngizimu afrika, uthi abazali kumele baxoxisane ngokwa khayo nezingane.

src: ungabatsetsisi; khuluma nabo ngenhlonipho; bavu mele bakhetse; ababe yince nye yekutsatfwa kwetincu mo; bafundzise lokukahle nalokungasikahle; bese uya bakhutsate kutsi basho indle la labativa ngayo.
tgt: ningazithethisi; khuluma ni nazo ngenhlonipho; zivumeleni zizikhethele, zibandakanyeni ezinhle lweni zokuthathwa kwezi nqumo; zifundiseni ngoku phathelene nokufanele kanye nokungafanele; bese nizigqugquzele ukuthi zisho ukuthi zizizwa kanjani.

src: ningakwenta loku nge kubamba imihlangano ye mndeni njalo njalo, lapho wonkhe umuntfu atawukhu luma abuye alalele.
tgt: ningakwenza lokhu ngokubamba imihlanga no yomndeni njalo, lapho kukhuluma futhi kulalela khona wonke umuntu.

src: kukhu luma yindlela lekahle yeku fundzisa bantfwana kantsi ungakhutsata kutiphatsa kahle ngekutsi uvele uba chazele tintfo.
tgt: uku khuluma kuyindlela engco no kakhulu yokufundisa izingane futhi ungakhutha za ukuziphatha kahle ngo kuvele nje uzichazele izi nto.

src: ichildline south africa yecwayisa ba tali kutsi balalelisise neku tsi babe nesineke, njengoba kungenteka kutsi bantfwa na bangakwati kusho indlela labativa ngayo nalebacaba nga ngayo.
tgt: uchildline south afri ca ucebisa abazali ukuthi ba lalelisise futhi babe nesineke, ngenxa yokuthi kungenzeka izingane zingakwazi ukusho ukuthi zicabangani noma ukuthi zizizwa kanjani.

src: bantfwana badzinga kwati kutsi yini leyamukelekile nalengakamukeleki cinisekisa kutsi bayati kutsi kungani kudzingeka umtse tfo nekutsi kutawuba nemi phumela uma ngabe bawu phula.
tgt: izingane zidinga ukwazi ukuthi yini eyemukelekile kanye nengemukelekile qinisekisa ukuthi ziyazi ukuthi kungani kudingeka imithetho nokuthi uzojeziswa uma uyephula.

src: hlala wenta ngendle la lefanako kantsi uyifeze lemiphumela.
tgt: ungaguquki kulokho okwenzayo bese usebenzisa lokhu kujezisa.

src: ngalesikhatsi bantfwana baya ngekukhula, bakhutsate kutsi bacocisane ngalemitsetfo bese uyabace la kutsi basite ngekuncuma lemiphumela.
tgt: ngesikhathi izingane zikhu la, zigqugquzele ukuthi zidi ngide le mithetho futhi zisize ukuthi zihlonze imiphumela.

src: babonge njalo bantfwana uma bente kahlengekubatjela kwekutsi utitsandza kangakanani letintfo letihle labatentako, tento letimbi tingahle titi phelele.
tgt: ncoma izingane ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ziziphathe kahle ngokuzitshela ukuthi uzithanda kanjani izinto ezinhle ezizenzayo, zingayeka ukungaziphathi kahle.

src: kungeta, bonga umsebenti lomuhle kancono kunekubajezisa.
tgt: ukengeza kulokho, ukuklomelisa kusebenza kangcono kunokujezisa.

src: ngalesikha tsi batali labanyenti babonga bantfwana ngetinto teba ntfwana tekudlala nemaswi di, kubonga lokuhle kuba kubanga, kumamatseka nekukhombisa inshisekelo kubo.
tgt: nanoma abazali abaningi beklomelisa izingane ngezinto zezingane zoku dlala noma ngamaswidi, ukuklomelisa okungcono ukwanga, ukumamatheka kanye nokukhombisa ukuthi unendaba nazo.

src: kwakha kutetsemba kubalulekile kutsi usite umntfwanakho ekwakheni indlela yekutetsemba.
tgt: ukwakha ukuzethembakubalulekile ukuthi usize ukwakha ukuzethemba kwe ngane yakho.

src: unga basita bantfwana bakho ngekutsi ubabonge ngekutsi bazame kusita nekusebe ntisa imicabango yabo, ku hlakanipha nekudlala nabo; kubakhutsata kutsi bakhu lume; ubente bative bakhe tsekile nekutsi ubatjele kutsi babaluleke kangakanani; futsi utsembeke, kute kutsi batsembele kuwe.
tgt: ungasiza izi ngane zakho ngokuzincoma ngokuzama ukusiza kanye nangokusebenzisa lokho ezikucabangayo, ubuhlakani kanye nokudlala kwazo; zigqugquzele ukuthi zikhu lume; zenze zizizwe zikhe thekile; futhi nawe wethe mbeke, ukuze zikwazi uku thembela kuwe.

src: kutiphatsa lokunebungoti akukamukelekiakukaze kwamukeleke kulimata bantfwana.
tgt: indlela yokuziphatha elimazayo ayemukelekileakwemukelekile nanini ukulimaza izingane.

src: tento tekubalimata tifaka ekha tsi kumemeta, kubatfuka, kubasabisa nekubenta bative babancane.
tgt: indlela yokuziphatha elimazayo ihlanganisa ukuzimemeza, ukuzithuka ngenhlamba, uku zesabisa kanye nokuzijivaza.

src: kutfuka embi kwebantfwana noma kuba tfuka kungabenta bative ban gakaphephi futsi basatjiswa.
tgt: ukuthuka inhlamba phambi kwezingane noma ukuthuka izingane ngenhlamba kunge nzeka kuzenze zizizwe zinga vikelekile futhi zisengozini.

src: litfuba lekugcina lekubhalisela kuvota vukuzenzele unnamed imphelasontfo yekubha lisela kuvota itawu ba ngemgcibelo, ti26 nangelisontfo, ti27 bhimbi dwane 2019 ngekusho kwasi hlalo wekhomishini yelukhe tfo letimele (iiec), glen mashinini.
tgt: ithuba lokugcina lokubhalisela ukuvota vukuzenzele unnamed impelasonto yokubha lisela ukuvota izoba ngo mgqibelo mhla zinga ma26 nangesonto mhla zingama27 kumasingana 2019 ngokusho kukasihlalo wekhomishani yokhetho ezimele (iiec), uglen mashinini.

src: mashinini watsi tonkhe titeshi tekuvota leti22 932 titawuvulwa kusuka ngensi mbi ye08h00 kuya kuye17h00 kulemphelasontfo yekubhalisela kuvota.
tgt: umashinini uthe zonke izikhungo zokuvota eziyizi22 932 zizovula kusukela ngo08h00 ukuya ngo17h00 ngempelasonto yokubhalisela ukuvota.

src: "loku kwentelwa kuvumela bavoti labasha babhalise nekutsi labo labangacali kuvota babuyekete futsi bahlole imininingwane yabo.
tgt: "lokhu kwenzelwa uku vumela abaqala ukubhalisa ukuba babhalise kuthi labo aseke babhalisa bavuselele futhi babheke imininingwane yabo yokubhalisa."

src: "mashinini watsi nyalo kune bavoti labatigidzi leti26.1 lababhalisile kuloluhlu lwebavoti lwavelonkhe.
tgt: umashinini uthe esikhathini samanje balinganiselwa kwizigidi ezingama26.1 abantu ababhalisele ukuvota ohlwini lukazwelonke lwabavoti.

src: iiec ihlose kungeta loku ngenani bavoti labasha la basigidzi kuloluhlu lwe bavoti ngembi kwelukhetfo lwe2019.
tgt: iiec ifisa ukwengeza oku ngenani esinye isigidi sabavo ti ohlwini lwabavoti ngapha mbi kokhetho lowezi2019.

src: mashinini watsi kubhali sela kuvota kutawentiwa na setikhungwini tekucondzisa similo (majele) eveni lonkhe kute tiboshwa nato tisebentise lilungelo lato lekuvota.
tgt: umashinini uphinde wathi ukubhalisela ukuvo ta kuzokwenziwa futhi na sezikhungweni zokuqondi swa kwezigwegwe ezweni lonkana ukunikeza iziboshwa ithuba lokusebenzisa ilungelo lazo lokuvota.

src: "mayelana nekuvota, tiboshwa titsatfwa njenge bavoti lababhalisele kuvota esigodzini lijele lelikuso.
tgt: "ngokohlelo lokuvota, iziboshwa zithathwa ngo kuthi zibhalisele ukuvota ezifundeni zokuvota lapho ziboshwe khona.

src: "emalunga emndeni alabo lababoshiwe labaseti khungwini tekucondzisa similo ayacelwa kutsi atfumele bomatisi babo kubo ngembi kwekucala kubhalisela kuvota," kwasho mashinini.
tgt: "amalungu emindeni alabo abagqunywe emajele kucelwa ukuba athumele omazisi babo ngaphambi kosuku lokubha lisela ukuvota," ngokusho kukamashinini.

src: kubhalisela kuvotaiiec iyatsemba kutsi bavoti, lesevele babhalisile, batawusebentisa lelitfuba kuvakashela etiteshini tekuvota bayohlola kutsi babhalisile nekucinisekisa kanye nekulungisa imininingwane yemakheli abo.
tgt: ukubhalisela ukuvotaiiec ithemba ukuthi abavoti, asebebhalisile, bazothatha leli thuba bavakashele izikhungo zabo zokuvota babheke ukuthi babhalisile, ikakhulukazi baqinisekise futhi balungise amakheli abo.

src: naku lekufanele ukwati: tonkhe takhamuti taseni ngizimu afrika letineminya ka le16 nangetulu letina matisi losemtsetfweni tinga bhalisela kuba bavoti (nano ma kutawuvota kuphela labo labaneminyaka lokungenani le18 ngelilanga lekuvota).
tgt: nakhu okufanele ukwazi: zonke izakhamuzi zase ningizimu afrika ezine minyaka yobudala eyi16 nangaphezulu ezinomazisi osemthethweni zingabhali sela ukuvota (nakuba kuyila bo abaneminyaka eyi18 ngo suku lokuvota abangavota).

src: tindlela longatigcina ngato uphephile kulesikhatsi semaholide akhisimusi dale hes sikhatsi semaholi de akhisimusi sikhatsi senjabulo.
tgt: amasu okukugcina uphephile ngale si sikhathi samaholide kakhisimusi dale hes isikhathi samaholide kakhisimusi isikhathi senjabulo.

src: kodvwa siphindze siletse bungoti lobukhulu lobu fana netingoti tetimoto, kweba nalamanye emacala.
tgt: kodwa sibuye sandise nezehlakalo zezigemegeme ezifana nezingozi zezimoto, ubusela nobunye ubulelesi.

src: landzela leticwayiso kucinisekisa kutsi uba nesikhatsi lesiphephile na lesitfokotisako netihlobo takho.
tgt: landela lawa masu ukuze uqikelele ukuthi uphe phile futhi uthokozile ngaso sonke isikhathi, wena nezihlobo zakho.

src: hlala uphephile emigwacenitingoti temgwaco tiba tini ngi kakhulu ngesikhatsi semaholide akhisimusi, lapho bantfu labanengi bashona.
tgt: phepha emigwaqweniizingozi zomgwaqo ziba ziningi kakhulu ngesikhathi samaholide kakhisimusi, zibulale amakhulu abantu.

src: kute uhlale uphephile, cinisekisa kutsi: wenta luhlolo lwemoto ngembi kwekucala luhambo, kute ucinisekise kutsi imoto yakho isesimeni lesikahle.
tgt: ukuze uhlale uphephile, qikelela ukuthi: uhlola imoto yakho ngaphambi kokuba uye lapho uphokophele ukuya khona, ukuze uqikelele ukuthi ise simweni esigculisayo.

src: wena nebagibeli bakho nihlala nibophe ema bhandi.
tgt: wena nabagibeli bakho ngaso sonke isikhathi nifase amabhande emotweni.

src: utsatsa likhefu njalo emva kwemahora lamabili uma ushayela libanga lelidze.
tgt: njalo ngemuva kwamahora amabili uthathe ikhefu uma ushayela ibanga elide.

src: gwema kushayela udza kiwe.
tgt: ngaso sonke isikhathi gwema uphuzo ngesikhathi ushayela.

src: landzela silinganiso sesivinini lesibekiwe bese ulandzela yonkhe imitse tfo yemgwaco.
tgt: bambelela kwisivinini esibekiwe futhi uqa phele yonke imithetho yomgwaqo.

src: caphela letinye tigitje lwa nalabahamba nge tinyawo.
tgt: qaphela ezinye izimoto nabahamba ngezi nyawo.

src: gwema kusebentisa lucingo uma ushayela.
tgt: kugweme ukusebenzi sa umakhalekhukhwini ngesikhathi ushayela.

src: kuvikeleka kwebantfwanatindzawo tetiningi letivakashelwako tihlala timatasatasa, lokusho kutsi kunematfuba ekutsi u mntfwana wakho advuke lapho kugcwele khona bantfu.
tgt: izindawo eziningi zamaho lide zimatasatasa kakhulu, okuchaza ukuthi kungenze ka ingane yakho ihlukane nawe esixukwini sabantu.

src: kubalulekile futsi kutsi uhlale ubagadzile bantfwa na bakho uma benta tintfo letifana nekubhukusha e lwandle noma badlala eti ndzaweni tekudlala.
tgt: kusemqoka futhi ukuqapha abantwana bakho uma kunezinto enizenzayo ezifana nokubhukuda olwandle noma nidlala emabaleni okudlalela.

src: nati letinye ticwayiso tekugci na umntfwana wakho a phephile: cinisekisa kutsi ba ntfwana labancane bahlala bagadziwe ngumuntfu lomdzala.
tgt: lawa ngamasu azogcina abantwana bakho bephephile: qikelela ukuthi aba ntwana abancane baqa shwe umuntu omdala ngaso sonke isikhathi.

src: emotweni, cinisekisa kutsi bantfwana labancane bahlala bafase libhandi.
tgt: emotweni, qikelela ukuthi abantwana abancane bafase amabhande.

src: fundzisa bantfwana labasakhulile inombolo yamakhalekhikhini wakho labatayishayela uma basesimeni lesibucayi.
tgt: fundisa abantwana asebekhulile inombolo yakho kamakha lekhukhwini uma kwenzeka kuba nesimo esiphuthumayo.

src: cinisekisa kutsi ba ntfwana labangakwati kubhukusha kahle ba gcokiswa tinsita teku bhukusha.
tgt: qikelela ukuthi aba ntwana abangakwazi ukubhukuda kahle bagqoke amabhangela afuthwe ngomoya uma bebhukuda.

src: fundzisa bantfwana kutsi bangagibeli imoto yemuntfu labangamati futsi banga khulumi nemuntfu labangamati.
tgt: fundisa abantwana bakho ukuthi bangali nge bangene emotweni yomuntu abangamazi futhi bangakhulumi nabantu abangabazi.

src: bamba umntfwana ngesandla uma useti ndzaweni letimatasatasa nanoma weca umgwaco.
tgt: bamba isandla so mntwana wakho uma usendaweni ematasatasa futhi noma weqa umgwaqo.

src: fundza tintfo letisisekelo telusito lwekucala kute ukhone kutisebentisa uma usesimeni setemphilo lesibucayi.
tgt: funda imigomo elula yosizo lokuqala ukuze uyisebenzise uma kunesimo esiphuthumayo.

src: bugebenguliyakhula lizinga letehlakalo tekugcekeza etindlini kanye netekweba ngesikha tsi semaholide akhisimusi.
tgt: ubulelesi kunezehlakalo eziningi zokugqekezwa kwezindlu nezigebengu ngamaholide kakhisimusi.

src: hlala ucaphele ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi bese ulandzela nati tindlela tekutivikela: uma uyovakasha, cinisekisa kutsi onkhe emafasitelo netivalo tendlu yakho tikhiyiwe.
tgt: qaphela ngaso sonke isikhathi ulande la lawa masu okuphepha: uma uhamba uya kumaholide, qikelela ukuthi wonke amafasitela nezicabha zendlu yakho kuvaliwe.

src: uma munye kubomakhelwane bakho atawubakhona, mcele akubukele indlu yakho.
tgt: uma omunye woma khelwane engeke aha mbe, bacele ukuba baku bhekele indlu yakho.

src: ngalesikhatsi uvaka shile, cinisekisa kutsi tintfo letibalulekile letinjengabomakhalekhikhini netikhwama temali atikho emehlwe ni ebantfu.
tgt: uma useholidini, gcina izinto ezibalulekile ezifana nomakhalekhukhwini nezikhwa ma zemali kufihlekile.

src: imoto yakho ayihlale ikhiyiwe uma uyishiya ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi.
tgt: gcina imoto yakho ikhiyiwe uma uyishiya noma ngabe isikhathi esingakanani.

src: cinisekisa kutsi ikhiyiwe ngekuhlola tibambo tetivalo temoto.
tgt: qikelela ngokunyakazisa izibamba zesicabha.

src: sebentisa imali ngebuhlakani allison cooper sikhatsi semaholide akhisimusi akufuneki sishiye kuvuleke u mgodzi wetikweleti.
tgt: sebenzisa imali ngobuhlakani allison cooper amaholide kakhisi musi akufanele aku shiye unembombo yomgodi wezikweleti uma ephela.

src: "kusebentisa imali ngalo kwendlulele kufana nesi kweleti lesikukhatsatako le siviwa nguwe wedvwa.
tgt: "ukusebenzisa imali nge ndlela engafanele kufana nesikweleti esiyiphela e ndlebeni.

src: ku ncono kakhulu kugwema kusebentisa imali ngalokwe ndlulele kulokhisimusi ngo ba kungaba nemtselela lo mkhulu emalini yakho isikhatsi lesidze," kwasho umphatsi wetekutsenga nekutsengisa wedebtsafe ma tthys potgieter.
tgt: kuhle ukugwema ukuchitha imali ngendlela engafanele kulawa maholide kakhisimusi ngoba kungaba nomthelela omkhulu emalini yakho kanye nakuhlelo lwakho esikhathini esizayo," ngokusho komphathi wezokukhangisa nokudayisa edebtsafe umatthys po tgieter.

src: "bumnandzi bekusebenti sa imali ngalokwendlulele ngelweti nangengongoni yintfo yesikhashana letawe nta batsengi badvonse mati ma ngenca yetincumo leba ngakaticabangisisi labati tsetse ngasekupheleni kwa bhimbidvwane 2019. ungase bentisi imali longenayo," kwangeta potgieter.
tgt: "ubumnandi bokuthenga ngenyanga kalwezi nozi bandlela bobesikhashana futhi abathengi bazokuzwa ubunzima bokusaphaza ima li ekupheleni komasingana 2019. ungayisebenzisi imali ongenayo," kwengeza upo tgieter.

src: mellony ramalho weafri can bank watsi tisebenti ti vamise kuholelwa ngembi kwesikhatsi ngengongoni, lokwenta sikhatsi sekulindza kuhola ngabhimbidvwane sibe sidze.
tgt: umellony ramalho wea frican bank uthi abasebenzi bajwayele ukusheshe bahole ngenyanga kazibandlela, okwenza bawulinde eside isikhathi umholo wabo wa ngomasingana.

src: "bhimbidvwane yinyanga lematima ebantfwini labani ngi, labanye bagcina base bentisa emacredit card noma baboleke imali.
tgt: "umasingana inyanga enzi ma kubantu abaningi, abanye basebenzisa amakhadi ezi kweleti noma baboleke ima li.

src: kubalulekile kuhlala ucaphele kuloko losebentisa imali kuko.
tgt: kubalulekile ukuqaphela ukuthi imali yakho uyisebenzi sa kanjani.

src: ku ncono kwenta luhlu lwetinto lotawusebentisa imali kuto kute ubalekele kusebentisa imali ngalokwendlulele," kwasho ramalho.
tgt: okugcono enza uhlu lwezinto ofuna ukuyi sebenzisa kuzo imali yakho ukuze ugweme ukusebenzisa imali ngendlela engafanele," ngokusho kukaramalho.

src: potgieter ucwayisa batse ngi kutsi bacale kutsenga tintfo tangengongoni kusanesikhatsi futsi bacinisekise kutsi banekudla lokwanele futsi banetinhlobo teku dla letitawuhlala sikhatsi lesidze, kute bakhone kulawula indlela lebayise bentisa ngayo imali yabo nekugwema kutsenga sekute sikhatsi tintfo setibita kakhulu.
tgt: upotgieter ululeke aba thengi ukuba baqale uku thenga izinto zikakhisimusi kusenesikhathi futhi baqikelele ukuthi bathenga ukudla okwanele futhi bathenge izi nhlobo zokudla ezizohlala isikhathi eside, ukuze banga sebenzisi imali ngendlela engafanele futhi bagweme nokuthenga izinto ezibizayo ngemizuzu yokugcina.

src: potgieter wecwayise batsengi nganati tindlela labangayonga ngato imali: batsenge kudla lokuningi lokutawuhlala sikhatsi lesidze.
tgt: le indlela upotgieter aluleka ngayo abathengi ukuze bagcine imali yabo isesimweni esihle.

src: babuke kutsi angeke bagibelisane emotweni leyodvwa.
tgt: thenga ukudla okwanele futhi okuyizinhlobo ezizohlala isikhathi eside cabanga ngokusebenzisa imoto eyodwa.

src: kusebentisa timoto letimbalwa kusho kutsi kutawusebenta imali lencane kuphethilomu.
tgt: ukusebe nzisa izimoto ezimbalwa kuchaza ukusebenzisa imali encane kuphethiloli.

src: gwema kusebentisa imi gwaco lekhokhelwako uma kukhonakala.
tgt: gwema imigwaqo ekho khelwayo uma kungenzeka.

src: bantfwana abasebentise tintfo labatisungulele tona kwenta tipho tetihlobo kunekutsi titsengwe.
tgt: esikhundleni sokuthenga izipho vumela abantwana ukuba babhake izinto ezihlukile babhakele izihlobo.

src: cala kusanesikhatsi ku tsengela khisimusi.
tgt: qala uthenge izinto zika khisimusi kusenesikhathi.

src: kuphela kwemshado ngekwemtsetfo dale hes nasewulinge konkhe longakwenta kutsi umshado wakho uphumelele, idivosi kungaba yintfo lencono kini nobabili wena nemlingani wakho.
tgt: kuqedwa komshado ngokomthetho dale hes uma sewukuzame konke ukuze umsha do wakho uphumelele, isahlukaniso somshado singaba yindlela engcono enganilungela wena nomli ngani wakho.

src: idivosi ilukhuni futsi ibanga sitresi emindenini kantsi futsi nenchubo yetemtsetfo ingakudida.
tgt: isahlukaniso sinzima futhi sifaka ingcinde zi emindenini kanti inqubo yezomthetho eqondene naso kwesinye isikhathi iyadida.

src: idivosi ngulesikhatsi umshado uphela ngekwemtsetfo enkantolo yemtsetfo.
tgt: isahlukaniso somshado sisho isimo lapho umshado sewuhlukaniswe ngokomthetho enkantolo yomthetho.

src: kunetinhlobo letimbili tedivosi: lengaphikiswa – lapho khonaomabili emacembu avumelana kutsi idivosi ku fanele kutsi yenteke; futsi ingaphikiswa – lapho khona emacembu angavumelani ngaledivosi nome ngemibandzela yayo.
tgt: kunezi nhlobo ezimbili zesahlukaniso: esingaphikisiwe lapho bobabili abathintekayo bevumelana ngokuthi kufanele kube nesahlukaniso somshado; kanye nesiphikisiwe lapho abathintekayo bengavumelani ngesahlukaniso somshado noma imibandela yaso.

src: josephine peta, sisebenti lesikhulu sekuphatfwa kwemtsetfo ehhovisi lemmeli wemndeni etikweni letebulungiswa nekutfutfukiswa kwemtsetfosisekelo, uchaza kutsi inchubo yedivosi icala ngesikhatsi kukhishwa emasamanisi.
tgt: ujosephine peta, isenior legal admin officer yehhovisi lomnyango wezobulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa komthethosisekelo lommeli wezeminde ni, uchaza ukuthi inqubo yokuhlukanisa umshado iqala lapho kukhishwa amasamanisi.

src: "umuntfu lofuna kutsi umshado wabo uphele angatfola emasamanisi edivosi enkantolo lephakeme nome yesifundza, nome bangabona na nemmeli kutsi abasite kulenchubo.
tgt: "umuntu ofuna ukuchitha umshado wakhe angawathola amasamanisi esahlukaniso somshado enkantolo ephakeme noma eyesifunda, noma lapho eya kummeli ecela ukusizwa ngenqubo.

src: lowo locala inchubo yedivosi emkhatsini walabo labashadile ubitwa ngekutsi ngummangali bese kutsi lolomunye yena ubitwa ngekutsingummangalelwa," kwasho yena njalo peta.
tgt: umlingani oqala inqubo yokwahlukanisa umshado ubizwa ngokuthi ummangali bese omunye umlingani abizwe ngokuthi ummangalelwa," kusho upeta.

src: peta uchaze kutsi emasamanisi edivosi kufanele: asho kutsi sekute lelinye litfuba lekubuyisela lobudlelwane esimeni lesifanele, ente kutsi kube nekwehlukaniswa kwemphahla labanayo labayihlanganyelako nome kufezekiswe imibandzela lekwa vunyelanwa ngayo ngesikhatsi kusayinwa lesivumelwane semshado ekucaleni kwalomshado, kanye, nekuchaza kutsi ngumaphi emalu ngiselelo lentelwe bantfwana balaba labashadene, njengekutsi nje umntfwana utawuhlala nabani.
tgt: upeta uchaze wathi amasamanisi esahlukaniso somshado kumele: asho ukuthi ayisekho nhlobo indlela efanelekile engasetshenziswa ukuze kuvuselelwe ubudlelwane, ahlinzekele ukwahlu kaniswa kwempahla ehlanganyelwe noma ukuphoqelela imigomo okuvunyelwene ngayo esivumelwaneni sanga phambi komshado esisayinwa ekuqaleni komshado, futhi acacise ukuthi zinhlelo zini ezizokwenziwa ngezingane zabalingani, njengokuthi ingane izohlala nobani.

src: "lamasamanisi kufanele kutsi aphindze futsi asho kutsi ummangalelwa unetinsuku leti10 – nangabe ahlala endzaweni yinye nemmangali, nome tinsuku letinge20 – nangabe lamacembu ahlala etifundzeni letahlukene, kute aphendvule lamasamanisi," kwengeta peta.
