src: ngenca yaloko, sivamise kunga boni kutsi sisuka khashane kanganani kute sikhone kufeza timiso letisisekelo semtsetfosisekelo wetfu futsi letichumanisa imicondvo netifundziso tasteve biko.
tgt: ngaleso sizathu, sihlala njalo sikhohlwa ukuthi sibuya kuphi ekusebenzi seni izimiso eziyisisekelo somthethosisekelo wethu futhi ezenanela imica bango nezimfundiso zikasteve biko.

src: ngemnyaka we1997, umbuso lobewungenalu velo wabulala lomunye umholi walelive lakitsi lobekatse mbisa kakhulu ngekumncisha kudla, emanti kanye nekwelashwa lobe kakudzinga kakhulu ngenca yekushaywa kabuhlungu ngemaphoyisa elubandlu lulo.
tgt: ngowe1977, umbuso ongenanhliziyo wabulala omunye wabaholi bezwe owayenekusasa ngokumncisha ukudla, amanzi kanye namakhambi okwelapha ayewadinga ngokuphuthuma ngenxa yokushaywa ngesihluku ngamaphoyisa obandlu lulo.

src: emva kweminyaka lemashumi lamabili, sincumo senkantolo semnyaka we1997, inkantolo yemtsetfosisekelo yatsi kuphumelelisa emalungelo lasisekelo awo wonkhe umuntfu nekutfola ema lungelo abo etemnotfo kuluphawu lwemmango wentsandvoyelinyenti loluhlose kubuyisela sitfunti lesilahlekile.
tgt: emva kweminyaka engamashumi amabili, kwisahlulelo senkantolo sangowe1997, inkantolo yomthethosisekelo yathi ukuphelelisa ama lungelo ayisisekelo azo zonke izakhamuzi kanye nokusebenzela ukuzuza amalungelo abo ezenhlalomnotho kunguphawu lompha kathi wentando yeningi labantu ohlose ukubuyisa isithunzi esalahleka.

src: namuhla eningizimu afrika, siyachubeka kuse bentela kuphumelelisa emalungelo lasisekelo awo wonkhe umuntfu waseningizimu afrika kute baphile imphilo lesezingeni lenge nato tifo, indlala nekuswela.
tgt: namuhla eningizimu afrika, siyaqhubeka nokusebenza ukuphelelisa amalungelo ayisisekelo awowonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika ukuze bezophila impilo esezingeni engenazo izifo, indlala kanye nokuswela.

src: imibuso yentsandvoye linyenti lelandzelanako isebentise imitsetfomigomo leletsa sitfunti sebantfu balelive lebesilahlekile ngekubanika imfundvo, kunakekelwa kwetemphilo, tindlu kanye netinsita letisi sekelo.
tgt: uhulumeni wentando yeningi labantu owalandela waqalisa izinqubomgomo zokubuyisa isithunzi esalahleka seningi lakuleli lizwe ngokuhlinzeka ngemfundo, ukunakekelwa kwezempilo, izindlu kanye nezidingonqangi.

src: namuhla eningizimu afrika, kutfola imfundvo lesezingeni kulilungelo lelisisekelo.
tgt: eningizimu afrika namuhla, imfundo engcono iyilungelo elihamba phambili.

src: hulumende utjale timali kumfundvo legcile ekukhuliseni kahle bantfwana, ekusekeleni imiphumela yetifundvo ebantfwaneni balelive lakitsi labasesebancane, futsi kusita ummango ngeluhlelo leku phakela bantfwana kudla etikolweni kucinisekisa kutsi bafundzi labasesebancane batfola imiphumela lesetulu.
tgt: uhulumeni utshale izimali ekuthuthu kisweni kwabantwana, ekwesekeni imiphumela yemfundo yabantwana, kanye nokuhlinzeka ngosizo lwezenhlalo ngezinhlelo zesondlo ezikoleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi bethu abancane bathola imiphu mela emihle esikoleni.

src: ngalesikimu savelonkhe selusito lwetimali kuba fundzi nangaletinye tinhlobo telusito lwahulumende, tinkhulungwane tebantfu labasha baseningizimu afrika labavela eminde nini lephuyile bakhonile kuba bodokotela, bammeli, bothishela, bososayensi, emaathizeni nabosomabhi zinisi.
tgt: ngoxhasomali lwaba fundi inational student financial aid scheme nangezinye izindlela ezehlukene zosizo lukahu lumeni, izinkulungwane zabantwana baseningi zimu afrika abaphuma emakhaya antulayo zikwazile ukuba ngodo kotela, abameli, othisha, ososayensi, izingcweti kanye nosomabhizinisi.

src: hulumende usekela takhamuti letibutsakatsaka ngekusebentisa tinhlelo tekusita emakhaya laphuyile futsi iniketa ematfuba emisebenti ngaletinhlelo tahulumende tekucasha bantfu labanengi.
tgt: uhulumeni weseka izakhamuzi ezibutha kathaka nezintulayo ngokusebenzisa usizo lokusiza imindeni ehlu phekayo nokuhlinzeka ngamathuba omsebenzi ngezinhlelo zemisebenzi kahulumeni.

src: kuleningizimu afrika lebeyicindzetela leyabulala steve biko, bekute kukhu luma ngekukhululeka kantsi kuba sishoshovi kutepolitiki bekuholela ekutseni uboshwe ngaphandle kwekushushiswa noma ubulawe.
tgt: iningizimu afrika ecinde zelayo lapho kwafela khona usteve biko, ukukhuluma ngokukhululeka kwakunqa nyuliwe futhi ubushoshovu bezepolitiki baheha ukuboshwa noma okunzima kakhulu kunalokho.

src: namuhla eningizimu afrika, bantfu labasha labaneminyaka lelingana naleyo bekanayo steve biko noma lemincane kunaleyo bahamba embili kutebu shoshovi betintfo leti sedvute nabo, futsi bayakhona kutihlela kahle ngekukhululeka ngaphandle kwekuhlukunyetwa noma kwekudzingiswa.
tgt: namuhla eningizimu afrika, abantu abasha abalingana nosteve biko futhi abangaphansi kwakhe bahamba phambili bayizishoshovu zalokho abakholelwa kukho, futhi bayakwazi ukuhlela nga phandle kokuhlukunye zwa noma ukudingiswa.

src: kukhu luma nekuhlanganyela ngekukhululeka, lilungelo lekubhikisha kanye nelilungelo lekulingana ngembi kwemtsetfo ku yalandzelwa kubo bonkhe bantfu.
tgt: inkululeko yokukhuluma nokuzibandakanya, ilungelo lokubhikisha kanye nelungelo lokulingana ngaphambi komthetho kubekwe phezulu kukho konke.

src: sisive, sihambe libanga lelidze kute siphumelele kutfola sitfunti sebuntfu, lekusimiso besihlonishwa ngusteve biko.
tgt: njengezwe, sibuya kude ekupheleliseni isithunzi somuntu, okuyisimiso usteve biko ayesiqhakambisa kakhulu.

src: kodvwa, sisanendlela lendze leku mele siyihambe.
tgt: kodwa, liselide ibanga okusamele silihambe.

src: kungasebenti, kungabi nendlu, nagezi noma emanti lahambako, kungabi nemhlaba, kungabi nemakhono noma ematfuba, tigidzi tebantfu baseningizimu afrika basengakayitfoli imphilo lebafuna kuyi phila.
tgt: ngaphandle komsebenzi, ngaphandle kwendlu, ugesi noma amanzi, ngaphandle komhlaba, ngaphandle kwamakhono noma amathuba, izigidi zabantu baseningizimu afrika basanqatshelwe impilo abayifunayo nebafanele.

src: kungako hulu mende asebentisana nebalingani betemnotfo kute kwakhiwe umnotfo lofaka wonkhe umuntfu, kwakhiwe ematfuba emisebenti, kuncedvwe emabhizinisi aphumelele futsi kuliwe nebuphuya nendlala.
tgt: yingakho uhulumeni esebenzi sana nababambiqhaza emphakathini ukwakha umnotho obandakanya wonke umuntu, ukwakha amathuba emisebenzi, ukuvumela amabhizinisi ukuthi alwisane futhi abhekane nobubha nendlala.

src: luhlelo lwekunika bahlukunyetwa emandla lubuyisa litsemba owen mngadi luhlelo lasethohoya ndou lwekunika bahlu kunyetwa emandla (itvep) lufuna kubuyisa litsemba nekutitsemba kuluhlelo lwetebulungiswa ngekusebentisa tinyatselo talo letinemandla letihlose kusita labo labasindzile kuludlame lolumayelana netebulili (igbv) nasekudlwengulweni ngekubanika tinsita tetengco ndvo.
tgt: uhlelo lokuhlomisa izisulu lubuyisa ithemba owen mngadi uhlelo lwasethohoya ndou lokuhlomisa izisulu (itvep) luhlose ukubuyisa ithemba nokuzithemba kubulungiswa ngemizamo yalo enzulu ehlose ekusizeni labo abasinde kudlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile (igbv) kanye nokudlwengulwa ngokubahli nzeka ngezinsizakalo zesimo sengqondo nezenhlalo.

src: letvep leyacalwa elimpo po eminyakeni lema20 leye ngcile, isebentela etibhedlela itshilidzini nedonald fraser letingaphasi kwamasipala wasekhaya ithulamela.
tgt: itvep eyasungulwa elimpopo eminyakeni engama20 eyedlule, isebenza esibhedlela sasetshilidzini nasedonald fraser ngapha nsi komasipala wendawo ithulamela.

src: libamba lemcondzisi waloluhlelo fhatuwani manthada utsi loluhlelo luhlose kufaka indlela yekubuka tintfo lengavumeli nakancane kutsi kube nekuhlukunyetwa ngekwemacansi, ngekwegbv kanye nekwebantfwana kuletakhamuti tasethohoyandou, ngoba kuliciniso lelimsulwa kutsi loluhlobo lwemacala ayenteka kulendzawo.
tgt: ibamba lomqondisi wayo ufhatuwani manthada uthi lolu hlelo luhlose ukugcizelela ukungahambisani neze nokuhlaselwa ngokwezocansi, igbv kanye nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantwana kubahlali basethohoyandou, ngokubuka ukuthi la macala ayinsakavukela kule ndawo.

src: utsi esikhatsini lesengci le, lubalobalo lwemacala beluvamise kukhomba kutsi bewamanengi emacala ekudlwengula ethohoyandou, kodvwa itvep ibe neligalelo lelikhulu ekuletseni lwatiso nekunika bantfu tinsita tekwelulekwa ngekuhlukumeteka kute kuliwe nalomkhuba lomubi.
tgt: uthi esikhathini esedlule, izibalo zobugebengu bezi jwayele ukubonisa ukuthi ebemaningi amacala oku dlwengula ethohoyandou, kodwa itvep isithathe igxathu elikhulu ekuqwashiseni nasekuhlinzekeni ngezinsizakalo zokweluleka ukunqanda lesi sihlava.

src: njengoba umhlaba wonkhe utawube ubuke lomkhankhaso wetinsuku leti16 tebushoshovi bekucedza ludlame lolubhekiswe kubomake nasebantfwaneni kusuka mhla ti25 lweti kuya kumhla ti10 ingongoni, manthada utsi loluhlelo lunelisekile ngaloku leselikwentile lekukugcugcutela takhamuti kutsi tiwavisise emalungelo ato nekutsi tibike uma kwenteka emacala.
tgt: njengoba umhlaba uzobe unomkhankaso wezinsuku eziyi16 zokulwa nokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nabantwana kusuka mhla wama25 kulwezi kuya mhla we10 kuzibandlela, umanthada uthi uhlelo lolu lugculisekile ngenqubekelaphambili esiyenziwe ekugqugquzeleni abahlali ukuthi bazi ngamalungelo abo futhi babike ngobugebengu.

src: "letvep itfola bahlukunye twa beludlame lwasekhaya labasemkhatsini kwe80 ne100 njalo ngenyanga, bese kuba macala ekudlwengulwa la45 kuya ku50 labikwa njalo ngenyanga," kusho manthada.
tgt: "itvep yamukela izisulu zodlame lwasekhaya ezipha kathi kwama80 kuya kwi100 nyanga zonke, ngesikhathi lapho kubikwa amacala angama45 kuya kwangama50 okudlwengu lwa nyanga zonke," kusho umanthada.

src: sikhungo lesisodvwa lesiphetse konkhe kwalolu lelo siniketa tinsita letehluka hlukene kubahlukunye twa, letifaka ekhatsi lusito lwetemtsetfo, kuvikeleka kwebahlukunyetwa kulabo lababahlukumetako, kula ndzelela emacala lasenkantolo, kwelulekwa nekuniketwa emandla ngekusebentisa luhlelo lwekutfutfukisa emakhono, ngaloko bahlukunyetwa batfola litfuba lekucala kabusha.
tgt: izikhungo ezinezinsizakalo eziningi zalolu hlelo zinike zela ngochungechunge lwezinsizakalo kwizisulu, okubandakanya ukufinye lela kusizo lwezomthetho, ukuvikelwa kwezisulu kwizigilamkhuba, ukuqa shwa kwamacala enkanto lo, ukwelulekwa kanye nokuhlonyiswa ngokuthu thukiswa kwamakhono, lokho okunika izisulu ithuba lokuqala kabusha.

src: manthada utsi letvep isebenta ngekubambisana nebetemisebenti yetemapho yisa aseningizimu afrika, litiko letemphilo kanye nelekutfutfukiswa kwemma ngo kute kuvikelwe kutsi bahlukunyetwa bangaphindzi bahlukumeteke kwesibili ngalesikhatsi bavula emacala.
tgt: umanthada ubeke wathi itvep isebenzisana nophiko lwamaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika, umnyango wezempilo kanye nomnyango wezokuthuthukiswa komphakathi ukugwema ukuhlukumezeka kwesibili kwezisulu ngesikhathi kuvulwa icala.

src: "emacaleni ekudlwengula, basebenti betemphilo nema phoyisa beta etikhungweni tetvep kutosita bahlukunye twa bavule emacala bavulele labo lababahlukumetako futsi, babanika tinsita tekwelulekwa," usho njalo.
tgt: "emacaleni okudlwengulwa, abasebenzi bezempilo kanye namaphoyisa beza ezikhu ngweni zetvep ukuzosiza izisulu ukuthi zivulele amacala abadlwenguli babo futhi, babanikeze nosizo lokubeluleka ngokwengqondo," kusho yena.

src: itvep ihlalisa labo labahlukumetekile kute kufike etinsukwini leti14, kodvwake, loluhlelo lwekuhlaliswa lungalulwa emacaleni lafaka umndeni wonkhe noma bantfwana.
tgt: itvep ihlalisa izisulu izinsuku eziyi14, kodwake, lolo hlelo lungalulwa emacaleni abandakanya umndeni wonke noma abantwana.

src: "sineyunithi yekunika emandla lehamba icocisana nebantfu futsi ibafundzise mayelana nemalungelo abo.
tgt: "sinophiko oluhlomisa abantu olubamba izingxoxo zomphakathi futhi lufundi se abantu ngamalungelo abo.

src: sisebentela bantfu labatakha muti tasethohoyandou nemaphetselo labangetulu kwesigidzi.
tgt: sisebenzela abahlali abangaphezu kwesigidi esisodwa basethohoyandou nezindawo eziseduzane.

src: itvep futsi ivulele bantfu laba44 ematfuba emsebenti labasebentela ematiko lahlukahlukene lafana nelitiko letetimali, letebasebenti nelekwenta luhlolo.
tgt: si kwazile ukubuyisa ithemba futhi manje abantu sebeya buthemba ubulungiswa ngenxa yobudlelwane bethu namaphoyisa," kusho yena.

src: nanoma loluhlelo luhlala lutfola imali ler90 000 ngekota lebuya kulitiko lwetekutfutfukiswa kwe mmango laselimpopo, itvep yatsintseka kabi ngecovid19 ngoba bonkhe labo bebanikela ngetimali bahoca, ngaleyondlela taba nemtselela lomubi tinchubo tekusebenta talenhlangano.
tgt: itvep isidale amathuba omsebenzi kubantu abangama44 abasebenza eminyangweni eyahluka hlukene efana nowezimali, owabasebenzi kanye nowokuhlola.

src: kodvwa, sikhwama sekuphendvula kuludlame lolubhekiswe kubomake nakulabasikati (igbvf), lesasungulwa ngumengameli cyril ramaphosa ngendlovana kulomnyaka, abambisene nenhlangano yabomake yemhlaba yaseningizimu afrika kanye nebalingani bayo kutenhlalo, balusitile loluhlelo.
tgt: ngaphandle kokuthola uxhasomali oluqhubekayo lwezir90 000 njalo ngekota olusuka emnyangweni wezokuthuthukiswa komphakathi, itvep yathinteka kakhulu ngenxa yecovid19 njengoba abaxhasi abaningi bahoxa, lokho okwashaya kabi izinqubo zokusebenza zenhlangano.

src: kunemali letigidzi letir128 leyacokelelwa ngeminikelo levela kumkhakha lotimele, lephuma esikhwameni semikhakha lehlukahlukene, lesikhwama segbvf sitawusita futsi sitawusekela kusetjentiswa kweluhlelo lwendlelalisu yavelonkhe yegbvf.
tgt: nokho, isikhwama esibhekele udlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane (igbvf), esethulwa ngumongameli ucyril ramaphosa, kanye neforamu yamazwe ngamazwe yabesifazane eningizimu afrika kanye nababambi qhaza emphakathini ngonhlolanja kulo nyaka, silusizile lolu hlelo.

src: itvep yaniketwa imali yalomnyaka ler250 000 futsi itawuphindze itfole lenye imali ngemnyaka we2023.
tgt: itvep yayiphakathi kweqoqo lokuqala lezinhlangano ezilwisana negbvf, ezathola uxhasomali.

src: manthada utsi timali tente kutsi itvep ikhone kufinye lela kubahlukunyetwa labanengi futsi ibe igcina inhlangano isebenta kahle.
tgt: ngesamba sezigidi eziyir128 esaqoqwa ngeminikelo yomkhakha ozimele, uxhaso lwemikhakha eyahluka hlukene, isikhwama segbvf sizosiza futhi seseke ukuqaliswa kohlelo lweqhingakusebenza lukazwelonke lwegbvf.

src: murendeni vhengani (26) ungulomunye webahlukunyetwa lowasindziswa ngilotvep kulisoka lakhe belimhlukumeta.
tgt: itvep yatshelwe izi r250 000 kulo nyaka esi kuwo futhi izothola olunye uxhasomali ngowezi2023.

src: wacedza tinyanga leti46 ahlala nendvodzakati yakhe leneminyaka lemine kulesi khungo.
tgt: umanthada uthi uxhasomali lwenze ukuthi itvep ikwazi ukufinyelela kwizisulu eziningi kanye nokugcina inhlangano isebenza.

src: lesikhungo samsita ngekutsi akhone kuvulela lisoka lasahlukene nalo emacala nangekutsi akhone kutfola umyalo wasenkantolo weku tivikela kulelisoka.
tgt: umurendeni vhengani (26) owasinda nowatakulwa itvep kowayeyisoka lakhe elalimhlukumeza.

src: lelisoka lakhe namanje lisaboshiwe.
tgt: isoka lisahamba ukuqulwa kwecala.

src: "bangemukela ngetandla letifutfumalako emva kwekutsi ngihlupheke iminyaka leminengi.
tgt: "bangamukela ngezandla ezithokomele emva kokuhlupheka iminyaka eminingi.

src: ngativa ngiphe phile.
tgt: ngazizwa ngiphephile.

src: sengiphindze ngatfola kabusha kutetsemba kwami," washo njalo.
tgt: sengibuyelwe ukuzethemba kwami," kusho yena.

src: sihlalo wesikhwama segbvf, dkt.
tgt: usihlalo wesikhwama segbvf, udkt judy dlamini, uthe uxhasomali lwezinhlangano eziyi108 izicelo zazo eziphumelele luyaqhubeka.

src: kuvuliwe kufakwa kweticelo tensfas kwemnyaka we2023 vukuzenzele unnamed kuvuliwe kufakwa kweticelo kusikimu savelonkhe selusito lwetimali sebafundzi (insfas) semnyaka we2023.
tgt: sekuvuliwe ukufakwa kwezicelo zensfas zangowezi2023 vukuzenzele unnamed isikhathi sokufakwa kwezicelo esikhwameni sikazwelonke soxhasomali lwabafundi (insfas) lwezi2023 sesivuliwe.

src: indvuna yetemfundvo lephakeme, tesayensi netekusungula, dkt.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wemfu ndo ephakeme, isayensi nokuqamba kabusha, udkt blade nzimande wenze lesi simemezelo kamuva nje esitha ngamini sabezindaba.

src: blade nzimande, usandza kwetfula lesimemetelo emhlanganweni webetindzaba.
tgt: ungqongqoshe unzimande uthi isikhwama soxhasomali sinqume ukuthi kuvulwe isikhathi sokufaka izicelo masinyane, okwehlukile kunonyaka owedlule, ukuze lokho kuzonika abazofaka izicelo isikhathi esanele sokuhambisa izicelo zabo kanye nemininingwane yamaphepha edingekayo.

src: indvuna nzimande utsi lesikimu sincume kutsi kuvulwe lomjikeleto wekufaka ticelo ngembi kwesikhatsi, kute labo labatawufaka ticelo batfole sikhatsi lesanele sekutfumela ticelo tabo kanye nemadokhumenti lahambisana naleto ticelo.
tgt: ethula umbiko ngoxhasomali lwensfas lonyaka wezi2022, ungqongqoshe unzimande uthe isabelomali sezigidigidi ezingamar43 zazatshelwe lesi sikhwama ukuze sikhokhele izindleko zokufunda zabathole uxhaso, kufaka phakathi ukudla kanye nemali yokugibela, kanjalo nezinsizakufunda.

src: etfula umbiko lomayelana nekuniketwa kwetimali yensfas yemnyaka wekufundza we2022, indvuna nzimande utsi sabelomali lesitigidzigidzi letir43 sabelwa lesikimu kute sikhokhele tindleko tebafundzi tekufundza, letifaka ekhatsi sibonelelo sekudla nesetigitjelwa, kanye nesetinsita tekufundza.
tgt: uthi kwamukelwa izicelo eziyizi985 672 eziyizi140 636 zazo aziphumelelanga.

src: utsi batfola ticelo leti985 672 leti140 636 atange tiphumelele.
tgt: ezicelweni ezamukelwa, izicelo eziyizi739 526 zagunyazwa uxhasomali okwesikhashana kuze kube abafundi babhalisa ezikhungwe ni zemfundo ezifanele.

src: kuleticelo lebatitfola, leti739 526 tavunywa kwesikhashana, kutawuya ngekutsi bafundzi babhalisile yini kutikhungo lebatikhetsile letehlukahlukene.
tgt: "iningi labafakizicelo abangaphumelelanga bahlulekile ukuletha ubufakazi obenele obeseka izicelo zabo zoxhasomali; bangaphezulu kwezinga lezezimali elibekiwe; sebevele banazo iziqu zemfundo ezingeni eliphakeme lalezo unsfas azixhasayo kanye nokungalandeli izindlela zemithetho yezifundo emkhakheni wamakolishi angamatvet," kuchaza ungqongqoshe unzimande.

src: "linyenti lebafundzi lebafaka ticelo letingatange tiphumelele bahluleka kuletsa bufakazi lobanele lobusekela ticelo tabo tekutfola lusito; betingetulu kwalomkhawulo lobekiwe wekuvumeleka kutfola lolusito; nyalo labafundzi sevele baphumelele kutfola lizinga lelisetulu leticu letikhokhelwa yinsfas futsi bebangahambisani nalendlela yetifundvo temkhakha wemakolishi etvet," kuchaza indvuna nzimande.
tgt: ngokolwazi olutholakala kwiwebhusayithi yensfas, kusukela ngonyaka wokufunda wezi2021, unsfas akasahli nzeki ngoxhasomali ezi fundweni zasemva kweziqu zokuqala.

src: ngekuya kwelwatiso lolukuwebhusayithi yensfas, kusuka kumnyaka wekufundza we2021, insfas ayisaniketi lusito lwetimali yetifundvo letentiwa emva kwekutfola ticu takho tekucala.
tgt: lokhu kufaka phakathi izitifiketi zangemva kweziqu, amapostgraduate diplomas, iziqu zehonours, iziqu zemasters kanye neziqu zephd.

src: loku kufaka ekhatsi titifiketi letentiwa emuva kwekutfola ticu tekucala, emadiploma lentiwa emuva kwekutfola ticu tekucala, ticu tehonours, temasters netephd.
tgt: lokhu kuchaza ukuthi izifundo eziphezulu isikhwama esizixhasayo iziqu zebachelor’s degree.

src: loku kuchaza kutsi ticu letisetulu letitfola sibonelelo kulesikimu yibachelor’s degree.
tgt: ukwenza ngcono uhlelo lokufaka iziceloemkhankasweni wokwenza ngcono indlela nenqubo yokufaka izicelo ezokwenza kube lula kubafakizicelo, ungqongqoshe unzimande uthi kulo nyaka, unsfas uqalise izichibiyelo kuhlelokusebenza ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukufaka isicelo akunazihibe.

src: kutfutfukisa luhlelo lwekufaka ticelokumitamo yekutfutfukisa loluhlelo lwayo kanye netinchubo tekwenta kube malula kulabo labanesifiso sekufaka ticelo, indvuna nzimande utsi kulomnyaka, insfas isebentise tindlela tekutfutfukisa loluhlelo kute kucinisekiswe kutsi konkhe kuhamba ngendlela lefanele.
tgt: uthi uhlelo lwensfas lokufaka izicelo ngobuchwepheshe neinthanethi lwaklanywa kabusha ukuze luzosebenziseka kalula futhi lusondele ekufuzeni ezinye izinkundla abafakizicelo abazijwayele ezifana newhatsapp, itwitter, ifacebook neinstagram.

src: utsi lephothali yeinthanethi yekufaka ticelo idizayinwe kabusha kute ikhone kusebentiseka malula futsi ifinyelele nakuletinye tinkhundla labatitayele labo labafuna kufaka ticelo letifana nabowhatsapp, itwitter, ifacebook neinstagram.
tgt: "inqubo yokufaka isicelo yona qobo yenziwe yaba lula futhi nemibuzo ebuzwayo ilula kakhulu ukuthi abantu bayiqonde.

src: "loluhlelo lwekufaka ticelo kwalona lwentiwe kutsi lube malula futsi imibuto lebutwako bantfu bayayivisisa.
tgt: okunye futhi, abafakizicelo bangama phakathi nayo inqubo babuye baqhubeke ngesinye isikhathi ngaphandle kokuqala phansi futhi, okuyi nto ebingenzeki ezikhathini ezedlule, ubeke kanjalo.

src: lokunye lokwengetiwe, labafaka ticelo bangalumisa kwesikhashana loluhlelo bese bayachubeka emva kwesikhatsi ngaphandle kwekucala phasi, lekuyintfo beyingenteki kulemijikeleto leyengcile, usho njalo.
tgt: "ngaphezu kwezichibiyelo, unsfas usungule izinkundla ezengeziwe ezizosiza abafakizicelo abanemvelaphi eyahlukahlukene, kanye nokukhumbula ukuthi iningi labafakizicelo yintsha ethanda ukwenza izinto ngobuchwepheshe bedijithali," kwengeza ungqongqoshe unzimande.

src: "ngetulu kwaloku kutfutfukiswa, insfas isungule lamanye emashaneli ekufaka ticelo kute abukane nebafaki ticelo labaphuma kutimondzawo letehlukahlukene, ibe futsi ikhumbula kutsi linyenti lalabo lebafaka ticelo libantfu labasha labayisekelako lendlela ledijithali yekwenta tintfo," kungeta indvuna nzimande.
tgt: izinkundla ezintsha zibanda kanya imobile app, iussd kanye newhatsapp, lapho ungafaka isicelo soxhasomali lwensfas, uphinde ulandelele isimo sesicelo sakho kanye nokuhoxisa izicelo ebesezifakiwe phakathi kwezinye izinto.

src: lebekuvamise kwentiwa ngekusebentisa iphothali yewebhusayithi.
tgt: lokhu bekwenzeka ngokwendlule kwinkundla yewebhusayithi.

src: lokunye lokwengetiwe, kucinisekisa kutsi kute lovalelwa ngaphandle, indvuna nzimande utsi insfas itawucala umkhankhaso wekuya ebantfwini, kucinisekisa kutsi bantfu labangakhoni kufinyelela kuletinsita tebucwepheshe tekufaka ticelo ngeinthanethi nabo banikwa tinsita letimcoka nekwesekelwa lebakudzingako kute bakhone kufaka ticelo.
tgt: okunye futhi, ukuqinise kisa ukuthi akekho umfaki sicelo oshiyeka ngemuva, ungqongqoshe unzimande uthi unsfas uzoqalisa umkhankaso wokufinyelela ebantwini, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abangakwazi ukufinyelela kwizinsiza zobuchwepheshe abazozisebe nzisa ukufaka izicelo ngohlelo lweinthanethi nabo bayanikwa izinsiza nokwesekwa okufanele ukuze bezofaka izicelo zabo.

src: ufinyelela njani ku mfundzate wensfas uyafaneleka kutsi utfole umfundzate wensfas uma usakhamuti saseningizimu afrika lesifisa kufundza kumnyaka we2023 noma uma ngabe uvele sewufundza eyunivesithi yahulumende noma ekolishi letvet futsi ube uhambisana naletidzingo letilandzelako: ungumuntfu lotfola sondlo sesassa.
tgt: ungawuthola kanjani umfundaze wa kwansfas ufanelekile ukuthola umfunda ze wakwansfas uma uyisa khamuzi saseningizimu afrika esihlele ukufunda ngonyaka wezi2023 noma esesivele sifunda enyuvesi kahulumeni noma ekolishi eliyitvet futhi uhlangabezana nalezi zidingo ezilandelayo: uthola isibonelelo sakwasassa.

src: umholo wonkhe sewuhlangene wemndeni ungabi ngetulu kwer350 000 ngemnyaka.
tgt: umholo wekhaya usuhlangene awudluli izir350 000 ngonyaka.

src: uma ungumuntfu lokhubatekile, umholo wonkhe wemndeni sewuhlangene akufanele ube ngetulu kwer600 000 ngemnyaka.
tgt: uma ungumuntu ophila nokukhubazeka, umholo wekhaya usuhlangene akufanele ube ngaphezu kwezir600 000 ngonyaka.

src: imisebenti netindlela tekutiphilisa letigidzi, futsi sisachubeka vukuzenzele unnamed esikhatsini lesingapha nsi kweminyaka lemibili leyengci le, sasungula sikhutsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti kute sivule ematfuba emsebenti nekusekela tindlela tekuphila njengencenye yekusekela kuvuselelwa kwemnotfo ngemuva kwalesikhatsi salo bhubhane wecovid19.
tgt: isigidi samathuba omsebenzi nezindlela zokuziphilisa, sisaqhuba vukuzenzele unnamed eminyakeni engapha nsi kwemibili eyadlu la, sethula uhlelo lukamongameli lokusu ngula amathuba emise benzi ukuze kuzokwakhiwa amathuba emisebenzi futhi kwesekwe nezindlela zo kuziphilisa njengengxenye yokweseka ukuvuswa komnotho okudalwe ngu bhubhane lwecovid19.

src: lesikhutsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti sifinyelele kuncophamlandvo yebantfu labasigidzi lababe yincenye kusukela sasungulwa.
tgt: uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungulwa kwamathuba emisebenzi selufinyelele kwi ngqophamlando yababambi qhaza abayisigidi esisodwa selokhu lwaqala.

src: lemphumelelo ibangwe mitamo lehlangene yawo wonkhe hulumende newawo wonkhe ummango, lefaka ekhatsi umkhakha lotimele, tinhlangano temmango kanye naletinye tinhlangano.
tgt: le mpumelelo ingumphu mela wokusebenzisana phakathi kukahulumeni nomphakathi ngobubanzi, kubandakanya umkhakha ozimele, izinhlangano zo mphakathi nabanye abaningi.

src: loluhlelo lugcugcutele kwakhiwa kwematfuba emsebenti ngalesikhatsi umnotfo usatsatsa sikhatsi kuvuseleleka nekwakha ema tfuba emsebenti ngelizinga lesilifunako.
tgt: lolu hlelo lunegalelo ekusungulweni kwemisebenzi lapho umnotho uthatha isikhathi ukuvuka kanye nokwakha imisebenzi esezi ngeni esilidingayo.

src: njengoba siphikelela ngekukhulisa umnotfo kute isiletsele imisebenti leletsa si tfunti nalesimeme ngelizinga lelikhulu, sitawuchubeka kwakha kulemphumelelo yalesikhutsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti futsi sisisabalalise sifike kuyo yonkhe indzawo.
tgt: njengoba siphokophelele ekukhuliseni umnotho ukuze sizoletha imisebenzi esezi ngeni nesimeme ngobuningi bawo, sizoqhubeka nokwakhela phezu kwempumelelo yohlelo lukamengameli lokusungula amathuba emisebenzi ukuze lusabalale.

src: namanje kusadzingeka kakhulu kutsi siphelelise kuvuselela timakethe temisebenti.
tgt: luyadingeka kakhulu ukulekelela ukuvuswa kwemakethe yemisebenzi.

src: lesikhutsati futsi sisekela kuvuselelwa kwe mnotfo ngetindlela letimcoka.
tgt: luphinde lweseke ukuvuswa komnotho ngezindlela ezibalulekile.

src: esimeni lapho khona kungabi nesipiliyoni sekwenta umsebenti kulihibe lelikhulu lelenta ungatfoli umsebenti, letinhlelo leti tiniketa sipiliyoni lesisezingeni lelisetulu.
tgt: odabeni lapho ukunga bikho kwesipiliyoni somse benzi kungumgoqo ekutho leni umsebenzi, lezi zinhlelo zihlinzeka ngesipiliyoni so msebenzi osemgangathweni.

src: etinhlelweni letinkhulu kakhulu letisekelwe ngalesikhutsati, sibonelo, bantfu labasha labacishe babe ti 600 000 bafakwa etikolweni baba basiti babothishela etikolweni letingetulu kwaleti22 000 letikuyo yonkhe indzawo yelive lakitsi.
tgt: ohlelweni olukhulukazi olwesekwe yilolu hlelo lukamongameli, isibonelo, cishe izi600 000 zabantu abasha baqashwa njengabasizi bothisha ezikoleni kwizikole ezingaphezu kwezi22 000 kuzozonke izingxenye zaleli lizwe.

src: baphatsi betikolo, bothishela nalabanye balingani bonkhe bavumelana kutsi leligalelo lalabasiti babothishela lente kutsi sibe ncono simo sekufundza etikolweni.
tgt: abaphathi besikole, othisha kanye nabanye ababambiqhaza bonke bavumile ukuthi igalelo labasizi bothisha lenze ngcono isimondawo sokufunda ezikoleni.

src: bantfu labanengi labatisebentako baphatamiseka kundlela yabo yekuphila ngenca yalobhubhane.
tgt: abantu abaningi abaziqashe ngokwabo bathola izindlela zabo zokuziphilisa ziphazanyiswa ngubhubhane.

src: umkhakha wetebuciko wona watsintseka kakhulu kunaleminye.
tgt: umkhakha wezamaciko wathinteka kabi kakhulu.

src: kulomkhakha, bantfu basekelwa kute bativulele ematfuba emsebenti nekutsi bavulele labanye.
tgt: kulo mkhakha, usizo lwahli nzekwa kubantu ukuze bezo zisungulela imisebenzi bona kanye nabanye.

src: temafilimu, temculo kanye netemidlalo yaseshashalatini leyakhicitwa nyalo seyiyakhona kwenta imali ngekutsengisa emathikithi nangetinkhokhelo tekusebentisa imisebenti yabo.
tgt: amafilimu, umculo kanye nemidlalo edidiyelwe manje isiyakwazi ukwenza enye imali ngokuthengiswa kwamalungelo obunikazi, amathikithi kanye nezinkokhelo.

src: konkhe loku bekufaka ligalelo ekukhuliseni lomkha kha.
tgt: konke lokhu kube negalelo ekukhuleni kwalo mkhakha.

src: lesikhutsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti siphindze sasekela kusimamisa tindlela tekuphila.
tgt: uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungula amathuba emisebenzi luphinde lweseka ukusimamisa izindlela zokuziphilisa.

src: balimi labasafufusa labangetulu kwe140 000 batfola emavawusha ekubasita kutsi bacale kukhicita nekutsi bakhulise imikhicito yabo emva kwekutsikametwa yicovid19.
tgt: abalimi abasafufusa abayizi140 000 bathola amavawusha emikhi qizo azobasiza ukuphinde baqale kanye nokukhulisa imikhiqizo yabo emva kokuphazamiseka ngenxa yecovid19.

src: lomunye walabo labazuza kuloku nguphindile ngcoya loneminyaka le36 waserichmond kwazulunatali.
tgt: omunye wala balimi nguphindile ngcoya oneminyaka engama36 waserichmond kwazulunatali.

src: ungulomunye wemalunga enhlangano yemndeni yekulima futsi utsi levawusha layitfolile incedzile kutsi lenhlangano lensha ikhone kusindza ingafi nekutsi ikhone kwenta inzuzo.
tgt: ungeli nye lamalunga ayishumi enhlangano yabalimi yo mndeni futhi uthi ivawusha ayithola yayisiza kakhulu le nhlangano entsha ukubhe kana nesimo nokuthi yenze inzuzo.

src: lesikhutsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti siphindze futsi sisekele labo labaneticu, lapho khona ematfuba avulekela bonesi, labaneticu tesayensi, bongoti bemakhono kanye nalabanye.
tgt: uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungula amathuba emisebenzi luphinde lweseke labo abaqeda kuthola iziqu, ngamathuba ahlinze kelwe abahlengikazi, abaneziqu zesayensi, izi ngcweti zamakhono nabanye.

src: emayunivesithi lamashumi lamabili nesitfupha ayasita ngekufaka bantfu labaneticu labangakacashwa emisebe ntini lehambisana neticu tabo.
tgt: amanyuvesi angamashumi amabili nesithupha ayasiza ukubeka labo abaneziqu abangasebenzi emisebenzini ehambisana neziqu zabo.

src: litiko letesayensi neletemisebenti yekuticambela letfule tinhlelo tesayensi letinengi kutakhamuti temisebenti yekuticambela, letifana neduzi umngeni conservation trust, lecasha lusha lwendza wo lube tingcwetfu tekonga simondzawo emaenvirochamps kute lucwashise imimango kutsi ivuselele imitfombo yemanti yendzawo yangakubo.
tgt: umnyango wezesayensi nokuqamba kabusha sewuthule uchungechunge lwezinhlelo zesayensi zokuqamba kabusha zezakhamuzi, ezifana neduzi umngeni conservation trust, oluqashe intsha yendawo njengamanxusa ezemvelo amaenvirochamps ukusiza imiphakathi ukuhlanza imithombo yamanzi yendawo.

src: lolunye luhlelo lwalelitiko lusita bosomabhizinisi kutsi bente tiphakamiso temabhazinisi letimayelana nemnotfo lovikela simondza wo.
tgt: olunye uhlelo olwenziwa ngumnyango lusiza osomabhizinisi ukwenza iziphakamiso zamabhizinisi emnothweni ongangcolisi imvelo.

src: tinhlelo temmango tekucasha nato tibe nemtselela ngco emimangweni ngoba takha ematfuba emsebenti lazuzisa wonkhe umuntfu.
tgt: izinhlelo zemisebenzi yomphakathi nazo zibe negalelo elihle emiphakathini ngoba zisungule umsebenzi owenza kahle.

src: kulesikhu tsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti, loku kufaka kutfutfukisa kufundza etikolweni, kutfutfukisa ti ndzawo tekuhlala letimikhu khu, kusekela labo labasindze kuludlame lolumayelana netebulili, labo labavikela indalo nalabo labeta netindle la letisha tekuvuselela kabu sha imfucuta.
tgt: odabeni lohlelo lukamongameli lokusungula amathuba emisebenzi, lokhu kubanda kanye ukwenza ngcono ukufunda ezikoleni, ukuthu thukiswa kwezindawo zemijondolo, ukweseka labo abasinde kudlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile, ukulondolozwa kwemvelo kanye nokuqamba kabusha ekugayweni kabusha kwe mfucuza.

src: lesikhutsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti satfulwa ngoba kufuneka siphendvule kulenhlekelele yekuswelakala kwemisebenti leyabhebhe tseliswa ngulobhubhane wecovid19.
tgt: uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungulwa kwemisebenzi lwethulwa ngenhloso yokubhekana nenkinga yokuswelakala kwemisebenzi okwaba nzima kakhulu ngenxa yobhubhane lwecovid19.

src: nanoma lobhubhane angahle abe ancishisiwe, kuswelakala kwematfuba emsebenti kona akukanciphi.
tgt: noma ubhubhane selwehlile, ukuswelakala kwemisebenzi akwehlile.

src: imiholo leholwe kuletinhlelo tesikhutsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti itfutfukise umnotfo kubosomabhizinisi labancane nakuminotfo yendzawo kulo lonkhe live lakitsi.
tgt: imali etholwe ngohlelo lukamongameli lokusungula imisebenzi iwuthuthukisile umnotho emabhizinisini amancane nakumabhizinisi angahlelekile eminothweni yalapha kulolonke izwe.

src: balekeleli babothishela labacashwe emgungundlovu basebentisa imali yabo emgungundlovu.
tgt: abasizi bothisha abaqashwe emgungundlovu basebenzi sa imali yabo yomholo emgungundlovu.

src: kwenteka kanjalo naseputso nderwater.
tgt: kanjalo naseputsonderwater.

src: kunekutsi kube nemtselela "wekucala etulu wehlele phasi", imali ifakwe ngco etandleni temimango lapho idzingeka khona kakhulu.
tgt: esikhundleni sokuthi ‘yehle’, imali iya ngqo eza ndleni zemiphakathi eyidinga kakhulu.

src: leyo mali ibese iyatungeleta kuleyo ndzawo yabese "ikhuphukela enhla" iya kumnotfo lobanti.
tgt: leyo mali iyazungeleza endaweni bese ‘inyuka’ isabalale nomnotho.

src: kungako loku sikubita ngekutsi sikhutsati, ngoba tonkhe tinhlaka temnotfo tiyazuza kanye nemmango.
tgt: yingakho siyibiza ngokuthi isikhuthazo, ngenxa yokuthi umnotho wonkana uyazuza kanjalo nomphakathi.

src: ngalesikhutsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti, sikhonile kuvula ematfuba etemandla, ekutibophelela, ebuciko, ekuticambela nalamanye ematfuba.
tgt: ngohlelo lukamongameli lokusungula amathuba emisebenzi, sivuse umdlandla, ukuzinikela, ubuhlakani, ukuqamba kabusha kanye namathuba.

src: ngaleyonchubo, sakha ummango losebentako.
tgt: sisaqhubeka, sakha umphakathi osebenza yo.

src: bantfu labangetulu kwesigidzi bazuze ngco.
tgt: bangaphezu kwesigidi esisodwa abantu abazuze ngqo.

src: labanye labanengi, emindenini nasemimangweni yalabo labayincenye yaloku, bayivile imitselela yalesikhutsati.
tgt: abanye abantu abaningi, emindenini nasemiphakathini yababambiqhaza, bawuzwile umthelela walesi sikhuthazi.

src: umsebenti wetfu nyalo ku khulisa nekujulisa umtselela walomsebenti.
tgt: umsebenzi wethu manje ukukhulisa nokujulisa umthelela walo msebenzi.

src: ngenca yalesikhutsati samengameli sekwakha ematfuba emsebenti, nyalo sesinebantfu labamakhulu etinkhulungwane labanesipiliyoni lesimcoka sekwenta umsebenti.
tgt: ngomphumela wohlelo lukamongameli lokusungula amathuba emisebenzi, manje sesinamakhulu ezinkulu ngwane zabantu abanesipili yoni somsebenzi esidinge kayo.

src: linyenti lalabantfu laba litfolakala kalula ngekusebentisa inkhundla isayouth.
tgt: iningi lalaba bantu kulula ukubathola enkundle ni isayouth.

src: kutfutfukiswa kwebantfwana kusikhiya lesivula likusasa letfu vukuzenzele unnamed imbalwa kakhulu imisebenti yelihhovi si lamengameli le yenelisanako kwendlula kucitsa sikhatsi saseku seni usemkhatsini kwe bantfwana labancane.
tgt: izikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwabantwana zingukhiye wekusasa lethu vukuzenzele unnamed zimbalwa izinto ezibalulekile ezihlaba umxhwe le ukwedlula ukuchi tha isikhathi sasekuseni nabantwana abancane.

src: madvute nje bengiha mbele umcimbi wekuvu lwa kwesikhungo seku tfutfukiswa kwebantfwa na (iecd) ilittle flower ebizana empumalanga kapa, lapho ngicitse khona sikhatsi nalabanye baholi besikhatsi lesitako belive lakitsi, ngibafundzela futsi ngibalalela.
tgt: kamuvanje ngihambele ukuvulwa kwesikhu ngo sokuthuthukiswa kwabantwana (iecd) ilittle flower ebizana empumalanga kapa, lapho ngithole isikhathi sokuhlala nabaholi bakusasa bezwe lethu, ngibafundela futhi ngibalalele.

src: lesikhungo sisandza kwa khiwa yinhlangano yekutfu tfukisa iimpande south africa ngekwesekelwa yinelson mandela foundation.
tgt: isikhungo lesi sakhiwa inhlangano yezokuthuthukisa ebizwa ngeimpande south africa ngokwesekwa yinelson mandela fou ndation.

src: ngatsintseka kakhulu nge kutibophelela kwebasebenti balesikhungo ngekutsi base kele ummango nebantfwana bawo.
tgt: ngahlabeka umxhwele ngokuzinikela kwabasebenzi balesi sikhungo ekwesekeni umphakathi nabantwana.

src: bangitjele ngebu matima labahlangabetana nabo uma sisacalwa lesi khungo, bebanebumatima bekukhokhela basebenti kodvwa bebachubeka beta emsebentini.
tgt: bangi tshele ukuthi ezikhathini zokuqalwa kwesikhungo, abasebenzi kwakunzima ukuthi bakhokhelwe kodwa nomakunjalo babelokhu beza emsebenzini.

src: bangitjele futsi kutsi nanoma imindeni beyihluleka kukhokha ti ndleko temntfwana letir20 umntfwana ngamunye, labo bantfwana bebangajikiswa babuyiselwe emuva ekhaya.
tgt: baphinde bangi tshela ukuthi noma ngabe imindeni ayikwazi ukukhokhela umntwana amar20, abantwana abajikiswa.

src: kutibophelela kwebase benti balesikhungo seecd kumcoka ngoba tikhungo tekutfutfukiswa kweba ntfwana tidlala inzima le nkhulu ekutfutfukiseni sive sakitsi.
tgt: ukuzinikela kwabasebenzi besikhungo seecd kubalulekile ngoba izi khungo zokuthuthukiswa kwabantwana zidlala indima ebalulekile eku thuthukisweni kwesizwe sakithi.

src: letikhungo tinga tfolakala kunoma ngisiphi sigodzi, lidolobha nelidolo bhakati lelikulelive.
tgt: lezi zikhungo ziyatholakala kuzo zonke izigodi, amadolobha kanye namadolobhakazi ezweni lonke.

src: tikhungo letinengi tacalwa bomake bemmango kute basite batali lebadzinga kutsi bantfwana babo banakekelwe nga lesikhatsi basesemsebentini.
tgt: eziningi zaqalwa ngabesifazane emiphakathini ukusiza abazali abadinga ukuthi aba ntwana babo banakekeleke ngesikhathi bona bese msebenzini.

src: linengi laletikhungo tacalwa tisebenta njengetinkhulisa nanjengetikhungo tekushiya bantfwana.
tgt: iningi lalezi zikhungo zaqala njengezi nkulisa kanye nezikhungo zokunakekela abantwana emini.

src: letinengi setikhulile tatfutfuka kute tikhone kufaka ikharikhulamu yemfundzo lesisekelo kumisebenti yato.
tgt: eziningi kamuvanje sezikhulile futhi zenyuka zafaka nezifundo zokuqala emsebenzini yazo.

src: njengahulumende, sitse tse sinyatselo sekutfutfu kisa emazinga ekunakekela nekwenta kutsi tinsita titfo lakale kutikhungo teecd kute titakhona kwenta imi sebenti lefanele kubantfwana labancane kute balungele kufundza lokuhlelekile.
tgt: njengohulumeni, sesibeke emahlombe ethu umsebenzi wokwenza ngcono izinga lokunakekela nokuqinisekisa ukuthi izinsizakusebenza zikhona ezikhungweni zeecd ukuze zizoqhuba imisebenzi efanele yabantwana abancane ukubalungiselela imfundo efanele.

src: ngamabasa 2022, siwupho tfulile umsebenti weku susa umsebenti weecd kulitiko letekutfutfukiswa kwemmango uye kulitiko lemfundvo lesisekelo.
tgt: ngomba sa wezi2022, saphothula ukususwa komsebenzi weecd ngaphansi ko mnyango wokuthuthu kiswa komphakathi waya nga phansi komnyango weze mfundo eyisisekelo.

src: loku kwentelwa kutsi kuchunya niswe kutfutfukiswa kwe mntfwana kute kube yince nye yekharikhulamu yemfu ndvo lehlelekile neku nika kucecesha, imfundvo nekutfutfukisa basebenti labasetikhungwini teecd letiseveni lonkhe.
tgt: lokhu kwenziwa ukuze kuzo xhunywa ukuthuthukiswa komntwana ezifundweni zesikole ezihlelekile kanye nokuqeqesha, ukufundisa kanye nokuthuthukisa abasebenzi ezikhungweni zeecd kulolonke ilizwe.

src: ngenca yekutsi loku fundza lokusisekelo loku kumcoka emphumelelweni yemntfwana eminyakeni letako, umtsetfosivivinywa wekuchibiyela imitsetfo yetemfundvo lesisekelo lenyalo isephalamende ihlo ngota kutsi kuphoceleke kutsi bonkhe bantfwana batfole imfundvo yeecd yeminyaka lemibili ngembi kwekucala libanga lekucala.
tgt: ngenxa yokuthi le mfu ndo eyisisekelo ingukhiye wempumelelo yomntwa na eminyakeni ezayo, umthethosivivinywa wokuchibiyela imithetho yemfundo eyisisekelo okuyimanje usezithebeni zephalamende uhlongoza ukuthi kube yimpoqo ukuthi bonke abantwana bathole iminyaka emibili yeecd ngaphambi kokuthi bayongena kwibanga loku1.

src: lesi ngiso sigaba lapho khona kufuneka bafundziswe ba ntfwana, bafundze babe badlala nekutsi lokungenani batfole sinye sidlo selusuku.
tgt: kukulesi sigaba lapho abantwana kufanele bafundiswe, bafunde ngokudlala futhi bathole okungenani isidlo esisodwa ngosuku.

src: tikhungo tekutfutfukiswa kwebantfwana atilungiseleli kuphela kutsi bantfwana belive lakitsi labancane kutsi baphumelele esikolweni; tiphindze tibe ngumtfombo lomcoka wetemabhizinisi newekuvula ematfuba emisebenti.
tgt: izikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwabantwana azilungiseleli izakhamuzi zezwe lakithi ezincane ukuthi ziphumelele esikoleni kuphela; kodwa zingumthombo obalulekile wokuvulwa kwamabhizinisi nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi.

src: letikhungo tiyi ncenye lebalulekile yemnotfo wekunakekela.
tgt: lezi zikhungo ziyingxenye ebalulekile yomnotho wezokunakekela.

src: tisimamisa tindlela tekutiphilisa, ka khulu kubomake, lekuyindle la leyengeta ekwakheni ema tfuba emsebenti emima ngweni leminengi.
tgt: zisimamisa izindlela zokuziphilisa, ikakhulu kazi kwabesifazane, lokho okufaka igalelo ekusu ngulweni kwemisebenzi emiphakathini eminingi.

src: ngalesikhatsi sihlaselwa ngulobhubhane wecovi d19, tikhungo teecd tasha yeka kakhulu.
tgt: ngesikhathi ubhubhane lwecovid19 lugadla, izikhungo zeecd zasha yeka kakhulu.

src: tikhungo leti ncike kutindleko tekufundza kute tikhone kuhlala tisebenta betingakhoni kukhokhela basebenti bato futsi batali labanengi labalahlekelwa misebenti yabo bebanga khoni kugcina bantfwana babo bafundza kuletikhungo.
tgt: izikhungo ezithembele emalini yesikole ukuthi ziqhubeke zisebenze azikwazanga ukukhokhela abasebenzi bazo futhi abazali abaningi abalahlekelwa imisebenzi abakwazanga ukugcina abantwana babo befunda.

src: ngenca yaloko, hulumende wasungula sikhwama se ecd sesikhutsati sekuca shwa kwebantfu kute since dze tikhungo teecd leta lahlekelwa imali ngenca yalobhubhane nekutenta kutsi tikhone kuphindze tisebente.
tgt: ukuphendula kulokhu, uhulumeni usungule isi khwana seecd esikhu thaza ukusungulwa kwemisebenzi ukusiza izikhungo zeecd ezalahlekelwa imalingena ngenxa yobhubhane nokuzisiza ukuthi zivuke futhi.

src: kulungisa takhamuti takitsi letincane ngekutinika ema thulusi letiwadzingako kute tiphumelele emphilweni kungumsebenti lekufuneka siwutfwale sisonkhe.
tgt: ukulungiselela izakha muzi zethu ezincane ngamakhono abazowadinga ukuze baphumelele empilweni kungumsebenzi okumele sonke siwuthwale emahlombe ethu ngokubambisana.

src: kufu neka sichubeke kwenta konkhe lokusemandleni etfu, njengahulumende, simkhakha lotimele futsi si tinhlangano tekutfutfukisa, kusekela kutfutfukiswa kwe bantfwana.
tgt: kumele siqhubeke senze konke okusemandleni, njengohulumeni, umkhakha ozimele kanye nezinhlangano ezithuthukisayo, ukweseka ukuthuthukiswa kwaba ntwana.

src: ngalemisebenti yayo le mcoka leyiphakelako, noma kungaba kufundzisa ba ntfwana bakitsi, kuba nakekela kulabo batali labasebentako, noma kuvula ematfuba etemabhizinisi, iecd ifaka ligalelo lelikhulu ekuphumeleliseni letinhloso tetfu temigomo yentfutfuko.
tgt: ngezinsizakalo eziningi ezihlinzekwayo, kungaba ukufundisa abantwana bethu, ukuhlinzeka ngokunakekelwa kwaba ntwana ngesikhathi abazali besemsebenzini noma ukusungulela osomabhizinisi amathuba, iecd inegalelo elikhulu ekuphumeleliseni kwamaphupho ethu amaningi okuthuthukisa.

src: indlela yekonga emanti more matshediso kuphakela emanti ngalokutsembe kile ngibomasipala kute afike kuyo yonkhe imindeni eningizimu afrika kuku68% kuphela, nanoma kunemitamo leyentiwe litiko letemanti netekutfutfwa kwendle kucedza kusalela emuva ekuphakeleni emanti kuleminyaka leyengcile.
tgt: singawonga kanjani amanzi more matshediso ukuthunye lwa kwamanzi ngokwethembeka ngomasipala emakhaya kulolonke leli lizwe kume kuma68% kuphela, naphezu kwamagxathu athathwa umnyango wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle okuqeda nya ukusilela emuva kokuthunyelwa kwamanzi kule minyaka.

src: lisekela lendvuna yetemanti netekutfutfwa kwendle david mahlobo utsi loku kubangwa ngilesakhiwonchanti lesesigugile, kungasebenti kahle nekunganakekelwa kwemitfombo yemanti, kanye nekungahlangani kahle emkhatsini kwetinhlelo tetetindlu kanye nekwemiklamo yamanje yekutfutfukisa sakhiwonchanti.
tgt: oliphini likangqongqoshe wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle udavid mahlobo uthi lokhu kudalwa ingqalasizinda esindala, ukungasetshenziswa kanye nokunganakekelwa kwemithombo yamanzi, kanye nokungasebenzisani phakathi kwezinhlelo zokwakhiwa kwezindlu kanye nemiklamo yamanje yokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda.

src: "kuyintfo lekhatsatako kutsi kuphakelwa kwemanti ngalokutsembekile kukhombisa timphawu tekuncipha," usho njalo.
tgt: "kuyakhathaza kakhulu ukuthi ukuhlinzekwa kwamanzi ngokwethe mbeka kubonisa izimpawu zokwehla," kusho yena.

src: njengelive lelingenawo emanti, iningizimu afrika ihlelenjiswe yaba kundzawo ye30 yemave langenamanti emhlabeni wonkhe.
tgt: njengezwe elinamanzi ayingcosana, iningizimu afrika ibalwa phakathi kwamazwe angama30 ome kakhulu emhlabeni.

src: emanti lamanyenti alelive atfolakala nakuna litulu, kodvwa ngenca yalelinani lelatiwako lemvula lelinciphe nge40% kunaleyo leyisilinganiso semnyaka yemhlaba, lelive livamise kuhlala lihlaselwa somiso.
tgt: amanzi amaningi ezwe aqhamuka emvuleni, kodwa ngesilinganiso semvula esingama40% esingaphansi kwesilinganiso sonyaka somhlaba, leli lizwe lihlale lihlaselwa isomiso.

src: nanoma kunjalo, litiko linetindlela letiticwayiso letibekelwe wena tekonga emanti.
tgt: noma kunjalo, umnyango ukuphathele amasu okonga amanzi.

src: tindlela tekonga emanti ekhaya noma ebhizinisini lakho vala imphompi uma ugeza buso, uchubha ematinyo noma ushefa.
tgt: ukonga amanzi ekhaya noma ebhizinisini lakho vala umpompi uma usageza ubuso, uxubha amazinyo akho noma usashefa.

src: kusebentisa ishawa sikhatsi lesimizuzu lesihlanu ngelusuku kunekutsi ugeze ebhavini, konga emanti langafika kumalitha la400 ngeliviki.
tgt: ukugeza ngeshawa imizuzu emihlanu ngosuku kunokugeza ngebhavu kuzosebenzisa ingxenye elingasinelwa kokuthathu yamanzi asetshenziswa kwibhavu, lokho okonga amalitha angama400 ngeviki.

src: kugeza eshawa kungatsatsa emalitha emanti langafika ku20 ngemzuzu, kantsi kugeza ebhavini kungatsatsa emanti lasemkhatsini kwemalitha la80 kuya kula150 ngaleso sikhatsi kuphela.
tgt: ukugeza ngeshawa kungasebenzisa amalitha afika kuma20 amanzi ngomzuzu, kanti ukugeza ngebhavu kungasebenzisa phakathi kwamalitha amanzi angama80 kuya kwayi150 ngokugeza ngakunye.

src: uma ukhetsa kugeza ebhavini, ungaligcwalisi.
tgt: uma ukhetha ukusebenzisa ibhavu, ungaligcwalisi ngamanzi.

src: gwema kuflasha emanti emthoyi kungenasidzingo.
tgt: gwema ukushaya indlu yangasese kungenasidingo.

src: lahla emathishu, tinambutane naletinye tintfo longasatidzingi etibini kunekutsi utilahlele emthoyi.
tgt: lahla ithishu, izinambuzane nokunye ukungcola emgqonyeni kunasendlini yangasese.

src: ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi uma uflasha umthoyi, usebentisa emanti lamalitha la12.
tgt: ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ushaya indlu ya ngasese, usebenzisa ama litha ayi12 amanzi.

src: lungisa umthoyi lovutako uma ungenti njalo utawumosha emalitha emanti langafika ku100 000 ngemnyaka.
tgt: lungisa indlu yangasese evuzayo ngoba ingamosha amalitha amanzi ayizi100 000 ngonyaka owodwa.

src: sebentisa "emanti langcolile" — emanti lasasebentile lasele uma ugeza ebhavini, emishinini yekuwasha kanye nakuleminye imitfombo lephephile kuflasha umthoyi wakho.
tgt: sebenzisa "amanzi angcolile" — amanzi obekuge zwa ngawo, obekuhla nzwa ngawo izimpahla kanye namanye amanzi aphephile ukushaya indlu yakho yangasese.

src: ungayigcwalisi ngalokwecile noma ungayiwashi ngalokungenasidzingo indzawo yakho yekubhusha.
tgt: ungayigcwalisi mfi noma uhlanze ngokwedlulele indawo yakho yokubhukuda.

src: ungagcwalisi emanti emagedleleni kodvwa awanele kufeza tidzingo takho.
tgt: amaketela akumele agcwale mfi kodwa afakwe amanzi alingene lokho okudingayo.

src: loku futsi kutakongela nagezi.
tgt: lokhu kuphinde kunciphise nezindleko zikagesi.

src: sebentisa libhakede kunekutsi usebentise litfumbu lemanti kuhlanta imoto yakho.
tgt: sebenzisa ibhakede kunepayipi ukuwasha imoto yakho.

src: uma kufuneka usebentise litfumbu, sebentisa sipreyi lesingasebenta kuvala emanti ngesikhatsi uwasha imoto.
tgt: uma kufanele usebenzise ipayipi, sebe nzisa ipayipi elifafazayo elikwaziyo ukuthi libuye livaleke ngesikhathi ufafaza imoto.

src: kusebentisa litfumbu lasengadzini kungatsatsa emanti langafika kumalitha emanti la30 ngemzuzu.
tgt: ukusebe nzisa ipayipi lasengadini kungasebenzisa amanzi angamalitha angama30 ngomzuzu.

src: balimi kufuneka bacinisekise kutsi imitsi yekubulala tinambutane ayifinyeleli emitfonjeni yemanti nakumifudlana.
tgt: abalimi kufanele baqinisekise ukuthi azikho izinambuzane eziyingozi emithonjeni yamanzi nasemfudlaneni.

src: bantfu labahlala etindzaweni tasemakhaya akufuneki basebentise umfula noma ludvonga lemfula kutikhulula.
tgt: abantu abahlala ezi ndaweni zasemakhaya kufanele baqaphele ukuthi abasebenzisi umfula kanye nodonga ukuzi khulula.

src: engadzini hlala njalo unisela titjalo takho ekuseni kakhulu noma ntsambama, ngalesikhatsi emazinga ekushisa sehlile.
tgt: engadini chelela njalo izitshalo zakho ngezikhathi zasekuseni noma ntambama, uma amazinga okushisa esepholile.

src: sonkhe sikhatsi uma ubilisa licandza, wabeka kahle emanti uma sapholile unisele ngawo titjalo takho.
tgt: njalo uma ubilisa iqanda, gcina lawo manzi apholile ukuchelela ngawo izi tshalo zakho zasendlini.

src: iprep ingayivikela ihiv vukuzenzele unnamed njengobe ini ngizimu afrika itawube ikhu mbula lilanga lemhla ba lengculazi mhla lu1 ingongoni kanye nemalanga la16 ebushikashi ki bekulwa nebudlova lobucondziswe kubulili lobutsite (igbv), kusukela mhla tinge25 i mphala kuya ku mhla ti10 ingongoni, ivuk’uzenzele ibukisisa budlelwane lobukhona emkhatsini wegbv nehiv/aids.
tgt: iprep ingayivikela ihiv vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba ini ngizimu afrika izobe ikhu mbula usuku lomhlaba lwesifo sengculazi mhla lu1 kuzibandlela kanye nomkhankaso wezinsuku ezingama16 woku lwa nodlame o lubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile (igbv) kusuka mhla wama25 kulwezi kuya mhla we10 kuzibandlela, iphephandaba ivuk’uzenzele ibukisisa ubudlelwano obukhona phakathi kwegbv kanye nehiv/aids.

src: sikhwama lesibhekele bu dlova lobucondziswe kubulili lobutsite kanye nekubulawa kwebasikati (igbvf) si phokophele kucinisekisa kutsi iningizimu afrika ikhulule kile ayihlangabetani negbvf lecondziswe kubomake; bantfwana; besifazane labaya emacasini nebesifazane, labadvuna labaya emacasini nalabadvuna, bantfu laba bomphacambili, labantjintje bulili babo bemvelo, bantfu labanetitfo tebulili bobubili, bantfu lababukeka ngalokungakavami, labangafaki temacasi kanye nalabanye (ilgbtqia+).
tgt: isikhwama esibhekele udlame olubhekiswe kwabo bulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane (igbvf) sihlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iningizimu afrika iyaqeda nya ngegbvf ebhekiswe kwabesimame; abantwana; kanye nabesifazane abathandana nabanye besifazane (amales bian), abesilisa abathandana nabanye besilisa (amagay), abanobulili obushintshashintshayo (amabisexual), abashintshe ubulili (amatrans gender), abathandana nabantu ngokwahlukana (iintersex), abanobulili obungaqondakali (iqueer/questioning), abangakhethi ubulili babantu abathandana nabo kanye nabanye (ilgbtqia+).

src: lesikhwama setfulwa ngu mengameli cyril ramaphosa ngendlovana nga2021, kwesekela kuphunyeleliswa kweluhlelo lwavelonkhe lwelisubuciko legbvf.
tgt: isikhwama lesi sethulwa ngumongameli ucyril ramaphosa ngonhlolanja wezi2021, ukuze sizokweseka ukuqaliswa kwe qhingasu lohlelo lu kazwelonke lwegbvf.

src: ngekuya kwewebhusa yithi yalesikhwama, sidlala indzima lebaluleke kakhulu ekwenteni kutsi tingucuko tenteke, ngekuya kwelu cwaningo, kucaphelisa kanye nekwesekelwa lokubonakalako lokunikwa tinhlangano leti sebenta ngalokubonakalako ekulweni negbvf.
tgt: ngokwemininingwane ekuwebhusayithi yalesi sikhwama, sidlala indima ebaluleke kakhulu ekuletheni uguquko, olwesekwe phezu kocwaningo, ukuqwashisa kanye nosizo olubonakalayo ezinhlanganweni ezibambe iqhaza ekulweni negbvf.

src: lenye yaletinhlangano letesekelwa ngulesikhwama yigugu dlamini foundation ekwazulunatal, letfole r250 000 kusikhwama segbvf nga2022.
tgt: enye yezinhlangano esizwa yilesi sikhwama igugu dlamini foundation ezinze esifundazweni sakwazulunatali, ethole izir250 000 kwisikhwama segbvf ngo wezi2022.

src: umcondzisi lomkhulu wegugu dlamini foundation, mandisa mabaso, wasungula lenhlangano nga2010 nge muva kwekutsi make wakhe – longasekho emhlabeni gugu dlamini – wagcotjwa ngematje wate wafa nga1998 ethekwini ngenca yekutsi wadzalula kutsi unehiv .
tgt: umqondisi omkhulu wegugu dlamini foundation, umandisa mabaso, wasungula le nhlangano ngowezi2010 emva kokuthi umama wakhe – ongasekho ugugu dlamini – wakhandwa ngamatshe waze wafa ngowe1998 ethekwini ngenxa yokuthi wadalula isimo sakhe sokuba nehiv .

src: "lenhlangano ihlose kucinisa telulawulo lwendzawo kute kwentiwe ncono indlela yeku bukana negbvf, lokubaluleke kakhulu ekuzuzeni lulawulo lwelubhubhane lwehiv eningizimu afrika," kusho mabaso.
tgt: "inhlangano le ihlose ukuqinisa uhulumeni wasekhaya ukuthi abhekane kangcono negbvf, okuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu ekulawuleni umbula lazwe wehiv eningizimu afrika," kusho umabaso.

src: "lokunye futsi lehlose ku kwenta kunciphisa kwesuleleka ngehiv/aids, kukhulisa kufinyelela kutekunakekelwa nekwenta kancono imiphu mela yetemphilo yebesifazane nalabadvuna labasulelekile nalabatsintfwa yihiv/aids," kwasho yena engeta.
tgt: "ihlose futhi ukunciphisa ukusulelana ngehiv/aids, yandise ukufinyelela ekunakekeleleni nokwenza ngcono imiphumela yezempilo kubesifazane nabesilisa abasuleleke nabathintwe yihiv/aids," enezela.

src: lokwesekelwa ngetimali lokutfolwa ngulenhlangano kusita bomake nemantfombatana la522 255 kanye nemadvodza nebafana labange900 labavela emindenini letsintfwe yigbv kanye nebudlova basekhaya; bantfu labahlukunyetiwe labaphila nekukhubateka; kanye ne mmango welgbtqia+, kusho yena mabaso.
tgt: uxhasomali olutholwa yinhlangano lusiza abesimame namantombazane ayizi522 255 kanye namadoda nabafana abangama900 ababuya emindenini ethinteke kakhulu yigbv kanye nodlame lwasekhaya; abantu abahlukumeze kile abaphila nokukhubazeka; kanye namalunga omphakathi welgbtqia+, kusho uma baso.

src: ngekusho kweunaids, etindzaweni letinemtfwalo lomkhulu wehiv , bomake lababahlukunyetwa begbv bahlangabetana nematfuba lamakhulu langafika ku50% ekwesuleleka ngehiv .
tgt: ngokweunaids, ezi ndaweni ezihaqwe kakhulu ihiv , abesimame abayizisulu zegbv babhekana namathuba amaningi afinyelela kuma50% okuthola ihiv .

src: letinye tizatfu taloku kugagadlela kanye nekwala kwemadvodza kuya emacasini asebentisa lijazi lemkhwenyana.
tgt: ezinye zeziza thu zalokhu ngukudlwengulwa kanye nokungavumi kwa madoda ukusebenzisa ijazi lomkhwenyana.

src: yini iprep?
tgt: iyini iprep?

src: lenye yetindlela tekuvimba kwesuleleka ngehiv kunatsa ipreexposure prophylaxis (iprep), lokungemaphilisi lanatfwa onkhe emalanga bantfu labanehiv labasengotini lenkhulu yekwesuleleka ngehiv , ngekuya emacansini noma ngekusebentisa tidza kamiva lotijova ngato.
tgt: enye yezindlela zokuvikela ukusuleleka ngehiv ukuphuza ipreexposure prophylaxis (iprep), okungamaphilisi aphuzwa nsukuzonke ngabantu abangenalo igciwane lehiv abasengcupheni yokuthola ihiv , ngocansi noma ngokuzijova ngezidakamizwa.

src: ngengci, indvuna joe phaahla utsite iningizimu afrika inelizinga leliphakeme leprep eafrika leseningizimu yesahara.
tgt: ngoncwaba, ungqongqo she ujoe phaahla wathi iningizimu afrika ihamba phambili ekuphuzweni kweprep eafrika eseningizimu yesahara.

src: utsite tikhungo tetemphilo lesisekelo tase ningizimu afrika letinge70%, noma leti2 419, setifaka iprep lenatfwako kuluhlu lato le tinsita letinato.
tgt: wathi ama70%, noma izi2 419 zezikhungo zikahulumeni ezinakekela nge zempilo zaseningizimu afrika seziwafakile amaphilisi eprep ohlwini lazo lezinsizakalo.

src: "bantfu labanatsa iprep abadzingi kutsi bayinatse timphilo tabo tonkhe, banga khetsa kuyinatsa ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi uma basengotini yekwesuleleka ngehiv .
tgt: "umuntu ophuza iprep aku fanelanga ukuthi awuphuze impilo yakhe yonke, banga khetha ukuyiphuza njalo uma besengcupheni yokusuleleka ngehiv .

src: nanoma kunjalo, kute kutsi iprep isebente kahle kakhulu, ifanele kutsi inatfwe onkhe emalanga [ngalesikhatsi]," kucinisekisa mabaso.
tgt: kodwake, ukuze iprep izosebenza ngempumelelo, kufanele iphuzwe nsuku zonke [ngalesi sikhathi]," kugcizelela umabaso.

src: ifanele kutsi isetjentiswe kanye naletinye tindlela tekuvikela, njengemakhondomu ebesifazane noma alaba dvuna, ngoba iprep ayimvikeli umuntfu kuletinye tifo letitsatselwana emacansini kantsi futsi ayisiso sivikelantalo.
tgt: kufanele futhi isetshe nziswe kanye nezinye izindlela zokuzivikela, ezifana nejazi lowezifazane nejazi lomkhwe nyana, ngoba iprep ayimu vikeli umuntu kwezinye izifo ezithathelana ngocansi futhi ayivikeli ukukhulelwa.

src: mabaso utsi etimeni lapho khona titsandzani tifuna kuba nemntfwana, iprep ingasita kuvikela kutsi umlingani lote ihiv angasuleleki ngehiv kanye nembungu.
tgt: umabaso uthi ezikhathini lapho izithandani zifuna ukuba nomntwana, iprep ingasiza ukuvikela ukusuleleka ngehiv kwalowo ongenayo ihiv kanye no mntwana ongakazalwa.

src: nanoma kunjalo, ekucaleni kwalomnyaka, ku siphatsimandla sase ningizimu afrika lesilawula imikhicito yetemphilo sivume kusetjentiswa kweringi yesitfo sangasese sabomake (ivaginal ring) njengeprep .
tgt: okwamanje, ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, iziphathimandla ezilawula imikhiqizo yezempilo eningizimu afrika zigunyaze ukusetshe nziswa kweringi eshuthekwa esithweni sangasese sowesifazane njengeprep .

src: leringi inemutsi losinca ndzagciwane lobitwa ngekutsi idapivirine futsi ifanele kutsi intjintjwe njalo ngenyanga.
tgt: le ringi iqukethe isithako esithena igciwane amandla esibizwa ngedapivirine futhi kufanele ishintshwe nyanga zonke.

src: kwengeta, iprep lensha – umjovo lotsatsa tinyanga letimbili usemtimbeni – usalindzele kuvunywa.
tgt: ngaphezu kwalokhu, iprep entsha – okungumjovo ohlala izinyanga ezimbili – ulinde ukuthi ugunyazwe.

src: utawutsi ungavunywa, bantfu angeke basadzinga kutsi bakhu mbule kutsi banatse emaphilisi onkhe emalanga.
tgt: uma usugunyaziwe, abantu ngeke kusafanela ukuthi bakhu mbule ukuphuza iphilisi zonke izinsuku.

src: kuya emacasini ngalokuphephilelenhlangano ihlose kunci phisa kwesuleleka ngehiv ngekukhutsata kusetjentiswa kwemakhondomu kanye nekuya emacasini ngaloku phephile.
tgt: ucansi oluphephileinhlangano ihlose ukunci phisa ukusuleleka ngehiv ngokugqugquzela uku setshenziswa kwejazi lomkhwenyana nocansi oluphephile.

src: "sicela bantfwana nelu sha kutsi bangasheshi baye emacansini kute kutsi kube sikhatsi sekutsi bakhone kutitsatsela tincumo letibhadlile naletinemphilo," kusho mabaso.
tgt: "sinxusa izingane nentsha ukuthi ingajahi ukuzibandakanya ocansini baze bakulungele ukuthatha izi nqumo eziphusile neziphi lile," kusho umabaso.

src: bomake labanehiv labamunyisako lokufanele kutsi bakwati vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba ini ngizimu afrika itawube ibungata lilanga lemhlaba le ngculazi mhla lu1 nge ngongoni, litiko lete mphilo lakwazulunatal selicaphelise ngeku tsi bomake labanehiv labamunyisako kutsi bacabange ngekumunyisa libele kuphela bantfwana babo tinyanga letisi tfupha.
tgt: okumele kwaziwe ngomama abanehiv abancelisayo vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba ini ngizimu afrika izobe ikhu mbula usuku lomhla ba lwesifo sengculazi mhla lu1 kuzibandlela, umnyango wezempilo kwazulunatali weluleke omama abane gciwane lehiv ukuthi bacabange ngokuncelisa abantwana babo ibele kuphela izinyanga eziyisithupha.

src: ngekuya kwelitiko, uma ngabe ungumake lonehiv kantsi futsi uyamunyisa, kubalulekile kukhulumisana nemeluleki wakho wetehiv ngetindlela tekumunyisa.
tgt: ngokusho komnyango, uma ungumama onegciwane lehiv futhi oncelisayo, kuba lulekile ukuthi uxoxisane nomeluleki wakho wehiv ngezindlela ezehlukene zoku pha umntwana ukudla.

src: uma ngabe ukhetsa kumunyisa libele, yenta siciniseko sekutsi umunyisa libele kuphela tinyanga letisitfupha.
tgt: uma ukhetha ukunce lisa ibele, qinisekisa ukuthi umuncelisa ibele kuphela isikhathi esiyizinyanga eziyisithupha.

src: lucwaningo lukhombisa kutsi mancane kakhulu ematfuba ekutsi luswane lungatfola ihiv elubisini lwelibele lamake uma ngabe make amunyisa libele kuphela tinyanga letisitfupha.
tgt: ucwaningo lubonise ukuthi umntwana unamathuba ayingcosana kakhulu oku thola ihiv obisini lwebele uma umama emuncelisa ibele kuphela.

src: kuletinyanga ukhulelwe, kanye nekumunyisa libele, yenta siciniseko sekutsi usebentisa ikhondomu uma uya emacasini kute kutsi uvikele kutsi lesifo siphindze futsi sikungene.
tgt: ngalesi sikhathi usakhu lelwe, futhi uma usancelisa, qinisekisa ukuthi usebenzisa ijazi lomkhwenyana uma uya ocansini ukuze uzogwema ukusuleleka ngegciwane okusha.

src: uma ngabe unenkinga njengekuba buhlungu kwetingono noma emabele, yenta siciniseko sekutsi usheshe uye emtfolamphilo uyotfola lusito.
tgt: uma unanoma yiyiphi inkinga efana nezingono ezibuhlungu noma amabele abuhlungu, qinisekisa ukuthi uya emtholampilo ngokushe sha uzothola usizo.

src: litiko lincoma kakhulu kumunyisa libele kuphela ngoba kusita luswane kutsi lube nemasotja emtimba lacinile, kanye nebudlelwane lobucinile emkhatsini wamake nemntfwana.
tgt: umnyango uncoma kakhulu ukuncelisa ibele kuphela ngoba kusiza umntwana ukuthi abe namasotsha omzimba aqinile, futhi kuqinisa ubudlelwano phakathi komama nomntwana.

src: kumunyisa libele kuphindze futsi kunciphise bungoti bamake bekutsi abe namdlavuta wemabele.
tgt: ukuncelisa ibele kuphinde kunciphise ubungozi bokuba nomdlavuza webele.

src: emanga nemacini so mayelana neku munyisa kunemanga lamanyenti mayelana nekumunyisa libele, litikoke liwacitsile lamanga ngekuphendvula lemibuto lelandzelako levame kubutwa bomake labanehiv kanye nalabo labete ihiv .
tgt: amampunge namaqiniso ngokuncelisa ibele maningi amampunge akhu lunywayo ngokuncelisa ibele, umnyango ucacise ngala mampunge ngokuphendula le mibuzo elandelayo ejwa yele ukubuzwa ngomama abanegciwane lehiv kanye nalabo abangenalo igciwane lehiv .

src: umbuto: makhelwane wami utsi kufanele kutsi ngitfole umutsi wekuhlanta sisu semntfwanami.
tgt: umbuzo: umakhelwane wami uthe kufanele ngithole umuthi othile wokuhlanza isisu somntwana wami.

src: kubalulekile yini loku?
tgt: ingabe lokhu kubalulekile?

src: imphendvulo: umtfubi, lokulubisi lwekucala lweli bele lukhishwa ngemadlala lasemabeleni ngemuva kwekubeleka, luhlanta emangcoliso ekucalangca esiswini seluswane.
tgt: impendulo: umthubi, oku ngubisi lokuqala oluphuma ebeleni emuva kokubeletha, lukhuculula ijengezi esiswini somntwana.

src: kute leminye imitsi loyidzingako yekuhlanta lokungcola ngoba lubisi lwelibele luhlobile nomake luhlantekile, futsinje lwenta lucwencwe lolusendlalelo sesisu, lusivi kela emagciwaneni.
tgt: angeke udinge muthi ukuthi usihlanzisise njengoba ubusi lwebele luhlanzekile nje, futhi luvala ingaphakathi lesisu, lusivikele emagciwaneni.

src: umbuto: emalangeni ekucala lambalwa, uma ngabe ngite lubisi lolwenele, ngingamnika umntfwanami emanti kanye naletinye tinhlobo telubisi?
tgt: umbuzo: ezinsukwini zokuqala, uma ngingenalo ubisi olwanele, ngingamnika amanzi noma olunye ubisi?

src: imphendvulo: umtfubi nguwo kuphela lodzingwa ngu mntfwana.
tgt: impendulo: umntwana udinga umthubi kuphela.

src: ufanele kutsi umunyise umntfwana njalonje kutsi lubisi lutokhona lwakheka ebeleni wenta lubisi lolunyenti ngaleyo ndlela.
tgt: kufanele nje uhlale uncelisa umntwana njalo ukuze ubisi luzophuma – uma wenza njalo wenza ubisi oluningi.

src: cela umbelekisi akunike luswane lwakho kungakapheli liawa lekucala ngemuva kwekubeleka, kute kutsi ubeke luswane lwakho ebeleni.
tgt: cela umbelethisi ukuthi akunikeze umntwana wakho singakapheli isigamu sehora emuva kokubeletha, ukuze uzobeka umntwana ebeleni.

src: umntfwanakho utawufundza masinyane kutsi ufanele kutsi amunye kanjani futsike loku kutakusita kutsi wente lubisi.
tgt: umntwana uzofunda masi nyane ukuncela futhi lokhu kuzokusiza ukuthi ube nobisi oluningi.

src: umbuto: ngiyamumunyisa umntfwanami, kepha akasutsi.
tgt: umbuzo: ngincelisa ibele, kodwa umntwana akasuthi.

src: ngifanele yini kumnika lubisi lwesikotela?
tgt: ingabe kufanele ngimnike ubisi olusethinini futhi?

src: imphendvulo: cha, ungenta lubisi lolunyenti nge kutsi uvame kumunyisa u mntfwanakho.
tgt: impendulo: cha, ungenza ukuthi ube nobisi oluningi ngokuncelisa umntwana njalo nje.

src: nika umntfwana sikhatsi lesenele sekutsi amunye adzimate asutse ngelibele linye kute wente siciniseko sekutsi umntfwanakho utfola lubisi lwakamuva lubisi lolu tfolwa ngumntfwana wakho ekucineni kwekumunya.
tgt: nikeza umntwana isikha thi sokuncela ubisi aze asuthe ebeleni elilodwa ukuze uzoqinisekisa ukuthi umntwana uthola ubisi lokugcina oku ngubisi umntwana aluthola ekugcineni kokuncela.

src: uma umntfwana amunya kakhulu, ngulaphoke kwakheka lubisi lolunyenti emabeleni.
tgt: uma umntwana encela kakhulu, kukhandeka ubusi oluningi.

src: umbuto: umntfwana ufuna kuhlala njalonje amunya mhlawumbe kwentiwa kutsi ngite lubisi lolwenele?
tgt: umbuzo: umntwana wami ufuna ukuncela njalo mhlawumbe anginalo ubisi olwanele?

src: imphendvulo: mhlawumbe umntfwana ukhula masi nyane, ngakoke udzinga lubisi lolunyenti.
tgt: impendulo: mhlawumbe umntwana ukhula masi nyane, usedinga ubisi olu ningi.

src: ngekumunyisa njalonje, ungakha lubisi lolwenele lwetidzingo tabo.
tgt: ngokumncelisa njalo, ungakhanda obisi olwa nele oluzomsuthisa.

src: lubisi angeke luphele.
tgt: ubisi ngeke luphele.

src: yenta kutsi umntfwana abe nesi khatsi lesenele sekumunya ungamsusi umntfwana ebeleni asamunya.
tgt: nikeza u mntwana isikhathi esenge ziwe sokuncela – ungamsusi umntwana ebeleni.

src: uma ngabe umntfwana uchamela emanabukeli langetulu kwalasitfupha onkhe ema langa, umunyisa njalonje (lokungenani emahlandla la8 kuya ku12 ngelilanga), futsi umntfwana ukhula nge500g njalo ngenyanga, uma kunjaloke kusho kutsi une lubisi lolwenele.
tgt: uma umntwana echamela ama nabukeni angaphezu kwayisithupha nsuku zonke, enceliswa njalo nje (okungenani izikhathi ezi yisi8 kuya kweziyi12 nsuku zonke), futhi umntwana enyuka ngesisindo oku ngenani esingama500g njalo ngenyanga, lokho kusho ukuthi unobisi olwanele.

src: umbuto: uma ngabe u mntfwanami ukhala njalonje, yini lokufanele kutsi ngikwente?
tgt: umbuzo: ngenzenjani uma umntwana wami ekhala njalo?

src: imphendvulo: thulisa u mntfwanakho ngekutsi uvame kumbeka ebeleni.
tgt: impendulo: shushuzela u mntwana wakho ngokumbeka ebeleni njalo nje.

src: bantfwana badzinga kutsi babe dvutane kakhulu nabomake babo.
tgt: aba ntwana badinga ukusonde lana nomama babo.

src: kuba segumbini linye kwabomake nebantfwana kutawukhutsata loku.
tgt: ukulala egumbini elilodwa komama nabantwana kuyakukhuthaza lokhu.

src: uma ngabe umntfwana wakho ulambile, womile noma utfukutsele, kumunya libele kutamenelisa.
tgt: uma umntwana wakho elambile, omiwe noma ethukuthele, ukuncela ibele kuyabenelisa.

src: angeke kwenteke kutsi uphe u mntfwanakho kudla nga lokwecile uma ngabe ummunyisa libele kuphela.
tgt: akujwayelekile ukuthi ungancelisa u mntwana wakho ngokweqile uma umncelisa ibele kuphela.

src: umbuto: kukahle yini kunika umntfwanakho letinye tinatfo?
tgt: umbuzo: ingabe kulungile yini ukumnika okunye okuphuzwayo?

src: imphendvulo: cha, kunika umntfwanakho letinye tinatfo kusho kutsi u mntfwanakho usematfubeni lamanyenti ekutfola tifo njengesifo semsheko kanye nenumoniya.
tgt: impendulo: cha, ukwengeza ezinye iziphuzo kusho ukuthi umntwana usemathubeni amaningi okuthola izifo ezifana nesifo sohudo kanye nenyumoniya.

src: lokunye futsi, uma ngabe umntfwanakho unatsa letinye tinatfo, angeke bamunye ngendlela labafa nele kutsi bamunye ngayo futsike nawe angeke wakhe lubisi lolwenele emabeleni akho.
tgt: futhi, uma umntwana ephuza ezinye izinto, ngeke ancele njalo lokho okuzokwenza ukuthi ungenzi ubisi olwanele.

src: umbuto: umntfwana akawadzingi yini emanti uma kushisa?
tgt: umbuzo: ingabe umntwana uyawadinga yini amanzi uma kushisa?

src: imphendvulo: cha, lubisi lwe kucala (loluphuma kucala) lunemanti lamanyenti futsi lucedza koma kwemntfwana.
tgt: impendulo: cha, ubisi lokuqala (oluphuma kuqala) lunamanzi amaningi futhi luyakuqeda ukoma ko mntwana.

src: tinombolo temisebenti tikhombisa kutsi umnotfo wetfu ucala kuvuka vukuzenzele unnamed eminyakeni le mbalwa leye ndlulile, bantfu baseningizimu afrika kwadzingeka kutsi babukane nekukhula kancane kanye ne kwenyuka kwekwe swelakala kwemisebe nti.
tgt: izibalo zemisebenzi zibonisa ukuthi umnotho wethu uyavuka vukuzenzele unnamed eminyakeni embalwa eye dlule, abantu baseningizimu afrika bebephoqeleke ukuthi balwisane nokukhula okuhamba ngonyawo lonwabo kanye no kwenyuka koku swelakala kwemise benzi.

src: loku kube kubi kakhulu ngenca yelubhubhane lolu bhubhisako, kutama kuvu kela umbuso ngakholwane 2021 netikhukhula letine mandla kuletinye tindzawo takwazulunatal, emphu malanga kapa nasenyakatfo nshonalanga ekucaleni kwa lomnyaka.
tgt: lokhu kube nzima kakhulu ngenxa yobhubhane, imizamo yokuvukela umbuso ngontu likazi ngowezi2021, kanye nezikhukhula ezingxenyeni zakwazulunatali, empu malanga kapa nasenyakatho ntshonalanga.

src: emkhatsini wako konkhe loku, inkinga lenkhulu yagezi ikhule kakhulu, yadala umonakalo emnotfweni kanye nebumatima emakhaya nase mabhizinisini.
tgt: kukho konke lokhu, inkinga kagesi nayo ivele yenyukela, yadala umonakalo emnothweni futhi yathwesa ubunzima ama khaya namabhizinisi.

src: kantsi, ngisho emkhatsini waletinsayeya letinkhulu kangaka, ummango wetfu nemnotfo kubonakale kucinile.
tgt: noma kunjalo, ngisho nakuzo lezi zinselele ezesa bekayo, umphakathi wakithi kanye nomnotho kubonise ukuqina.

src: futsi tinkhomba tikhomba kutsi umnotfo wetfu ukhombisa timphawu tekusimama letinikana litsemba.
tgt: futhi izinkomba zithi umnotho wethu ubonisa izimpawu ezinhle zokukhula.

src: tibalo takamuva tekuca shwa, ikakhulukati, tisinika tizatfu telitsemba.
tgt: izibalo zakamuva zemise benzi, ikakhulukazi, izona ezilokozisa inhlansi yethemba.

src: telubalobalo taseningi zimu afrika ticophe kwehla kwelizinga lekweswelakala kwemisebenti ekoteni yesibili ya2021.
tgt: ezezibalo eningizimu afrika ziqophe ukwehla kwe zinga labantu abangasebenzi kwikota yesibili yowezi2021.

src: ngalokuphawule kako, kulinganisa kwabo kukhombisa kutsi sibalo sangempela sebantfu labacashiwe sikhuphukile sesuka kubantfu labatigidzi leti14.5 ekoteni yesine ya2021 saya kutigidzi leti15.5 ngekota yesibili ya2022.
tgt: ngokuphawulekayo, izibalo zabo zibonisa ukuthi inani ngqo labantu abasebenzayo lenyuke lasuka kubantu abayizigidi eziyi14.5 kwikota yesine yowezi2021 laya kwizigidi eziyi15.5 kwikota yesibili yowezi2022.

src: loku kukhula lokukhutsatako kwemisebenti ledzingeka kakhulu kwisi gamu sekucala salomnyaka.
tgt: lokhu kwenyuka kugqugquzela kakhulu kwimisebenzi edi ngekayo kwisigamu sokuqala salo nyaka.

src: lemisebenti yakhiwa ka khulu kumikhakha yete tinsita temmango netenhlalo, tekuhwebelana, tetimali kanye futsi, ngalokukhulu, wetekwakha.
tgt: le misebenzi yayisungulwe ikakhulukazi emikha kheni efana neyezinsizakalo zomphakathi nezenhlalo, ezohwebo, ezezimali kanye nakwezokwakha, ikakhulu kazi.

src: kunjalo, kunengi lokusamele kutsi kwentiwe uma sifuna kwenta umtselela lomuhle lobonakalako ezingeni leli phakeme lekweswelakala kwemisebenti kulelive.
tgt: kunjalo, kuningi okusa mele kwenziwe uma sifuna ukwenza umehluko obona kalayo kwizinga eliphezulu lokweswelakala kwemise benzi ezweni lethu.

src: ngaso leso sikhatsi, letibalo tikhomba kutsi tindzawo letibekwa embili teluhlelo lwekwakhiwa kabusha nekuvuselela umnotfo njengekucashwa kwebantfu labanengi, tingucuko kute mnotfo kanye nekutfutfu kiswa kwesakhiwonchanti tinemtselela ekudaleni ema tfuba emisebenti.
tgt: ngalowo mzuzu, lezi zibalo zibonisa ukuthi izindawo ezibekwe eqhulwini ohle lweni lokwakha kabusha nokuvuselela umnotho – ezi fana nemisebenzi eminingi yomphakathi, izinguquko zomnotho kanye nokuthuthu kiswa kwengqalasizinda – zinomthelela ekusungu lweni kwemisebenzi.

src: njengoba kutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti kanye nekutjalwa kwetimali kungulenye yetintfo letibalulekile teluhlelo lwetfu lwekuvuselela kabusha, kukhula kwemisebenti emkhakheni wetekwakha kuyakhutsata kakhulu.
tgt: njengoba ukuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kanye notshalomali kungenye yezinto ezibekwe eqhulwini ohlelweni lokuvuselela umnotho, ukukhula kwesibalo semisebenzi emkhakheni wezokwakha kuyagqugquzela kakhulu.

src: sabelomali sangendlovana nga2022 sivete kwenyuka kwetindleko letinge30% tekusetjentiswa kusa khiwonchanti semmango kuleminyaka lemitsatfu letako safinyelela kutigi dzigidzi letinger812, uma kucatsaniswa netigidzigidzi letinger627 kuleminyaka lemitsatfu leyendlulile.
tgt: isabelomali sangonhlolanja wezi2022 sabonisa ukukhula ngama30% kwemali ese tshenziswe kwingqalasizinda yomphakathi eminyakeni emithathu ezayo yaya kwizigidigidi ezingamar812, uma kuqhathaniswa nezigidigidi ezingamar627 eminyakeni emithathu eyedlule.

src: ibhodi yetekutfutfukisa imboni yetekwakha isandza kuphawula kutsi kube nekukhula kwemiklamo yesakhiwonchanti lechutjwa tinkampani tahulumende leti fana netransnet neeskom, nasemadolobheni lamakhulu nangelitiko letemisebenti yemmango nesakhiwo nchanti.
tgt: ibhodi lokuthuthukiswa kwemboni yezokwakha kamuvanje liphawule ukuthi kunokukhula okukhona kwi miklamo yengqalasizinda eqhutshwa izinkampani zika hulumeni ezifana notransnet noeskom, nakumadolo bhakazi kanye nomnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi nengqalasizinda.

src: ngenhlaba, kulomnyaka lesikuwo sibone umnotfo wetfu ubuyela emazingeni ekukhula ngembi kwelubhu bhane ngenca yemphumela lomuhle wegdp ngekota yekucala yemnyaka.
tgt: ngonhlangulana, ku lonyaka sibone umnotho wethu ubuyela emazingeni angaphambi kobhubhane ngokubuka umphumela ongemubi kakhulu wegdp kwikota yokuqala yonyaka.

src: ngalokwetayelekile inhloso kusuka ngalokubonakalako kulesisekelo lesiphasi, loku ngikoke sichubeka nekugcila kwetfu ekuhlelweni kabu sha kwetakhiwo lokungiko lokuchuba kukhula kwe mnotfo.
tgt: inhlosonqangi ngukusuka ngokubonakalayo kuleli zinga eliphansi, nokuyisona sizathu esenza siqhubeke nokugxila ekuguqulweni kwezakhiwo okuyizona eziqhuba uku khula komnotho.

src: hulumende usandza kushicilela sichibelo lesihlo ngotwako kute kutsi kususwe umkhawulo wekutfola emalayisense etikhungweni tekuphehla gezi kanye nekukhutsata kutjalwa kwetimali kumiklamo lemikhulu, lesezingeni lelisetulu kute kutsi kwengetwe ngekushesha emandla ekuphehla gezi kugridi.
tgt: uhulumeni kamuvanje ushicilele isethulo esi hlongozwayo sokususa isilinganiso somkhawulo wokukhishwa kwemvume yezikhungo eziphehla ugesi futhi wagqugquzela utshalomali kwimiklamo emikhulu, neyokuphehla ugesi ukuze kuzokwengezwa ngokushesha umthamo wogesi omusha kwisizinda sogesi sikazwelonke.

src: loku kumelela incophamlandvo emitameni yetfu yekugucula simo selive semandla agezi, lokusidzingo lesibalulekile sekukhula kwemnotfo kanye nekuheha kutjalwa kwetimali.
tgt: lokhu kuyingqophamlando emi zamweni yethu yokuguqula ezamandla zakuleli lizwe, okuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu eyisidingo sokukhuliswa komnotho kanye nokuheha utshalomali.

src: kusukela kwamenyetelwa luhlelo lwavelonkhe lwe temandla ngakholwane kulomnyaka, singuhulumende besiloku sisebentisana nebadlalindzima labanyenti labehlukene mayelana nekuphunyeleliswa nekuhlelwa kabusha kwenchubomgomo.
tgt: selokhu kwamenyezelwa uhlelo lwezamandla lukazwelonke ngontulikazi kulo nyaka, besilokhu sisebenza njengohulumeni ngoku bambisana nababambiqhaza abehlukene ekuqalisweni kokusebenza kwezinguquko zenqubomngomo.

src: kusukela sakhuphula umkhawulo wekutfola emalayisensi laba ngemamegawatsi la100 ngenhlaba 2021, sekubhaliswe imiklamo letimele lephehla gezi lovuselelekako longetulu kwe500 mw, lokuneluhlelo lwemiklamo lengetulu kwe6 000 mw etigabeni letehlu kahlukene tetentfutfuko.
tgt: selokhu sakhuphula isi linganiso semvume saya kumamegawathi ayi100 ngonhlangulana wezi2021, ingaphezu kwama500 mw imiklamo ezimele yoku phehlwa kogesi ovuselelekayo esibhalisiwe, njengamanje ingaphezu kwezi6 000 mw imiklamo esetshenzwayo emazingeni ehlukene oku thuthukiswa.

src: inchubo yekuhlelwa kabu sha kwetakhiwo iyachubeka nekubhalisa inchubekele mbili ekusekeleni kukhula kwemnotfo kanye nekuheha batjalitimali.
tgt: inqubo yokuguqulwa kwezakhiwo iqhubekela phambili ekwesekeni ukukhula ko mnotho nokuheha utshalo mali.

src: kukhula kwemnotfo ngeke kufezeke futsi ngeke kudaleke ematfuba emisebenti nga phandle kwekwenta tingucuko letimatima kodvwa leti dzingekako letitawukwenta ncono simo sebhizinisi kanye nekutjalwa kwetimali.
tgt: ukukhula komnotho ngeke kube yimpumelelo futhi imisebenzi ngeke isungulwe ngaphandle kokulandela izinguquko zezakhiwo okuyinto enzima kodwa edingekayo ukwenza ngcono isimo samabhizinisi nesotshalomali.

src: lena yindzima yahulumende.
tgt: lokhu kungumsebenzi kahulumeni.

src: nanoma kunjalo, kute kutsi imphumelelo icinisekiswe, kutawudzingeka kutsi kube nekumelana emkhatsini wemabhizinisi, basebenti kanye netinhlangano te mmango hhayi kuphela ngetingucuko letidzingekako, kodvwa ekuhwebelaneni lokudzingekako kute sifeze tinjongo tetfu.
tgt: kodwake ukuze siqinisekise impumelelo kulokhu, kuzo fanele kube nesivumelwano phakathi kwamabhizinisi, ezabasebenzi kanye no mphakathi hhayi nje kuphela ezinguqukweni ezidingekayo, kodwa ekuhwebelananeni okudingekayo ukufeza izinjongo zethu.
